
1a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud ma lus pa'i don nges par skul bar byed pa dpal gsang ba sgrub pa bzhugs so/ /
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa ka la tan+t+ra sa b+ha bA sany+tso ta ni sh+rI gu hya sid+d+hi nA ma:/ bod skad du/ rgyud ma lus
1b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don nges par skul bar byed pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam
1b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos po med cing khyab pa mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang 'jig rten spyod pa dag las
1b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam grol ma/ /gang zhig rtag 'byung zhi la rgyal ba dam pa khyu mchog rnams kyis phyag byas bsam gtan dang bral ba/ /ci
2a1(rgyud 'grel): yang rung ba'i gnas gyur dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sku yi dam pa rnam dag nang gi bdag nyid kyis 'jug pa/ /sangs rgyas
2a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang rtogs par bya ba min zhing dri ma rnams dang bral ba'i de nyid de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /go 'phang mchog tu 'gro ba tshol byed pho
2a3(rgyud 'grel): nya mchog gyur sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur cing/ /spyod pa sna tshogs dang 'brel rtsod pa'i dri ma'i bgegs kyis byas pa'i g.yeng
2a4(rgyud 'grel): ba spong byed pa'i/ /dngos grub rnams kyi skye sa rgyal ba rnams kyi yon tan brgya phrag mang po'i gnas gyur ma lta bu/ /mchog tu legs
2b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod thar pa ster byed rin chen gyur pa dpal ldan gsang ba grub pa bshad/ /yon tan dpag med gzhir gyur pa/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyi sku/ /gang gi spyod
2b2(rgyud 'grel): yul las 'das pa/ /dang por bde chen phyag byas nas/ /gsang ba grub pa bla med pa/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ /sems ni snying rje'i dbang gyur
2b3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /pad+ma rdo rje bdag gis bshad/ /rgyud gzhan du ma nyid du yang/ /sangs rgyas mgon pos ma gsungs pa/ /nges pa'i man ngag dang ldan pas/ /
2b4(rgyud 'grel): de ni da ltar bdag gis bshad/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /'bad pa thams cad spang bar bya/ /bskyed pa mang zhing ring ba dang/ /dang
2b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i las can bsgom pa'i phyir/ /rgyud kyi dam pa'i dngos brten nas/ /dngos grub bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /bsgom pa yi ni bar chad can/ /rgyas
3a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad rnam spangs la/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub legs ster ba/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /gsang ba grub pa bla med pa/ /
3a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang pos mdor bsdus bshad par bya/ /dge 'byung nyon mongs med pa dang/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jigs mdzad cing/ /dngos grub kun gyi rten
3a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa/ /yid bzhin nor bu mchog lta bu/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed cing/ /g.yeng ba'i dgra rnams 'joms byed pa/ /don rnams thams
3a4(rgyud 'grel): cad grub byed pa/ /mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid do/ /gang dang gang der gnas na yang/ /thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/ /bsgom pa dag la rab
3a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas na/ /sgrub po gang de dngos grub 'gyur/ /sbas pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pas/ /chos rnams dang yang 'gal med par/ /rdor gsum dbye ru
3b1(rgyud 'grel): med gzugs can/ /byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs nas/ /bla med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /srog chags gsod cing khro ba dang/ /gang yang khro ba'i las dga' zhing/ /
3b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzun gyi tshig gis spros pa yis/ /mi gang rmongs pas 'tsho ba yi/ /mi de dag kyang myur bar 'dir/ /spyod pa 'dis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi chung ma spyod pa dang/ /gzhan gyi nor la rku ba dang/ /dman pa'i
3b3(rgyud 'grel): las can smad pa gang/ /rtag tu spyod par byed pa dang/ /gang la spyod pas 'dod khams kyi/ /steng gi pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sbas pa'i rtul zhugs ngo bo nyid/ /sgrub pa po la bdag gis brjod/ /gsang ba'i
3b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa mchog bzang po/ /dngos grub kun ster thabs bcas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i gnas gang yin/ /tshe 'dis la las thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mchog tu zhi ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs
3b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas/ /thob par 'dod pas mchog zhi ba/ /gsang ba grub pas bsgrub par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor nyid/ /de nyid ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /gzhan du de nyid dman pas ni/ /
3b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nyid brtags pa rnams las gzhan/ /khyad par thams cad rnam spangs shing/ /mtshan ma med cing snang ba med/ /gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid/ /lung
4a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bstan bcos lugs rim pas/ /ji srid rtog pa dang bcas pas/ /de srid bar du rgyas 'gyur te/ /chu la 'bru mar thim pa bzhin/ /re zhig rtogs des dgos med chog /rnam rtog sna tshogs byed pa
4a2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /bstan bcos de nyid tshol mi dgos/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /dang por de nyid shes byas la/ /de nyid bsgrub phyir nyes gnas bya/ /de nas bsgom la 'bad pa yis/ /nyams
4a3(rgyud 'grel): su myong ba bskyed par bya/ /de nyid gsal bar gyur sems kyis/ /phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad/ /rig pa dang ldan brtul zhugs kyang/ /de yi rjes la spyad par bya/ /gcig pu brtan pa'i
4a4(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis ni/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa spyad nas ni/ /de ni mthar thug skyes gyur nas/ /phyi nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /gzhan du de nyid dman pa yi / /
4a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ba'i rgyu can nyid gyur pa/ /dmyal ba 'thob par byed pa'i rgyu/ /brtul zhugs kyis ni ci zhig bya/ /grub po de nyid la gnas pas/ /brtul zhugs med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /
4a6(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs brgya phrag la spyad kyang/ /de nyid dman na 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de nyid ldan na thams cad kyis/ /dri med de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /sgrub po sgom pa dang ldan zhing/ /sdig pa kun las rnam
4b1(rgyud 'grel): grol bas/ /brtul zhugs kyis ni chags med thob/ /dngos grub rgyal bas thob ma gsungs/ /dngos grub de nyid shes gyur nas/ /'thob kyi brtul zhugs kyis ni min/ /chags pa kun las log gyur cing/ /slongs mo gtso bor bya ba ste/ /de tsam brtul zhugs
4b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis khyab 'gyur/ /de nyid spangs nas dngos grub med/ /'bab? stegs? lha rten sbyin pa'ang min/ /khrus dang dka' thub de bzhin te/ /'di kun bden pa ma yin gyi/ /'di nyid gcig pu bden pa nyid/ /gnod pa skyed par byed pa yi/ /ngan pa'i las dag sngon
4b3(rgyud 'grel): byas pas/ /de nyid dman pa'i lus can gyis/ /brtul zhugs ngo bo ma lus myong/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang/ /srid bar ngal bar byas pas kyang/ /de nyid ldan na 'grub 'gyur te/ /nor rnams phun tshogs bdag nyid kyi/ /de nyid rin chen sgom byed na//
4b4(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs med kyang de nyid ni/ /nges par bla na med par 'gro /lung gi spyod pa las gsungs pa'i/ /brtul zhugs gang zhig 'dir gnas ba/ /nor rnams sgrub par mi nus pas/ /'tsho ba'i phyir ni brtag pa nyid/ /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin
4b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs/ /rnam par shes pa'i gzhir gyur ltar/ /de ltar de nyid ldan brtul zhugs/ /de nyid las ni 'jug par brtan/ /'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyu phyir dang/ /nor la sogs pa bsgrub phyir dang/ /sems can don du de nyid bcas/ /brtul zhugs
4b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyis bzhes pa yin/ /'tsho ba yis ni thabs tsam du/ /so so'i skye bos gtsor byed pas/ /ji ltar mtshan ma'i che ba nyid/ /de nyid bral na dngos grub med/ /nor gyi 'byor pa ldan pa'i bdag /rtag tu bsgoms par ral byas pa'i//
4b7(rgyud 'grel): smyon pa'i gzugs nyid la brten cing/ /gsang ba grub par rnam gnas nas/ /de nyid rdo rje 'chang bla ma/ /bsgom dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan du de nyid ldan gyur kyang/ /dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod mi 'gyur/ /de ltar
5a1(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol yongs bcad la/ /de nyid bla med shes byas nas/ /sangs rgyas nyid du nges bya ste/ /blo ldan gsang ba grub par spyod/ /rnam par g.yeng ba kun gyi gzhi/ /brtul zhugs spangs shing de nyid shes/ /shes rab
5a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nyid de yang rgyud gnas pas/ /dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus par gsal/ /spros pa du ma rgyas gyur pas/ /gzhan du sbas nas bstan pa yin/ /bya ba spyod pa'i dbye ba dang/ /mdo sde'i sde snod
5a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs su/ /mchog tu dag pa gcig pu nyid/ /rnam pa du mar rnam par gnas/ /phung po rin chen snod nyid du/ /sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis/ /de nyid 'bad pas sba mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas mgon pos rnam par bzhag /byang chub sems
5a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog rnam par dag /bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/ /rang gi lus la rab gnas pa/ /de ni 'bad pas rig par bya/ /de nas spyod pa bya ba 'am/ /khyim du gnas te bsgom par bya/ /de nyid rin chen rnam dag bdag /rtsod pa thams cad rnam spangs
5a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /thabs bzangs po ni rnam spangs nas/ /'gal ba'i dam tshig la sogs la/ /gzhan du gang zhig sgrub gyur pa/ /de ni du 'bad sogs par 'tshed/ /ji ltar me ni 'bar gyur pa/ /de ni rtsa shing phung po dag /bcug nas thal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /myu
5a6(rgyud 'grel): gu sogs pa'ang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin de nyid med bzhin du/ /ngo mtshar che ba ltar byed pa/ /ji srid nam mkha' gnas bar du/ /shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal bar 'gro /ji ltar 'ga' zhig sbrul gdug la/ /sman dang sngags sogs mi ldan par//
5a7(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pa bdag nyid gang rtse ba/ /gshin rje'i gnas 'gro 'dod pa yin/ /ji ltar mdza' med rgya mtsho la/ /gru med gzhan zhig 'jug 'gyur ba/ /thabs dang rten med gyur nas ni/ /skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin dza yi mdza' can
5b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud/ /yang dag rab sbyin spangs gyur pa/ /smad cing dman pa'i las rnams ni/ /byas na mnar med 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rnyed dka' bla med go 'phang mchog /de nyid ces byar mngon brjod pa/ /gang gis dag pa de thob pa/ /de yi thabs ni bdag gis
5b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ bla ma dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /gang gis gnyis su med par mthong/ /dngos grub bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /de nyid de ni 'dir thob 'gyur/ /gang yang khro zhing nga rgyal can/ /bslus pa byis dang spros la dga' / /'dod cing chags pa'i sems
5b3(rgyud 'grel): can gang/ /gang las rnyed cing gang las min/ /g.yo sgyus bla mar phyag byed cing/ /skyon rtog pa la ched du byed/ /brdzun pas nga rgyal gdug pa can/ /tshig gis rtsod la rtag tu gnas/ /rdo rje spun dang bla ma la/ /bslu pa'i bsam pa brtan pa can//
5b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can des ni dngos grub kun/ /ster ba'i go 'phang de mi thob/ /'dir ni 'di 'dra gzhan yang mthong/ /ji srid 'dod pa thob bar du/ /phyag 'tshal mchod dang bsnyen bkur gyis/ /brtan par bla ma mnyes byas nas/ /go 'phang mchog
5b5(rgyud 'grel): ni thob nas ni/ /mdun nyid na ni gnas na yang/ /su zhig gang nas ji ltar 'ongs/ /rang bzhin ngan pas mi shis so/ /gcig pu mthong nas ring po nas/ /gus par phyag ni 'tshal byed cing/ /de yang mang po'i nang du ni/ /bde bar byon
5b6(rgyud 'grel): nam tsam gyis phongs/ /de lta bu yi sems can gang/ /mya ngan 'das mchog go 'phang mchog /yang dag gsung pas gang gsungs pa/ /de yi thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sems can 'di lta bu/ /bla ma smod dang dag kyang mthong/ /ngo
5b7(rgyud 'grel): tsha spangs shing spyod pa ring/ /yang dag rim pa sun 'byin pa/ /rgyud ni bsdu ba tsam nyid kyis/ /de yi dngos la kha phyir ltas/ /dbang bskur rjes gnang med par yang/ /slob ma dag ni sdud par byed/ /glegs bam mthong bas dga' 'gyur nas/ /gsang
6a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags rang nyid len par byed/ /slob dpon las ni shes min pa/ dam tshig spyod pa rnam par spangs/ /sems can rnams ni sdud pa na/ /glegs bam bka' yi byed pa yin/ /de nyid shes pa ma yin par/ /gang phyir yang
6a2(rgyud 'grel): dag gsungs pas bstan/ /de lta bu dang de dag nyid/ /kun kyang sdig pa'i las can de/ /dam pa min pa'i lam zhugs nas/ /dmyal ba dag tu 'gro bar gcig /sdug bsngal 'bongs dang nyon mongs dang/ /sna tshogs nang kyis gtses pa'i mthar/
6a3(rgyud 'grel): shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur/ /bde gshegs dngos grub 'dod na ni/ /dam tshig spyod pa spangs pa yis/ /sgrub dka' de dang lhan cig tu/ /gnas pa nyid duAng mi bya'o/ /dngos po kun gyi slob dpon
6a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /ji srid mnyes par gyur bar du/ /lus ngag yid kyi brtan pa ru/ /dus ni ring por mnyes byed pa'i/ slob ma shin tu dri med pa'i/ /de nyid yang dag rab sbyin gnas/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyis bka' drin gyis/ /de nas bgegs med thob
6a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i dngos/ /de nyid rgyal po yangs pa ste/ /nyin dang mtshan du bsgoms pa yis/ /dngos grub myur du des 'thob 'gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyas gyur pa'i/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i dbang po la/ /rgyud rnams du
6a6(rgyud 'grel): mar gsungs pa yi/ /bzlas dang sbyin bsregs brtul zhugs sogs/ /thun mtshams bzhi yi cho ga yi/ /yul dang dkyil 'khor bri la sogs/ kha dog gzugs sogs dbye ba yi/ /rig rnams su ni rnam brtags dang/ /khrus dang lha
6a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod smyung ba dang/ /phyag rgya 'ching ba'i rigs de bzhin/ /sku gzugs la sogs cho ga dang/ /mchod rten las ni rgyas pa dang/ /de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs byed pa yi/ /grub pa sems can bsam rim
6b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /dpal 'byung ba yi mgon pos gsungs/ /de ltar rnam rtog 'bum phrag gi /yang dag gsung ba grub gsungs pa/ /der ni dngos grub gang grub pa'am/ /'on kyang 'dir ni de mi 'grub/ /lo gcig la sogs bskal ba dang/ /gcig
6b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gnyis su srid pa'i mthar/ /sgrub po gang gis 'grub 'gyur ba/ /chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas gyur pa/ /skye ba grangs med du ma ru/ /bsgom la brtan zhing chags med pas/ /sgrub pa'i dbang po grub pa ru/ /'gyur bar gang zhig sdang
6b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ /de ni re zhig 'dir mi dgos/ /thob par 'gyur ba dgos ma yin/ /grub pa'i bde ba las lhag pa'i/ /lus gdungs sdug bsngal gyi mi 'thob/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa zhes bya 'dir/ /spros pa thams cad rnam spangs
6b4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan 'dus las mchog gzhan med/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rin chen gyur/ /snying po las kyang snying po mchog /rgyud kun gyis ni bla ma'i bla/ /
6b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan dang bshad pas rnam gnas pa/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor rim pa nyid/ /'dus pa gang gis mi shes pa/ /de yi dngos grub ji ltar 'grub/ /the tshom thams cad gcod byed cing/ /mi shes rab rib sel byed pa/ /sangs rgyas rin chen
6b6(rgyud 'grel): za ma tog /dpal ldan 'dus pa yongs spangs nas/ /rnam rtog du mas brtags pa yis/ /rmongs pa dngos grub 'dod gyur pa/ /mkha' la khu tshur rdeg pa dang/ /smig rgyu'i chu la 'thung ba bzhin/ /dang po'i las can bsgom pa yi/ /spros pa'i
6b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyud rnams spang byas shing/ /thabs dang shes rab shes byas nas/ /ji lta ba bzhin rnam par mnos/ /de phyir nges byas sems gcig pa/ /blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /nyin dang mtshan du bsgom byas na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom
7a1(rgyud 'grel): med/ /tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/ /'di la smyung ba bshad pa med/ /gnyis med ye shes dang ldan na/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /yon tan gter gyur rdo rje 'chang la dri med rdo rje gsum gyis rtag tu
7a2(rgyud 'grel): gus byas la/ /skya ba'i rgya mtsho sdig pa'i rlabs dag mang ldan pa la grub gyur gcig pu mchog /gsang ba'i yon tan 'byung 'gyur dri ma bral zhing don kun sgrub cing rab tu sbyin par byed pa yi/ /rgyud nas gsungs pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i sgrub
7a3(rgyud 'grel): pa blo dang ldan pas deng nas brtsam par bya/ /don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyis dam pa'i don nges par bsdus pas dpal gsang ba grub ba zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba dang brtul zhugs dang de kho na nyid
7a4(rgyud 'grel): nges par bstan pa zhes pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //rgyud gzhan rim pa ma yin pa'i/ /cung zad sdus pa'i lam nyid las/ /gsang ba las byung sgrub pa'i thabs/ /de las yang dag bshad par bya/ /phyi rol de nyid bya ba'i lam/ /
7a5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu ring ba kun spangs la/ /lugs bcas rnal 'byor rim pa yis/ /ji lta ba bzhin bdag gis brjod/ /slob dpon phal cher 'di skad brjod/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa mdangs chen gyi/ /rgyud kyi sdud par byed pa po/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten dbang phyug zer
7a6(rgyud 'grel): bla ma zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i sdud pa po/ /gzhan dag yod pa ma yin zhes/ /bdag nyid 'ba' zhig smra bar byed/ /rgyud mdzad pa ni thugs rje che/ /gsung ba po de brjod pa'ang de/ /de las gzhan dag yod min pas/ bde chen
7a7(rgyud 'grel): las gzhan gsung pa med/ /'di skad thos pa'i tshig gang dang/ /bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig gnas pa/ /thugs kyi rdo rje bdag nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas kun la bstan pa yin/ /dpal ldan bde chen mgon po yis/ /bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig bzang por//
7b1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bzang po gang bstan pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis cung zhig brjod/ /dus gcig mchog tu mdor bstan pa/ /gang tshe gtso pos gsungs pa na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud bden don/ /bde ba chen po bdag nyid yin/ /rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad
7b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /rgyud don bden pa de thos nas/ /'dar zhing 'jigs pa dang ldan pas/ /dbang phyug mchog la de nyid zhus/ /dpa' bo chos nyid 'di lta bu/ /gtso bo gsung bar dka' ba gsung/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang thams cad du/ /shin tu 'jigs pa skyed byed pa//
7b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /shin tu gsang ba 'byed par byed/ /chos kun mnyam nyid gcig la nyid/ /gang yin gtso bo khyed kyis gsungs/ /'di skad brjod par gyur pa na/ /sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad kyang/ /'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur ma kyang/ /byang
7b4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems ni thugs la bzhag /e ma'o gsang pa las gsang ba/ /rdo rje theg pa'i bshad pa 'di/ /ngo bo med cing dag gyur la/ /gang las dpe yang yod min pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brgyal gyur pa/ /rdo rje sems dpas de gzigs nas//
7b5(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyang/ /ting 'dzin bzang po la gnas nas/ /de nas sangs rgyas rdo rje dang/ /pad+ma'i snyoms 'jug sbyor ba mdzad/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyi/ /'jam po'i gsung gis gsung bar mdzad/ /kye kye rgyal ba thams cad
7b6(rgyud 'grel): gzigs/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul yin/ /gang du lus ngag sems med pa/ /der ni gzugs su rab tu mthong/ /byang chub sems kyi sbyor ba yis/ /ji srid 'bad pas rtogs 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas shis pa/ /chos
7b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid/ /shes rab rang gi dngos de srid/ /kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyis/ /spros pa med cing dag pa las/ /'di dag thams cad rnam par 'phrul/ /mchog tu shis shing rnam dag gang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag
8a1(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i/ /brjod min kun la khyab par gnas/ /thams cad de yi rnam 'phrul yin/ /bzang po de nyid gnas pa yang/ /mkha' dbyings zhes bya'i sgrib bral la/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis/ /sems
8a2(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi bde 'byung byed/ /rnam dag shes rab lus las byung/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhi pa/ /lha rdzas chos 'byung mi 'byung ba/ /glo yis de ni bdag gis brtan/ /a'i cha byad bzang po la/ /dbus su baM gis rnam par brgyan//
8a3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba kun gyi gnas gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog /rgyud kyi dang por gang gnas pa/ /de phyir de ni bshad par bya/ /dpa' bo bde chen 'di skad du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gsungs/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad
8a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi tshul dag gis/ /gnas shing dngos grub bzang ster ba/ /shes rab ces bya'i ming gi gnas/ /de la gnas pa gang yin pa/ /b+ha ga zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis/ /dag pa'i de nyid ces bya ste/ /don dam pa de bdag gis
8a5(rgyud 'grel): brten/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /bcas pa'i sku gsung rdo rje nyid/ /dag pa de lang gnas nas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas spangs pa yis/ /chos gnas dag pa gzhan dag med/ /gang la sangs rgyas
8a6(rgyud 'grel): kun 'byung zhing/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab gnas pa'o/ /dag pa de nyid gnas med pas/ /'jig pa nyid du ma byed cig /chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid/ /rdo rje btsun mo nyid la gnas/ /dud 'gro la sogs 'gro ba kun/ /de las thams cad 'byung
8a7(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /rgyal bar ci yi phyir na yang/ /khyod ni 'jigs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas snying po las byung ba/ /de ni de yi chos nyid mchog /snying po'i ye shes mdza' gcig pu/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nyid 'di skad thos 'gyur
8b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas nas/ /bye ba kun gyi bstod byed cing/ /phyag 'tshal gzugs kyi 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la phan ston pa'i/ /snyan pa'i tshig rnams smra byed pa/ /thub chen dpa' bo chen po ni/ /'gro ba'i mgon gyis bshad
8b2(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gtso yongs dag pa/ /rdo rje theg pa skor mdzad cing/ /'gyur ba med cing snang ba med/ /gnas med de nyid bshad du gsol/ /dpa' bo nyon mongs mtsho chen las/ /rgyal bas ji ltar nges grol ba'i/ /de nyid mchog ni bshad
8b3(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ /de nyid kun gyi mchog gi mchog /bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig gi 'gor/ /e baM tshig gis rnam brgyan pa/ /gang zhig shes ba tsam gyis ni/ /bde gshegs dngos grub 'byung 'gyur ba'o/ /dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje 'chang/ /de ltar
8b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol 'debs gsan gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la/ /go 'phang mchog ni gsung bar mdzad/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rdo rje snying po kun bsdus pa/ /shin tu gsang ba phyed mdzad nas/ /rdo rje thugs kyi bstan pa ltar//
8b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar rnam par gnas pa bzhin/ /de bzhin bdag gis bshad par bya/ /bla ma zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/ /gsal por thams cad shes byas nas/ /dngos grub thams cad kun bsdus pa/ /bzang po de nas bshad par bya/ /rgyud kyi dang por rnam gnas
8b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /snying po las ni snying po mchog /de nyid bde chen mgon po yis/ /gsang ba de nyid ces byar gsungs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /sems can kun gyi bde 'byung ba/ /gsang ba'i rtog pa'i dbang rgyal po/ /dpal ldan 'dus
8b7(rgyud 'grel): par rnam par gnas/ /e baM rnam dag yi ge la/ /khams gsum po kun gus phyag 'tshal/ /gang de dpal ldan 'gro mgon gyis/ /phyag rgya'i mchog gyur brtags pa nyid/ /de ni shes rab ces byar grags/ /thog ma bar mdza' dri ma med/ /ye shes
9a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsum 'byung? ba/ kun rdzob gzugs su rnam par gnas/ /sems can rjes su bzung ba'i phyir/ /las kyi phyag rgya zhes byar grags/ /mi mo'i lus la brten nas ni/ /sems can kun la phan par mdzad/ /kun
9a2(rgyud 'grel): khyab dge ba thams cad pa/ /shes rab lha mo bla na med/ /gcig pu bzang po 'byung 'gyur ba/ /sems can mgon gyis bsten pa yin/ /mkha' dbyings pho brang nyams dga' na/ /sna tshogs thugs rje can gnas pa/ /de la bya ga zhes brjod dang/ /e
9a3(rgyud 'grel): baM? zhes bya'i mig? gnyis la/ /lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi de nyid gnas/ /de phyir de nyid mdor bstan dang/ /rgyas par bstan pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rje btsun gyi nang na gnas pa yang/ /de'i
9a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhung lugs nyams pa spas pa las shin tu sbas pa'i don dam pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid dbang du byas nas brjod par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i brten pa dang/ g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo de
9a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid kyi ye shes sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su byed pa'i gzugs can thugs rdo rje'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi brgyan pa'i skur gyur nas/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa e baM zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i de
9a6(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi nges par ston to/ /don dam pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lha'i gzugs de nyid rgyud kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu bdun gyi go rims
9a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi nges par rdzogs par gyur nas do rab tu ston par mdzad de/ dang po gleng gzhi'i le'u las/ /byang chub sems dpa' bcu bdun gyi med brjod pa'i mdza' na/ ji ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo mngon par bsgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems
9b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang zhes bya ba la sogs dbang du byas nas brjod de/ /'di ni re zhig dang po'i lha rnal 'byor yin te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dngos po med pa'i gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bdag nyid can du gyur
9b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ dam tshig dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzlas pa'i cho ga'i lugs sngon du 'gro bas/ sa la sogs pa'i ma bzhi'i rigs dang lhan cig nam mkha' i khams su rnam par gnas nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod kyi sgo nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang
9b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod du med pa'i dud 'gro la sogs pa'i sems can gyi rim pa ma lus pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags kyi sku mchog du dga' ba'i gzugs can/ bde ba mchog gi gtso bo'i dpal pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang
9b4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgra thos pa na/ brgyal bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slang bar bya ba'i phyir/ e baM zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i de kho na nyid gang yin pa de 'dod
9b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o/ /rgyud kyi dang por gang gnas pa/ /sbas pa de phyir bshad par bya/ /rdo rje btsun mo las byung ba/ /e baM rnam dag yi ge nyid/ /e baM nam mkha' i khams su brjod/ /ma ya phyag rgyar rjes su thob/ /gang zhig de ni ston byed pa/ /thos pa zhes bya 'dir
9b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod do/ /rtog med kun mkhyen ye shes nyid/ /dus cig pa yang de yin no/ /b+ha ga'i gzugs can gang yin te/ /nam mkha' i khams zhes bya bar brjod/ /dus gcig na zhes gang bstan pa/ /de mdor bstan pa zhes brjod do/ /nam mkha' i khams zhes bde 'byung
9b7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /gang yin bdag gis der brten to/ /sna tshogs dril bu rnga yab phreng/ /dril bu rin chen gyis nyer brgyan/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin kun bzang po/ /gnas kyi mchog der mchod par byed/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes nyer bstan pa/ /gtso bo bdag po thugs
10a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid do/ /rdo rje btsun mo zhes brjod pa/ /shes rab rgyal ba kun dngos te/ /thams cad ces bya sgra brjod pa/ /mi bskyod la sogs de bzhin gshegs/ /de yi sku gsung thugs gang yin/ /thugs nyid du ni rnam par gnas/ /rnam dag
10a2(rgyud 'grel): btsun mo'i b+ha ga der/ /bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs/ /dngos po kun gyi ngo bo yis/ /mchog tu dga' bas rnam rol cing/ /e yi cha byad bzang po la/ /dbus su baM gis rnam par brgyan/ /der ni rdo rje 'dzin mchog gnas/ /shes rab las byung zhi
10a3(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid/ /der ni sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing/ /de nyid du ni rnam par gnas/ /ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi/ /mdza' med bskal ba bye ba ru/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /bcas pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor de/ /dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje 'chang//
10a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang ldan de de na bzhugs/ /nam mkha' i khams zhes bya ba der/ /til gyi gang bu gang zhig mthong/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pas yongs gang pa/ /yi ge de yi de kho na/ /brten par byas pa'i thabs nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas
10a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig /don dam nyid du rnam par gnas/ /gzhan du de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i/ /nyams su myong ba skye mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje thugs sam gzhan yang rung/ /dpal ldan
10a6(rgyud 'grel): bde chen rgyal po ni/ /'dus pa zhes bya'i byed po gang/ /de ni e baM 'di rab gnas/ /e baM zhes sogs rnam dag dang/ /sh+ru ta zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis/ /gsang ba'i tshig gnas nges par yang/ /rgyud kyi dang por brjod par bya/ /'di dang 'chad par 'gyur ba
10a7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /de ni byed pa por 'dod do/ /'di ni yi ge gnyis po ni/ /rgyud kyi dang por med mi 'dod/ /mchog tu dri med go 'phang ni/ /de ltar rnam dag shes gyur nas/ /dpal ldan 'dus par gang gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhi ba/ /dngos grub mchog gyur
10b1(rgyud 'grel): dang shes nas/ /rgyud pas khyab par brjod par bya/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhin gsungs pa/ /dam tshig spyod pa ston pa po/ /dag cing brjod du med pa yi/ /byang chub sems ni thams cad du/ /rab tu rgyas pa'i rgyud thams cad/ /lam nyer ston par rnam
10b2(rgyud 'grel): par gnas/ /chos 'byung yi ge zhi nyid du/ /brjod du med par rnam par gnas/ /de yi dbye ba mdza' med pas/ /sna tshogs khyab nas rnam par gnas/ /'di ni spun pa 'dra ba yi/ /de yi dbye ba kun spangs pa/ /de ni rnam dag ngo bo nyid/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni bdag
10b3(rgyud 'grel): gis brjod/ /dngos po med pa de nyid ni/ /thabs bcas pad+ma rdo rje skyes/ /dga' bral mchog dga' i bar nyid du/ /mtshon nas gang zhig rnam gnas par/ /rtag tu ? btang yid nyid kyis/ /gang zhig der gnas 'grub par 'gyur/ /sgrub po sgom pa ldan pa
10b4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /lha yi ye shes nyams myong 'gyur/ /don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi dam pa'i don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las bzhugs pa'i tshig nges par bstan
10b5(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/ /shes rab thabs ni rnam sgom pas/ /thugs ni rdo rje dran pa nyid/ /gsang ba las kyang gsang ba mchog/ rang gi lus la gnas pa yi/ /dag pa gang zhig shes
10b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas/ /gnas bzang por ni gnas par 'gyur/ /de ni bdag gi yang dag bshad/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rjes 'brangs pa'i/ /dngos grub bzang po sgrub pa'i phyir/ /mkha' dbyings lha yi gzhal yas na/ /ji lta ba bzhin yang dag gnas/ /bzang po
10b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sbyer byed pa/ /thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med/ /dang po'i las can sems can rnams/ /mtshon cing yid ches byed pa'o/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje kun sbyor ba'i/ /reg las ngo mtshar chen po nyid/ /bde ba gang zhig 'byung 'gyur te/ mchog tu dga' 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'o/ /de zad nas ni dga' bral te/ /gang gi mdza' na dga' bral can/ /rang gi ngo bo bstan med pa'i/ /bdag nyid cung zhig 'byung bar 'byung/ /dbang po kun las rnam grol zhing/ /gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid/ /khyab cing
11a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med pa yi/ /rtogs pa de ni go 'phang mchog /lha rdzas kun bzang zhes bya ba/ /dga' bral mdza' na rnam par gnas/ /mchog 'di sgrub po rnams kyi ni/ /grol ba'i gnas su rab tu grags/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa de nyid gang/ /bde gshegs dam
11a3(rgyud 'grel): pas gang gsungs pa/ /dngos med mchog tu rnam par dag /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa de nyid ni/ /bdag gis rgyas par bstan par bya/ /nam mkha' i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /zhes bya ba la sogs
11a4(rgyud 'grel): pas bstan par bya'o/ /gang zhig mkha' dbyings steng du rin chen 'gyur/ /bde ba kun gyi rang bzhin rnam par gnas/ /dbus su yon tan gyis brgyan sems gyur pa/ /de 'dir skyes bu'i sna rtse zhes byas bstan/ /rtog pa dang bcas sems zhes bya bas der/ /zla
11a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs dang sangs rgyas sku yis khyab/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku bde ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /kun rdzobs byang chub sems zhes de la brjod/ /kun rdzob byang chub sems ni nub gyur cing/ /der ni dga' bral zhes bya 'byung gyur nas/ /mnyam med sprul pa'i sku yi
11a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan gyur cing/ /sangs rgyas sna tshogs du ma spro bar byed/ /gnas skabs gang la dga' bral zhes bya ba'i/ /skad cig b+ha ga'i dbus su 'byung 'gyur te/ /yungs kar zhes bya'i ming gi rnam gnas pa/ /de la sprul pa'i sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /bde ba'i dngos
11a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dir longs spyod rdzogs sku dang/ /sprul pa'i sku yang 'gags shing bzhugs gyur pa/ /bdag med rdo rje rim gyis cho ga bzhin/ /kun rtog rnam par rtog pa nges par spangs/ /bdag med rdo rje shin tu dri ma med/ /de nas dga' bral bde ba rnam par spangs/ /mar
11b1(rgyud 'grel): la mar bzhag bzhin du skad cig gis/ /byang chub gnas dang lhan cig gcig tu byas/ /der ni dga' bral bde ba son gyur nas/ /bdag med rdo rje shin du brtan par bzhugs/ /der ni brjod med shes byar gang gnas pa/ /rnam dag byang chub go 'phang kun 'gro ba//
11b2(rgyud 'grel): shes bya'i bdag nyid dpag med mdangs ldan pa'i/ /de nyid bdag nyid lhan cig gzugs bsgom bya/ /dga' bral zhes bya gang gis brjod min pa/ /de yi mtshon rdzogs bsam mi khyab pa'i gzugs/ /kun tu dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /yid bzhin nor dang bum
11b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzang zhes pa/ /so so rang rig lugs bzhin rig gyur pas/ /don dam rnam dag rgyal ba rnams kyi sku/ /byang chub dam pa mchog gtso de nas bsgom/ /bzang po bde ba'i sar gyur kun 'gro ba/ /gsang gsum dri med rin chen de nyid bcas/ /rtag tu sems
11b4(rgyud 'grel): can don du lugs rig pas/ /dbang po gnyis sbyor mchog tu rab brtags nas/ /'od zer du ma de nas sgro bar bya/ /gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo khams gsum 'di/ /dngos po rang bzhin med par rnam par dpyad/ /de nyid de ni bzung ba la/ /'bad pa'i
11b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs gzhan spyod min pas/ /bla ma zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/ /shes nas blo dang ldan pas bsgom/ /bdag nyid dri med zhi ba yi/ /de nyid de dang ldan gyur pas/ /las kyi phyag rgyas bsgom pa yang/ /'dir ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /las kyi phyag rgya
11b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam ldan pas/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /bden pa gsung bas mngon sum du/ /'di 'dra'i bsgom pa gang gsungs pa/ dang po'i las can sems can la/ /las kyi phyag rgya gang spangs nas/ /byang chub sems ni rab bstan pa/ /gzhan gyi mtshon
11b7(rgyud 'grel): pas mi 'thob ste/ /dang po'i las pas rig bya ba/ /thog ma bar mdza' dri med pa/ /gnas te gzhan du nus ma yin/ /de lta'i de nyid mchog zhi ba/ /mkha' dbyings zhes byar gnas pa ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor dang/ /yang dag rang bzhin
12a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis thob 'gyur/ /kun tu 'gro ba de nyid ni/ /dang po'i las pas bzung ba'i phyir/ /mkha' dbyings pho brang bzang po ru/ /sgrub po mchog gis thob par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das mchog gang yin te/ /bde ba'i ngo bo dngos med pa//
12a2(rgyud 'grel): de ni phyag rgya la brten nas/ /rang gi rig pa'i ngo bor gnas/ /shes rab thabs dag rnam bsgoms pas/ /de ltar de nyid shes byas la/ /chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid/ /ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas/ /ngo mtshar mchog gyur rdo rje can/ /de yi tshe na sgrub
12a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /rang lus thabs dang ldan pa'am/ /yang na las kyi phyag rgyas so/ /las kyi phyag rgyas pad+mar gnas/ /mtshon du med par gang gnas pa/ /gong nas gong du bsgom pa yis/ /zhi dpal rdo rje 'dzin par mtshon/ /de ni bdag gis thams cad bstan/ /gzhan yang
12a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bstan par bya/ /las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ /de nyid ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /phyag rgya med par lha rdzas nyid/ /de bzhin sgrub pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang mchog /mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya/ /las
12a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag rgya khro rgyu can/ /ye shes phyag rgya yang de bzhin/ /rnam rtog mang ba spangs byas la/ /phyag rgya chen po rnam sgom bya/ /rnam par g.yengs pa kun 'byung ba'i/ /bud med phyag rgya rnam spangs la/ /rang lus thabs dang ldan pa yi/ /phyag rgya chen po bstan par bya//
12a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rig pa'i lha rdzas de/ /phyag rgya chen po mchog tu dge/ tha mal lus la brten nas gnas/ /shes rab chung bas mthong mi 'gyur/ /mi 'gyur ba yi rang lus de/ /mchog gcig gis ni shes par 'gyur/ /bla ma'i bka' drin gnang ba la/ /ji lta
12a7(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin rnam par gnas/ /rtswa shing 'khri shing la sogs la/ /kun tu gnas par gyur pa yang/ /mi yi thabs dang bral ba yis/ /me ni mthong bar 'gyur ma yin/ /thabs dang bral na nam du yang/ /lha rdzas yon tan kun 'byung ba/ /gnyug ma'i lus
12b1(rgyud 'grel): po gnas na yang/ /shes rab de bzhin mthong mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar bud shing khu ba dang/ /til la til mar ji bzhin pa/ /de bzhin lus la thams cad du/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa gnas/ /lha rdzas mchog de thams cad la/ /rnam par gnas par shes
12b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis skyed byed pa/ /shes rab lha mo bla na med/ /khams gsum ma lus pa 'di dag /gang gis thams cad gsal byed pa/ /mya ngan 'das pa gnas dngos kyi/ /thog ma bar mdza' rnam par mdzes/ /de ltar shes nas 'bad pa yi/ /shes
12b3(rgyud 'grel): rab pha rol phyin zhi ba/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dbang phyug mchog gis khyab par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sems la 'dod gyur pa/ /da ni de nas bsgom par bya/ /thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /de dang
12b4(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig tshol byed pas/ /de nyid bdag gis rtag tu rig /nyin dang mtshan du bsgom 'gyur na/ /'di ni thob 'gyur the tshom med/ /smyon pa'i gzugs la brten nas ni/ /bsal por skye ba smad byed cing/ /thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/ /byang chub
12b5(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa bsgom par bya/ /mchog tu mya ngan 'das gsungs pa/ /dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /rang lus de nyid blo ldan gyis/ /de dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /dngos grub kun sbyin sgrub pa'i thabs/ phung po lnga yi bdag lus nyid/ /ji ltar
12b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba gnas gyur pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po rtogs byas pas/ /dpa' bo ji ltar rdzogs 'gyur ba/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i rang gi lus/ /shin tu gsang ba bdag gis bshad/ /blo ldan dngos po mi bsgom zhing/ /dngos med
12b7(rgyud 'grel): pha rol ring du spangs/ /gcig gis rtag par 'dzin gyur cing/ /gzhan dag gis ni stong nyid du'o/ /rtag dang chad pa'i sbyor ba las/ /mchog tu 'dzin pa zad pa gang/ /ye shes ci zhig 'byung 'gyur ba/ /thog ma dbus mdza' dri ma med/ /gtso bo rtag
13a1(rgyud 'grel): pa mchog tu zhi/ /rgyu dang dpe ni rnam spangs pa/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /rtag tu 'byung zhing 'gyur ba med/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa nyid/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /der gnas bsgom dang ldan gyur pa//
13a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyis kyang spyod yul min/ /de mi bgrod dang bgrod bya med/ /bgrod par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med/ /sgom dang bsgom bya sgom pa po/ /don dam par na yod ma yin/ /dpe las 'das shing brjod du med/ /bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs//
13a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma med cing rdul dang bral/ /mya ngan 'das zhes de la bshad/ /gang la mchog ces brjod bya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po mngon par gnas/ /lha rdzas longs spyod grol steng ba/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang mchog /bzang po'i gnas de sems can la
13a4(rgyud 'grel): skal ba ji bzhin rab tu bstan/ /gcig nyid gnyis su rnam par gyur/ /bsam pa'i dbye bas mchog nyid de/ /lha rdzas mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs/ /dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /bud med skyes ba sogs gzugs kyis/ /thams cad du ni rnam par gnas
13a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang po las 'das zhi ba gang/ /rjod med kun tu 'gro ba mchog /'phel zhing 'grib las rnam grol ba/ /dpal ldan bde chen zhes brjod pa/ /cung zad rdzas su 'du shes gang/ /thams cad de las kun tu 'byung/ /khams gsum pa yi lam
13a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang po/ /kun tu de ni rnam par gnas/ /de ni dngos grub sa bon te/ /dngos grub rnams kyi go 'phang mchog /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog ste/ /bde ba can zhes mngon par brjod/ /lha dang lha mi na mir bcas pa/ /thams cad 'di las
13a7(rgyud 'grel): nges par 'byung/ /khams gsum ma lus pa 'di dag /thams cad bde ba nyid du gnas/ /gang gis gzugs ni shes min zhing/ /gang zhig tshig dang blo spangs la/ /sgra dang dri dang ro las 'das/ /blo yi yul las gang 'das pa/ /de ni 'jig
13b1(rgyud 'grel): rten las 'das pa/ /mchog tu bden pa'i gzugs gang zhig /rang gis dbang gis 'jug 'gyur ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur/ /gsang sngags bye ba grangs med kyang/ /de yi nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bden pa gsungs pa'i lung gis 'ba' / /bde
13b2(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa'i rim ston pa'i/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/ /de ltar de nges shes byas la/ /thabs gang gis ni de yi dngos/ /mchog tu brjod med gang thob pa/ /blo ldan de nyid rang lus la/ /sngags pas de nyid sgrub par bya/ /dngos po med pa dang bsres la/
13b3(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig sems dang ldan pa yi/ /thabs bzang po dang ldan byas nas/ /yang dang yang du ral bar bya/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs pas/ /dus mi ring par 'grub par 'gyur/ /shin tu sbas pa'i rab sbyin dang/ /rig pa yis ni gang shes dang/ /'dod
13b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pa'i/ dag pa'i bdag nyid gang sgom bya/ /gsang ba grub pa la gnas pa'i/ /dngos grub des ni gdon mi za/ /las kyi phyag rgya ldan pa'am/ /yang na phyag rgya chen po yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs gyur pa/ /'di ni chos
13b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid mchog yin no/ /snying po'i ye shes gcig bsdus pa/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag med gnas 'di ma gtogs pa'i/ /rnam dag dngos grub gzhan dag med/ /rnam par mi rtog dmigs med pa/ /gang las sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur
13b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /shes rab lha mo bla na med/ /'di na pha rol zhes byar brjod/ /gal te shes nas sgoms gyur na/ /sems can kun gyi grol ster 'gyur/ /sngar bstan cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /dag pa'i de nyid gang bsgoms pa/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam
13b7(rgyud 'grel): dag pas/ /bdag nyid rdo rje kun las skyes/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /tha mal pa yi lus spangs nas/ /lha rdzas nga rgyal ldan yid kyis/ /thabs dang yang dag ldan pa dang/ /ting 'dzin
14a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog la rnam gnas nas/ /pad+ma rdo rje tshig bzhin du/ /de ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /gang zhig phyag rgya chen ldan pas/ /bde ba chen po myong gyur pa/ /ye shes bdud rtsi mchog bzang po/ /de ni brjod par nus pa yin//
14a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gis rig pa'i de nyid de/ /gzhan gyis brjod par nus mi 'gyur/ /gus dang bsgom pas rtogs 'gyur gyi/ /de ni gzhan du rtogs mi nus/ /de nyid shes nas nyin mtshan du/ /gus pas bsgom par bya ba yin/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i go
14a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phang mchog /bde ba zhi ba bla med deng/ /der ni gus pa'i stobs nyid dang/ /bsgom pa'i stobs kyis gang sprul pa/ /der ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs/ /kun dga' las byung ci yang mchog /spro zhing sdud par byed pa can/ /gsal por yud
14a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis byung gyur pa/ /sa 'og sa bla sa stengs 'di/ /rgyu dang rgyu min snang bar byed/ /de nyid bsgoms pa'i stobs nyid kyis/ /thabs dang shes rab dngos zhi ba/ /nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa/ /stong
14a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid ye shes las byung zhes/ /gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid/ /rnam pa kun tu mchog ldan zhing/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /rnam dag ye shes sgyu ma'i dngos/ /gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /sgra dang dri dang ro las 'das/ /de
14a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin reg pa rnam par spangs/ /ting 'dzin ye shes mig nyid kyis/ /mchog gcig pu de mthong bar 'gyur/ /bzang po grib ma'i sgyu 'dra yis/ /'du byed bzang po dang ldan pa/ /me yis thag pa bsregs pa bzhin/ /nyon mongs 'ching ba
14a7(rgyud 'grel): las grol ba/ /rnam pa sna tshogs lus rnams ni/ /ye shes rlabs kyi phreng ba spros/ /dbang po'i gzhu dang 'dra ba'i sku/ /de nyid bsgoms pas thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i nus pa dang/ /dam tshig rnams ni bskyed byas pas
14b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba yis kyang brjod med pa'i/ /de 'dra'i gzugs ni thob par 'gyur/ /gang du lus ngag sems med pa'i/ /gnas gang kun 'gro mchog gyur pa'i/ /der ni yang dag bstan dbang gis/ /rang bzhin bsgom par gyur la ltos/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar
14b2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /e ma'o zhi ba dbang po las/ /e ma'o mchog tu zhi ba nyid/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul yin/ /lha yi rnal 'byor mchog nyid kyis/ /rim gyis 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de nas spyod pa spyad par
14b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /nyon mongs kun dang bral ba'i gnas/ /brjod dang brjod bya rnam spangs la/ /'bad pa nyid kyi mngon sum du/ /sgrub pa pos ni yang dang yang/ /brtan pa'i sems kyis nges par yang/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa spyad par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal/
14b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis/ /nyes pa thams cad rnams spangs la/ /lha rdzas gar dang rgod sogs kyis/ /ji ltar skyo ba mi skye bar/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa la mos pas/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gsang ba spyad/ /brtul zhugs dang ldan der gnas nas/ /
14b5(rgyud 'grel): der gtad bsgom pa dang ldan pas/ /nyon mongs thams cad mthar byas la/ /go 'phang mchog ni 'grub par bya/ /rgyun tu mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /bla ma'i zhabs la rab gnas pas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub bzang ster
14b6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /de ni thams cad bdag gis bshad/ /don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi dam pa'i don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las mngon
14b7(rgyud 'grel): par byang chub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //dang po'i las pa'i sems can gyis/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa nyid/ /cung zhig rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /de nas da ni bshad par bya//
15a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan 'dus par yongs gsal bar/ /'gro ba'i mgon pos gang gsungs pa/ /gong ma gong ma'i lam nyid kyis/ /bsgom par bya ba bzhi po nyid/ /dang po yi ge dgod par bya/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pas/ /sgrub po'i
15a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang pos bsgom bya ba/ /gnyis pa rang gi rang bzhin nyid/ /gsum pa bzang po mchog gyur pa/ /ye shes phyag rgya rnam par bsgom/ /bzhi pa gong mar gang gsungs pa/ /phyag rgya chen por rnam par bsgom/ /de ltar de nyid bzhi po ni/ /'di dag la ni yang
15a3(rgyud 'grel): dag gnas/ /bsgom pa dag gis gang bstan pa/ /de dag bdag gis so sor bshad/ /yi ge dgong pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsgom par bya ba gang gsungs pa/ /sems can dang po'i las can rnams/ /gzhug par bya phyir gang gsungs pa/ /ji lta ba bzhin
15a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam gnas pa'i/ /dang po re zhig bstan par bya/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lam nyid du/ /gcig nyid rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/ /mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yi/ /ye shes mchog tu dge ba nyid/ /ji ltar bstan par shes gyur nas/ /rtag tu gnas
15a5(rgyud 'grel): ta 'dir bshad bya/ /gong ma gong ma'i rim nyid kyis/ /thugs kyi rdo rje gang gsungs pa/ /yi ge dgong pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid bdag /bzang po nam mkha' i mtshan nyid can/ /kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yi/ /kun 'gro'i ye
15a6(rgyud 'grel): shes rnam dag pa/ /thog ma bar mdza' dri ma med/ /chos rnams kyis ni ngo bo gang/ /so so'i gzugs su gang gnas pa/ /bdag med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /'bad pa nyid kyi so sor brtag /spros pa thams cad las grol ba'i/ /gzugs
15a7(rgyud 'grel): gang mchog ni zhi ba nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo shes/ /ye shes 'di la 'di rab grags/ /gnas bzang po der gnas nas ni/ /nyon mongs thams cad rnam spangs la/ /sems can rnams kyi don bya gang/ /gzugs kyi mchog nyid
15b1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs par bya/ /thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yi/ /shes rab dang ni bcas pa'i gzugs/ /gsal po rnam pas byung gyur pa/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /bzung med mchog tu zhi ba
15b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /dang zhing skyon bral dri ma med/ /phyag rgya chen por rjes rig bya/ /gzugs de las ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de yi gzugs brnyan ltar byed pa/ /sgyu ma'i rjes grub bzang po gang/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya gzugs ldan pa'i/ /dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin
15b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /gzugs brnyan yid kyi rang bzhin nyid/ /yon tan mdza' med 'byung 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi mkhyen pa'i/ /dpal ldan me long ming can du/ /ye shes de la brjod par bya/ /dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du/ /der ni
15b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa'i ye shes gang/ /de yi rang bzhin rnal 'byor ldan/ /mnyam nyid ye shes zhes brjod do/ /rgyas pa spyan zhes bya ba gang/ /lha rdzas bud med dkyil 'khor ro/ /'bad pas so sor rtogs gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
15b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /bdag med gnas kyi rnal 'byor pa/ /dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /lha rdzas nam mkha' i khams kyi ngor/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi pho brang mchog /phra mo'i rnal 'byor sbyor gcig pas/ /ji srid de la rtogs 'gyur bas/ /rtog pa cung zhig
15b6(rgyud 'grel): bskul gyur ba/ /de srid de ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag /srid gsum gnas na gang gnas pa/ /gang zhig gnas pa de dag kun/ /til gyi gang bu bzhin 'dir mthong/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /de bzhin
15b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pas yongs gang ba/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'od chen po/ /bzang po de ni mthong gyur nas/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyi gnas bzang por/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni brtag par bya/ /der ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /da ltar bzhugs
16a1(rgyud 'grel): dang gang 'das dang/ /gang dang 'byung bar gyur ba dag /de dag kun gyi gnas mchog ni/ /dag cing dang pa dri med de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchod/ /ye shes de ni mdor bsdus na/ /so sor rtog
16a2(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes byar brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang du/ /'bad pas so sor rtog pa nyid/ /de yi phyi nas nyams len pa/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rnam 'phrul pas/ /lha yi rnal 'byor kun 'gengs shing/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can
16a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /sa la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag spro/ /gang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor ni/ /der ni nges par sgrub par bya/ /rtag dang mi skyod rin chen tshe/ /rigs la sogs par gang gnas pa/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i
16a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyis/ /rig ma'i skyes bu bsgom par bya/ /bzang po'i rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya chen po rjes rig pa/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar bas/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa'i/ /ye
16a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rlabs kyi phreng ba spros/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes zhes/ /mchog tu gyur pa de la brjod/ /gang la rgyal ba rnams 'byung bas/ /gang du phyag rgya byin rlabs pas/ /ting 'dzin lnga po 'dir gnas pas/ /gang zhig yang dag 'byung
16a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bas/ /mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yi/ /ye shes zhes ni 'di rab grags/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas par/ /de yi khyad par brjod pa yin/ /lha dgong rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas/ /khams drug pa
16a7(rgyud 'grel): dag mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rgyud las gsungs pa'i 'khor los sgyur/ /rim gyi yum gyur bzhi po dang/ /khro bo sems dpa' de dang mtshungs/ /'khor bcas pa yi byang chub sems/ /bcu drug dag dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis
16b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /de bzhin dpe byad brgyad cur ldan/ /mngon par byang chub rnam lnga zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa yin/ /rtag dang mi skyod rin chen gyis/ /rigs la sogs par yang dag gnas/ /de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rgyas
16b2(rgyud 'grel): gang ba'i/ /dang po'i las can sems can gyi/ /bsgom par bya bar gsungs pa yin/ /'khor lo'i rim par bsgom bcas pa/ /'di ni phyi rol zhes bshad de/ /yi ge dgod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dang po nyid du gang gnas pa'o/ /sems can dang po'i las
16b3(rgyud 'grel): can la/ /las kyi phyag rgya bsgoms pa yi/ /rnam par gnas pa'i pad gnas gang/ /gong ma mchog gi go 'phang yin/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bsgoms te/ /de nyid mchod pa rab tu brtag /de nyid dpal ldan 'dus par ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas
16b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gsungs/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa nyung ldan pas/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /'di ni bsgom pa gnyis pa ste/ /rang gi ngo bo yin zhes grags/ /gsum pa de ni bstan pa ste/ /nang gi go 'phang bsgom pa yin/ rnam pa kun ni mchog ldan pa'i/ /ye
16b5(rgyud 'grel): shes phyag rgya rab brtag pa'o/ /bzhi pa gong na med pa'i rgyu/ /mngon par byang chub byed pa po/ /phyag rgya chen po rnam bsgom pa/ /de yi gong na gzhan med pa'o/ /dbang po kun las rnam grol zhing/ /'byung ba'i spyod pa sbas gyur pa/ /zhi zhing grub pa myur ster
16b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /bla ma'i zhal las rab gnas pa'o/ /gcig min du ma ma yin zhing/ /rlabs med snang ba med pa dang/ /thams cad kyis ni bde gnas pa/ /mchog tu dga' ba byed pa po/ /rang sems tsam du shes pa bya/ /nyon mongs tshogs ni 'gag 'gyur zhing//
16b7(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i shes rab gyur pa'i lus/ /de ltar rgyud kyi rim shes nas/ /lha yi rnal 'byor mchog nyid dang/ /gong ma gong ma'i lam nyid kyis/ /drang po min pas gang 'ongs pa/ /de dag thams cad des btang la/ /rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya/ /phyag
17a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen por 'bad pa yis/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /grub pa thams cad rab sbyin zhing/ /thabs kyi mchog dang bcas par ni/ /de dag bsgom pa dang ldan na/ /tshe 'di nyid las grub par 'gyur/ /gang
17a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig sems ni bla med pas/ /skye ba med par gang rtogs pa/ /de yi dngos med shes rab ste/ /thabs kyi rab tu bskul ba nyid/ /de ltar de nyid shes pa la/ /phyag rgya chen po rnam par bsgom/ /de nas thabs dang bcas gyur pas/ /gang 'dod pa
17a3(rgyud 'grel): yi brtul zhugs bya/ /sangs rgyas gos med zhi ba 'am/ /de bzhin nor gyi bdag po 'am/ /yang na brtul zhugs chen po'am/ /yang na sems la 'dod pa'o/ /bshad par gyur pa shes byas la/ /brtul zhugs mo yin shes pa nyid//
17a4(rgyud 'grel): blo dang ldan pas shes bya ba/ /rgyu las gzhan dag bshad pa yi/ /dor ba'i brtul zhugs kun mi bya/ /mchog tu gyur pa yin par 'dod/ /de las yid la gang 'dod pa/ /spyad pa med par spyad par bya/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rjes su 'brel
17a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa/ /lam mchog dpe med 'bad pas shes byas la/ /brtan pa'i blo yi dam pa de nyid gcig /phyi rol dri ma ma lus spangs byas nas/ /bde ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan gnyug ma'i gzugs/ /'du 'dzi dri ma spangs la bsgom par bya/ /ye shes
17a6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin rjes 'brel nyin mtshan du/ /sangs rgyas thar pa'i rgyur gyur bstan pa nyid/ /dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan dga' ba'i sems/ /rtag tu byang chub la bzhugs bsgom pa'i sems 'brel ba/ /dri ma ma lus zad par gyur pa yis/ /'khor ba'i
17a7(rgyud 'grel): 'chid ba rnams ni spang bar bya/ /bde ba'i go 'phang mchog gyur brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom/ /rtag tu goms par byas pa'i rnal 'byor dang/ /bdag nyid de nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /dri ma'i rab rib spangs dag mthong ba bzang/ /gcig
17b1(rgyud 'grel): tu gsang ba'i sa phyogs yon tan rgya'i gzhir gyur ri 'am khyim stong dam/ /skyed cha la rnying dang brag phug dur khrod dag gams phug nyams dga' 'am/ /de ltar dri med byas pa'i sa phyogs dag tu bzang po mtshon cing bzung/ /yul gyi bde ba
17b2(rgyud 'grel): skyed byed de nyid rin chen rdo rje can gyi 'du 'dzi spangs la bsgom/ /rnal 'byor pa ni thams cad kyang/ /de nyid lam la rab chags pas/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /de ni 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa lam gyis ni//
17b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur ba yin/ /skye ba du ma dag gis kyang/ /'dir ni gcig gis 'byung bar bshad/ /de ltar the tshom med shes nas/ /shes rab thabs kyi bsgom pa yis/ /phyi rol rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /bya ba'i bye brag yongs
17b4(rgyud 'grel): spangs la/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i lam 'bras bcas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub rab ster ba/ /thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yi/ /blo ldan gsang ba grub par spyad/ /yul dang dus dang gza' rnams dang/ /rgyu skar phyi rol dkyil 'khor
17b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /med par gsang ba rdo rje can/ /sgrub pa'i thabs 'di bshad par bya/ /nges pa brtul zhugs gso sbyong sogs/ /yi ge brjod pa'i bsgom pa yis/ /'di ltar dngos grub gang brtags pa/ /spyod pa dka' bas brtags pa yin/ /yi ge
17b6(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /kha dog dbye bas mtshon bya ba/ /sems can kun gyi gsang dbang gis/ /dpal ldan gsang bar gang gsungs pa/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni gang gsungs pa/ /rigs nyid so sor so so dang/ /phyag rgya'i dbye ba sna tshogs
17b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /de bzhin sngags kyi dbye ba rnams/ /mchod dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ /rigs kyi dbye ba du ma nyid/ /ting 'dzin dbye ba phye ba yi/ /lha rnams su ni brtags pa dang/ /dus nges pa yi bye brag rnams/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yi//
18a1(rgyud 'grel): spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang/ /sbyor ba du ma nyid dang ni/ /'dod chags la sogs dri ma rnams/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi gang gnas pa/ /'khor bar rab tu 'chi ba byed pa'i/ /khams gsum pa yi bstan pa'i lam/ /de kun
18a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos pa med gyur pa'i/ /ye shes mchog gi rnam 'phrul yin/ /rtog med rnam par dag pa ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu kun tu song/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang/ /de bzhin gzhan yang yod ma yin/ /dang po'i rnal 'byor ngo bo yis/ /ji srid
18a3(rgyud 'grel): kun la rnam par spyod/ /chos dang chos min mtshan nyid kyi/ /thams cad mngon du brtags pa can/ /bdag med gnas kyi sbyor ba yis/ /ji srid brtan par ma brtags pa'o/ /rnam par mi rtog gnas pa med/ /dag cing par bzhin dri ma med//
18a4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa/ /khams gsum 'di dag thams cad nyid/ /lam gyi so sor brtags byas nas/ /phung po'i bden pa yod ma yin/ /su zhig gis ni so sor rtog /'dir ni gang la brtag par bya/ /'bad pas de nyid de kho na/ /ji srid
18a5(rgyud 'grel): bar du brtag byas pa/ /de srid thams cad 'od gsal te/ /rnam dag rang bzhin dri ma med/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing/ /spros pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang rtogs min na/ /skye bo gzhan gyis smos ci dgos/ /rtag dang
18a6(rgyud 'grel): chad pa las grol zhing/ /kun 'gro mchog tu zhi ba nyid/ /dngos med snang ba med pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpas phyag byas pa'o/ /yon tan med cing nga rgyal med/ /mtshan ma med cing sgrib pa med/ /'grib dang 'phel las rnam gral ba/ /ngag gi
18a7(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul dag las 'das/ /de la 'gro dang 'ong ba dang/ /'dir ni 'gro ba po 'ga' med/ /sgom dang sgom pa sgom bya ngag /don dam par na yod ma yin/ /de nyid mchog gyur gcig pu nyid/ /byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod/ /dbye ba sna tshogs
18b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam mi khyab/ /bye ba snyed du rab rgyas pa/ /bzang po kun 'gro rnam dag ste/ /ming gcig nyid kyi gnas pa min/ /sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis/ /khams gsum kun tu rab tu khyab/ /zhi ba rnams kyi de nyid mchog /rig byed smra ba tshangs pa
18b2(rgyud 'grel): zer/ /sangs rgyas pa rnams byang chub mchog /gos med pa rnams srog ces zer/ /grangs can rig pa can la sogs/ /dbye ba gang zhig rnam brtag pa/ /de dag brjod pa ga la nus/ /sna tshogs nyid la khyab gnas nas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
18b3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo rnams/ /des ni smra bar nus ma yin/ /bzang po'i dbye bas gang gnas pa/ /yang dag mdza' nyid du mar bstan/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mi rtog pa/ /rdo rje can mchog gang yin te/ /khams gsum ma lus 'di dag ni/ /thams cad 'di pas kun
18b4(rgyud 'grel): tu 'byung/ /zhi zhing dag pa'i gnas gang de/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /brjod med kun 'gro'i gnas yin te/ /'di kun de yin ma 'phrul yin/ /cung zad dngos grub mtshan nyid gang/ /thams cad de la rnam par gnas/ /spros pa'i
18b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis ngo bo nyid/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par skor/ /khams gsum rnam dag 'di thams cad/ /sa bon shes rab las byung kun/ /mtshan ma med cing mchog tu zhi/ /ye shes sgyu ma'i rjes 'jug pa/ /mang po dag ni gcig pa nyid/ /ji
18b6(rgyud 'grel): srid yod pa'i bud shing kun/ /stong pa'i me yi ma bsreg par/ /sgrub pa po yi ji ltar mthong/ /lta ba'i bud shing phung po rnams/ /stong nyid me yi bsreg byas nas/ /'dir ni mnyam nyid la gnas na/ /de bzhin nyid kyi me yang 'gag /bsam
18b7(rgyud 'grel): gtan shes rab mig sman gyis/ /ji srid bskur ba ma byas pa/ /de srid lta ngan rab rib rnams/ /dri ma med par ji ltar 'gyur/ /dngos po brten dang g.yo ba kun/ /'bad pas de ltar rnam sbyangs nas/ /bdag med go 'phang la gnas la/ /da nas
19a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa brtsam par bya/ /bdag gi gang du gang smras pa'i/ /lha'i rnal 'byor shes byas la/ /de ni 'dad pas bsgom byas na/ /'di ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas nges par sgrub par byed pa yi/ /cho ga rkang gnyis
19a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis nges par gang bstan pa/ /spyod pa du mas mdzes shing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i rgyud du gsal/ /de srid de ni ma bstan yon tan ldan pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar/ /shes nas mkhas pa rnams kyis spyod pa
19a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan cho ga bzhin du sgrub pa rtsom/ /don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las mngon par byang chub pa lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
19a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i thabs/ /yang dag spyod pa sbas gyur pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnam par g.yeng ba'i dgra gsod cing/ /dge bzang
19a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i sgrub thabs kyis/ /rol mo'i las kyi sgrub par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni mchog bzang po/ /dpal ldan 'dus par rjes 'gro bas/ /phyag rgya chen po dbang bskur nas/ /bzang po dngos grub rab tu bsgrub/ /de bzhin 'dod
19a6(rgyud 'grel): chags rab gnas nas/ /lha'i rnal 'byor der gnas pas/ /gsang ba grub par rab gnas na/ /sgrub po gang phyir 'grub par 'gyur/ /bzang po ye shes goms byas shing/ /spyod pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /gnyis pa thams cad las
19a7(rgyud 'grel): grol bas/ /gang du 'dod pa de ru gnas/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ /gsang ba grub pa mdor bsdus nas/ /dngos grub rnams kyi go 'phang mchog /de ni bdag gis bshad par bya/ /gang zhig skye ba bu ma yi/ /dngos grub thob par
19b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod 'gyur ba/ /des ni gsang ba'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /gnyis pa thams cad spang bar bya/ /dge ba thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyud/ /'dus pa zhes bya'i dbang bskur bas/ /bzang po dngos grub sbyin byed pa'i/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur
19b2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /de nas rang 'dod la gnas shing/ /dang po'i rnal 'byor gcig gtad pas/ /bla ma'i zhal nas 'byung ba yis/ /rnal 'byor rin chen goms par bya/ /dpal ldan bde ba'i mgon po yis/ /mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa yis//
19b3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu sbas pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /de nas yang dag bshad bar bya/ /gzugs bzang yon tan 'byung 'gyur ba/ /phyag rgya 'bad pas rnyed gyur nas/ /rgyud kyi spyod pa dang ldan pas/ /slob dpon la ni dbul bar bya/ /phyag rgyar bcas pa'i rdo rje
19b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /gus pa'i 'o ma mar me dang/ /dri dang phreng ba rgyan chen gyis/ /de nas blo dang ldan pas mchod/ /de la gus pas mchod bya zhing/ /blo dang ldam pas cho ga bzhin/ /bla ma phyag rgyar ldan mthong nas/ /rtog pa'i cho ga'i rim pa bzhin/ /bus mo g.yas pa'i lha ra ni/ /sa 'bar?
19b5(rgyud 'grel): tu btsugs byas la/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can/ /cho ga bzhin du brjod par bya/ /kun mkhyen sa kun dbang phyug pa/ /kun gyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i bdag /thugs kyi bdag po dpa' bo che/ /dpa' bo gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'byung po kun bdag
19b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid gnas/ /rdo rje ye shes gsum 'byung ba/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs mthar mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i sku/ /chos bdag med pa las
19b7(rgyud 'grel): byung ba/ /ye shes bdud rtsi phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam sbyong ba/ /dpa' chen ye shes chen po ba/ /gzi brjid chen po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag chen dpa' bo chen po ste/ /stobs chen mchod
20a1(rgyud 'grel): pa chen por/ /'dud mthar byed pa dpa' chen po/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod/ /skye dang gnas dang sdud pa yi/ /byed pa por 'gyur 'gro ba'i gtso/ /dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin nyid/ /ngo mtshar mchog gyur phyag
20a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod/ /ye shes rnam shes zhes bya ba'i/ /lam du 'jug 'gyur phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /pad+ma las byung phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /cho ga bzhin du gsol btab nas/ /sems can kun la phan 
20a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas/? snyan pa'i tshig ni rjod par bya/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/ /ye shes bla med bya ba shes/ /de ltar dbang skur rin chen gyis/ /mgon pos bdag ni dbang skur mdzod/ /dpal ldan bde ba'i mgon po yis/ /dpal ldan chos kyi rdo rje la//
20a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba de nyid bstan pa ltar/ /mgon pos de bzhin bka' drin gsol/ /sdug bsngal kun gyi gnas gyur pa/ /dmyal ba nas ni gtso bos drongs/ /sdug bsngal thams cad thar mdzad pa/ /mgon med bdag la thugs rje mdzod/ /khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs
20a5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /gtso bo gzhan la skyabs ma mchis/ /'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen gyis/ /de phyir sangs rgyas mchog gnang mdzod/ /gsol ba 'debs pa'i cho ga mchog /bzang po de ltar thob gyur nas/ /snying rje slob ma la bskyed ni/ /bla ma dpal ldan yon
20a6(rgyud 'grel): tan mtshos/ /bzhin ni rab tu dang gyur pas/ /rjes su rtse phyir rab dga' bas/ /gsang zhing mchog tu gsang gyur pas/ /dam tshig de nas thob par bya/ /bu yi srog chags gsang bar bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /ma byin par yang blang bar
20a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /gzhan gyi chung ma brten par bya/ /'di ni cho ga mdor bsdus pa'i/ /phyag rgya chen po des brten pas/ /'di ni rtag tu bya ba yin/ /dam tshig bzhi po 'di nyid ni/ /bzang po khyod kyi rtag tu brten/ /de ltar dam tshig thos gyur nas/ /bzang po dngos grub
20b1(rgyud 'grel): kun ster ba/ /phyag rgya dang ni ldan gyur pa'i/ /slob dpon thugs rje ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje pad+ma snyoms 'jug cing/ /yang dag rab sbyin la gnas nas/ /lha yi rnal 'byor skyed gyur pas/ /ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas/ /'bad pas gsung gi rdo rje yi/ /pad+ma
20b2(rgyud 'grel): pas byung blang bar bya/ /khrag dang khu ba rnams bsres la/ /slob dpon mchog gis mchod pa'i phyir/ /mi yi thod par blangs nas ni/ /bshang gci rdo rje char/ /?? de nas slob ma kun gyis la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs nas/ /gnyug ma'i?
20b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang bcas pas/ /dam tshig de ni sbyin par bya/ /dngos grub kun gyi gnas gyur cing/ /sangs rgyas byin brlabs lam gyur pas/ /rdo rje slob ma de nyid rig /chogs de ltar gtang byas pas/ /rang gi phyag rgya dam tshig ni/ /bzang ldan rgyud nas gsungs pa nyid/ /shin tu
20b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma/ /rtag tu byang chub sems la dpa' / /mA ma kI ltar yongs dag pa/ /rab dga' gos ni rnam spangs ma/ /'di ni yang dag mchod byas nas/ /phyag rgya'i pad+ma rnam gnas pa/ /sngon bzhin spyod pa'i slob ma ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa gnyis pa la//
20b5(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis brjod pa'i tshig gis ni/ /dbyangs ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /rnga yab rgyal mtshan gdugs las so/ /phreng ba tsandan la sogs mchod/ /phyag rgya'i dbang bskur rin chen gyis/ /dam tshig la gnas brten par bzhag /khams gsum pa yi dbang bskur
20b6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /slob mas thal mo sbyar byas la/ /de la rjes gnang sbyin bya ste/ /rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ /chos kyi rdo rje gang 'dod par/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /rdo rje sems
20b7(rgyud 'grel): dpas gsungs gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas mchog gis bshad par gyis/ /de ltar bstan pas slob ma la/ /yang dag par sbyin rab sbas dang/ /phyag rgya rin chen dbang bskur dang/ /rjes su gnang ba'i khyad par gyis/ /rgyud kyi don la nges byas nas/ /rdo rje theg pa'i rim
21a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstan/ /sems can mchog gis bshad par gyis/ /'di lta bu yi dbang bskur bas/ /sgrub pa'i nges pa byas gyur nyid/ /de nyid bsgom pas ngal gyur pas/ /nges par mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /
21a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges byas nas/ /lugs bcas rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya sgrub/ /lugs bcas rim pa de nyid nges pa'i blo ldan sgom gyur rdo rje can/ /'dod pa'i yon tan bzang po rab dga' i yid can
21a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub don kun sgrub/ /mo yis tshe 'di nyid la 'grub 'gyur dpal ldan gsang grub la gnas nas/ /thabs bzangs dag dang ldan pas brjod med mchog gyur go 'phang ngam par 'gro /de ltar thams cad shes byas la /rim pa ji bzhin gnas byas te/ /dpal ldan
21a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i rim pa yes/ /ji ltar yang dag bstan pa ltar/ /de nas rang 'dod la gnas pa'i/ /gsang ba grub pa la gnas pa'i/ /dngos grub bzang po la 'bad pas/ /rigs kun la ni kun tu spyod/ /yang na phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /'bod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas/ /rgod
21a5(rgyud 'grel): dang phreng la sogs bzang po/ /sems ni spro bar byed pa can/ /chags med gsang ba grub pa yis/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs la/ /mchog tu dga' ba spel bar byed/ /don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par
21a6(rgyud 'grel): sdud par byed pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las sgrub pa phyag rgya chen po mngon par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //gsang ba'i spyod pa dge 'byung zhing/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed la//
21a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yeng ba'i sgra rnam zad byed pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /rkang pa rkyang ba spangs nas ni/ /'khor ba'i mngag gzhug dor nas ni/ /rtag tu brtson dang ldan yid kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu sgrub/ /rgod dang 'gyod dang gnyid la sogs/ /'bad pas rab tu spang bar
21b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /gzhan du bskal? ba bye ba ni/ /brgyar yang dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur/ /mgon po rdo rje slob dpon la/ /dngos po kun gyi phyag byas nas/ /rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i gzugs/ /gsang ba'i dngos grub yang dag sbyar/ /mtshan ma med cing snang ba med/ /rang gi lus kyi thabs ldan pa'i//
21b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'bad pas rab tu bsgom par bya/ /'bad pas de ltar shes byas nas/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun dbang po/ /sngags pas rang lus de nyid dang/ /rdo rje can dngos dbyer med pa'i/ /sna tshogs spyod pa gsal gyur pa'i/ /gsang ba'i brtul zhugs/
21b3(rgyud 'grel): bzang po spyod/ /thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis/ /mchog tu dga' bas yongs su dgang/ /rnam rtog yid las byung ba yi/ /'jig rten pa yi gang smad pa'i/ /de de gzugs su gnas byas la/ /gsang ba'i brtul zhugs brtul zhugs can/ /ji ltar dpal ldan 'dus
21b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i/ /gsang ba zhes byar rab gnas pa/ /bshang gci zas su byas gyur na/ /sgrub pa'i snod du nges par 'gyur/ /dam tshig bzang po gzhan dag kyang/ /gsal byed la sogs khyad par dang/ /phyag rgya'i 'ching ba byin brlabs nas/ /rgyud nas gsungs pa'i bzang po
21b5(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /rdo rje'i tshigs ni bzang po 'di/ /rdo rje thugs kyis gsungs pa yis/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa bla med pa/ /de ni bdag gis bshad par bya/ /rdo rje thugs kyis gang sbas pa/ /de ni bdag gis bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yi/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags
21b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /mnyam gzhag mi smra gyur pa yi/ /smyon pa'i gzugs su bzhag par bya/ /rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sha za bzhin du kun tu 'khyam/ /yang dang yang du ngal byas la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bsgom/ /rtag tu bsgom dang ldan gyur pa'i/ /rig pas rang gis rtogs
21b7(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer dang/ /tshal la sogs par 'khyam par bya/ /bzhi mdo dag dang dur khrod dang/ /lha rten pho brang khyad par du/ /dor ba rnying pas mgo bcings la/ /tshogs bcas gnas su 'jug na yang/ /mchog tu bde ba bsgom par bya/ /'bad med rol
22a1(rgyud 'grel): mo brdung ba der/ /gang dang glu yi g.yeng bar bya/ /'o ma sgron mar ldan pa de'i/ /rgyal mtshan can gyi gnas 'jug bya/ /la lar rgod cing la lar smra/ /la lar glu yang blang bar bya/ /la lar gar bya la lar brdab/ /la lar sna tshogs brjod
22a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ /ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur ba/ /thams cad rim gyis rim gyis bya/ /skyo bar gyur nas sangs rgyas nyid/ /nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten spyod pa rnam spangs la/ /rigs rnams kun la kun tu spyang/ /'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad du/ /gcig
22a3(rgyud 'grel): tu 'o ma goms byed par/ /rol la sogs pa'i dam tshig la/ /shin tu sred par mi bya'o/ /nga rgyal spang bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang goms par bya/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i sems nyid ni/ /ji ltar myos par mi 'gyur bar/ /dam tshig thams cad sngon 'gro
22a4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /sngags pas de ltar bya ba nyid/ /glu dang gar gyi dga' ba ni/ /ji ltar yid ni mi nyams par/ /ji srid mngon sum gyur gyi bar/ /de ltar de nyid la sems bzhag /bdud rtsi lnga la gcig gus pas/ /de nyid nges par byas nas ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad blang byas
22a5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyis brgyan pa'i/ /smyon pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa/ /de ni rtag tu brten par bya/ /sngags pas gsang ba'i spyod pa ni/ /cho ga bzhin du spyang par bya/ /srog chags kun lus las byung ba'i/ /sgron ma rtag tu cho ga bzhin/ /lha yi dngos
22a6(rgyud 'grel): grub thob bya'i phyir/ /'bad pas bza' bar bya ba nyid/ /sbrang ma'i skyug pa 'dres pa dang/ /bshang dang gci ba bsres byas nas/ /sgron ma lnga dang bsres pa yi/ /rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pa bya/ /dngos med mchog tu zhi ba yi/ /dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje can/ /rang rig tsam
22a7(rgyud 'grel): zhig bskyed byas la/ /go 'phang mchog de sgom par bya/ /sngags pas 'di ltar bsgom byas la/ /rang gi lus mchog bsgom par bya/ /smad par gyur pa ma lus pa/ /dpyad pa med par bya ba nyid/ /btsun mo'i rang byung me tog ni/ /byang chub sems dang gcas gyur pa//
22b1(rgyud 'grel): ? la gsung gi rdo rje can/ /bde ba chen po yang dag mchod/ glang po khyi rta rnga mo yi/ /sgron ma mi las byung ba dag /sngags pas rtag tu bza' bya zhing/ /gzhan du bza' bar mi bya'o/ /de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /gang zhig rtag tu goms byed pa/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i ting nge
22b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /de ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /slongs mo spyod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /brtul zhugs can gyis snod mi bzung/ /grong pas zos shing por ba yi/ /gyo dus la sogs dar bza' zhing/ /gang du bor zhing byin par bza' / /des ni gang du zos gyur nas/ /tshim par gyur nas
22b3(rgyud 'grel): de yang dor/ /de yi smad g.yogs dum bu yang/ /rnying zhing dum bur gyur pas bya/ /yang na phyogs kyi gos can gyis/ /gong du 'gro bar 'dod par bya/ /til 'bras tsam gyi dngos po yang/ /yongs su bzung bar mi bya'o/ /yongs su 'dzin las sdug bsngal 'byung/ /sdug bsngal gyis
22b4(rgyud 'grel): ni sems 'khor 'gyur/ /'khor bas sems ni zhum 'gyur te/ /zhum pas dngos grub nyams par 'gyur/ /dngos grub med na 'khor ba ste/ /'khor bas dmyal bsgrub par byed/ /dmyal bar nyon mongs sdug bsngal gyis/ /grangs med bskal par gnod par 'gyur//
22b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin skabs sdug bsngal gyur pa dang/ /gzhan gyi bran la sogs par skye/ /rnam dag legs par 'dod pa yi/ /skye ba slar yang thob mi 'gyur/ /de ltar bdag gis bdag nyid kyis/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa rnam bsgoms nas/ /khams gsum rnam pa gcig gyur pa/ /rnam
22b6(rgyud 'grel): dag thabs bzangs? la gnas pas/ /rnam dag legs par 'dod pa yis/ /skye ba slar yang thob par 'gyur/ /gsang ba grub pa la gnas nas/ /de nas seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /smyon pa'i gzugs 'dzin gyur pa yis/ /kun spyod thams cad rnam spangs la/ /gsang
22b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum dri med rnal 'byor gyis/ /bza' ba kun la spyod par bya/ /shing rdos yi rang bzhin gyis/ /lha rnams la yang phyag mi bya/ /lus nyid la ni mchod pa dang/ /bla ma gus pas phyag bya'o/ /sa rdo'i rang bzhin mchod rten dang/ /glegs bam la sogs mi bya zhing/ /rmi lam
23a1(rgyud 'grel): du yang dkyil 'khor sogs/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bya'o/ /theg pa gsum la zhugs rnams la/ /phyag la sogs pa mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dam par mi 'dzin na/ /rnal 'byor pa gzhan smos ci dgos/ /bsgom la chags gyur sems kyis
23a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /ngag gi rtsod pa mi bya'o/ /dam tshig dag ni nyams par 'gyur/ /nyams 'gyur yid ni g.yengs gyur pas/ /sbyor ba la sogs 'bad pa yis/ /de nyid rig par rtag tu spang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i nga rgyal nyid/ /spangs nas gzhan du mi bya'o/ /dag
23a3(rgyud 'grel): pa de nyid la gnas pas/ /sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya ste/ /dam tshig dag ni nyams par 'gyur/ /nyams pas yid ni sdug bsngal 'thob/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /ji srid de la rtogs gyur pas/ /dngos med go 'phang la gnas nas/ /thabs
23a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang dag dang ldan pa yi/ /rtog las gang zhig 'byung ba rnams/ /ma brtag par ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bsgom bya'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni/ /dngos grub mtshan nyid gang ci rang rung/ /de kun skad cig tsam la ni/ /rang nyid gnas par 'gyur ba yin
23a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa 'di ni bar chad can/ /sngags pas gsang sngags mi bzla zhing/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang mi bya la/ /phyag rgya mi bcing phyag mi bya/ /lus nyid dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs te/ /shes rab phyag rgya zhes byar grags/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems
23a6(rgyud 'grel): dag sngags/ /de bsten pa ni phyag yin no/ /nang gi bdag nyid de byas nas/ /mkhas pas phyi rol thams cad spangs/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pas/ /de nyid rig pas rtag tu spyad/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' i bdag /rnam par rtog med sngags pa
23a7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pas/ /de ltar 'gyur med 'grub par 'gyur/ /spro zhing de la rab sbyor bas/ /dam tshig dag ni skyong ba dang/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yis/ /shes rab thabs dag rnam par bsgom/ /gar dang glu sogs sbyor ba yi
23b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rdo rje rnam rol zhing/ /bur chang sgron ma gus pa dang/ /dri dang phreng sogs rgya chen dang/ /gling bu rnga zlum sgra dag dang/ rdza rnga'i sgra la sogs pa dang/ /lha rdzas lus bzangs dri bzangs ma/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgrub/ /lha rdzas bzang po mchog 'di dang/ /nang gi bdag
23b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid bsgoms pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub 'gyur ba/ /spyad par bya ba ma yin no/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis/ /byang chub sems ni rab spros pas/ /chu skyes khyad par bza' bar bya/ /rtag tu chags pa dang ldan zhing
23b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu dga' ba la sred pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/ /mang du smras pa ci zhig dgos/ /rtag tu ngo tsha spangs gyur pas/ /dam tshig spyod la ci zhen pa/ /smyon pa'i gzugs kyis mi smra ba/ /dur khrod la sogs gar gnas nas/ /mA ma kI dang
23b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan la sogs/ /rgyan rnams la sogs kyis brgyan pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bsgom/ /rdo rje nam mkha' i khams sbyor bas/ /der ni thams cad bsgom par bya/ /zhal gsum pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /ye shes rgya chen
23b5(rgyud 'grel): rlabs spro bya/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rang dngos rig pa bskul byas na/ /sangs rgyas ye shes gzugs can rnams/ /rab tu bsdus pa dag kyang bya/ /phyogs bcu dag tu rgyug byed pa'i/ /rang sems gal te 'dzin par 'dod gyur na/ /sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur
23b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur rang gi sems/ /de tshe yang dag sbyor ba mchog tu bya/ /gong du nyams myong phyag rgya rjes bsam bya/ /rtser ldan rjes 'gro bzang dga' chags pa can/ /chag pas thob gyur de las sems gtad nas/ /slar yang rim pa'i khyad par gsal bar bsgrub/ /bsam gtan 'di la
23b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yi/ /rin chen sems ni brtan gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab gnas de/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /de lta de nyid shes gyur nas/ /der gtad nas ni bsgom par bya/ /ji srid yid ni mi skyo bar/ /blo bzang sems ni mnyam gzhag pas/ /skyon ji ltar
24a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa yi/ /sems kyis kun tu khyab par bya/ /cung zad mig ni rgyal 'gyur bas/ /byang chub rin chen bsgom par bya/ /la la rgod dang smra ba dang/ /la lar gar dag byed pa na/ /ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur bas/ /bsgom pa la chags
24a2(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis so/ /rnam par rtog med sngags pa yis/ /da lta'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pas/ /dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs nas/ /bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /bzang po'i rigs lnga las byung ba'i/ /dam tshig rtag tu bza' bar bya/ /khyad par gzhan dang ldan
24a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /dam tshig brten pa'i mchod par bya/ /rtag tu bde gshegs bsam gtan pas/ /spyan ni rgyas par gyur nas su/ /byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pas/ /ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya/ /spyod pa rin chen la gnas shing/ /rdo rje ye shes la
24a4(rgyud 'grel): mos pas/ /bde gshegs go 'phang 'dod na ni/ /mi dge'i sems su mi bya'o/ /khams gsum tu mi 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /btsun mo kun la 'dod par bya/ /dman las skyes dang 'gyur ba can/ /de nyid rnal 'byor bas mchod bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad las
24a5(rgyud 'grel): byung dang/ /srog chags kun lus las byung ba'i/ /srog chags rnams ni rnal 'byor pas/ /dngos grub 'dod na sgrub par bya/ /bshang gci sa bon la sogs pa/ /sna yi nang nas byung ba yis/ /rang lus rdo rje bsgoms nas ni/ /sngags pas rtag tu mchod par
24a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /khams gsum pa las byung ba yi/ /rtag tu dam tshig la mchod pas/ /de nyid rin chen la rab sbyar/ /gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dir ni mang du smra ci dgos/ /gang dang gang zhig dmigs 'gyur ba/ /de kun de nyid rnal 'byor du/ /rig pas
24a7(rgyud 'grel): rtogs shing blta bar bya/ /rdo rje sgrub par gang gsungs pa/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /dam tshig bzang po dang ldan pa'i/ /de nyid gsum dbyer med pa'i sku/ /sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya/ /kun kyang rtog pa sngon 'gro bas/ /khams gsum 'di
24b1(rgyud 'grel): dag rnam par dag/ ma rig de bas yang dag bsgribs/ /rmi lam rtsed mo rjes su 'gro /phung po khams sogs mtshan nyid rnams/ /de ltar 'bad pas dpyad na ni/ /mtshan ma med cing snang med pa'o/ /thabs dang bcas pa rnam par bsgom/ /de ltar chog ldan shes pas/ /sems ni de
24b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid byin brlabs nas/ /ji ltar thos pas 'tsho byed cing/ /dam tshig ma lus la rab sbyor/ /tshong dpon bram ze rde'u rigs dang/ /shi ba sogs kyi 'gron bos na/ /zos shing tshem nas bor gyur pa'i/ /gcig tu bsdus pa'i dman pa rnams/ /khyi dang wa yi smad pa dang/ blangs nas
24b3(rgyud 'grel): de ni bza' bar bya/ /de nyid bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /cung zhig smyon pa'i sems ldan pa'i/ /rigs rnams kun la mnyam par sbyor/ /bzang po'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gar/ /rdo rje gar gyis gom par gnas/ /glu rnams len par byed pa
24b4(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /rdo rje glu ni mi gsal bar/ /khams gsum dag tu grags pa yi/ /gzhan dag gsal ba nyid du len/ /sna tshogs skad bsres glu len cing/ /sha za bzhin du kun tu 'khyam/ /las dag gang gis skye bo rnams/ /gang dang gang du 'ching 'gyur ba/ /thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/
24b5(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i 'ching las grol bar 'gyur/ /khyad par thams cad spangs pa yi/ /de nyid zhi ba thob gyur nas/ /thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yi/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /'byung po kun gyi de nyid gang/ /bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /'gro kun mchog tu zhi ba nyid//
24b6(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gnas pa'i bzang po gang/ /rang lus thabs dang bcas pa yi/ /de nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /dus pa kun la thal mo'i sgra/ /rim gyi gang ni bzang po bya/ /kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yi/ /byang chub mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bzang po go 'phang der gnas nas//
24b7(rgyud 'grel): gang dang gang du gnas na yang/ /byang chub mchog tu nges byas pas/ /sbyong ban? can yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la brten nas/ /yid ni de nyid byin brlabs nas/ /gsang spyod mchog gi rol pa yi/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te rgya chen khyim/
25a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni/ /spong bar nus pa ma yin yang/ /dpal ldan gsang 'dus las bstan pa'i/ /byang chub 'byung ba'i spyod pa rnams/ /khyim de nyid du gnas byas nas/ /'jig rten spyod pa la gnas nas/ /ji ltar rig pa mi 'gyur bar/ /gsang ba'i
25a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig spyad par bya/ /mtshan mo gsal por byas nas ni/ /'o ma gcig tu goms byas pas/ /phyag rgyar bcas pas bya ba ste/ /yid ches pas yin gzhan gyis min/ /dri chu la sogs dam tshig rnams/ /rtag tu spyad par bya ba nyid/ /gcig tu dam tshig goms
