25a3(rgyud 'grel): byed na/ /de nyid bla med 'grub par 'gyur/ /shin tu gsang ba'i grogs dag nyid/ /de nyid shes shing mchog gyur pa/ /de dang lhan cig dam tshigs rnams/ /rgyud las gsung ba spyad par bya/ /bud med bzang dang longs spyod bzang/ /de bzhin gnas mal bzang sogs
25a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /de nyid bsgom pas ngal gyur pa'i/ /ye shes ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig spyod pa der gtad par/ /khyim nyid du yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig spyod pa dman gyur na/ /spyod pa min zhing khyim duAng min/ /de ltar dam tshig mngon ldan zhing/ /ye shes
25a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang po la dga' ba/ /cho ga 'dis ni bskul byas nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyams su blangs bya thams cad ni/ /'gal ba'i dam tshig la sogs pa/ /smad par gyur pa sngon 'gro ba'i/ /ma lus pa dag gang bstan pa/ /dngos grub bzang po'i rgyu
25a6(rgyud 'grel): yi phyir/ /de dag thams cad bya ba nyid/ /'di kun mngon sum nyid du ni/ /byed pa'i char ni dbye bya ste/ /gsang ba spyod pa ldan pa yi/ /de nyid shes yin gzhan ma yin/ /'gal ba'i dam tshig la sogs pa'i/ /gsang ba grub pa zhes byar brjod/ /rtags can
25a7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la gnas gyur nas/ /'jig rten spyod las 'das gyur te/ /smad pa rnams la gsal po ru/ /nyams su len par byed gyur cing/ /nus pa dag ni ma skyes par/ /kun rdzob nyid du 'jug 'gyur ba'i/ /dman pa'i rigs la sogs pa la/ /rtag tu dam tshig
25b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs spyod cing/ /'dod dang bcas pa'i sems nyid kyis/ /thab khung dkyil 'khor sogs byed pa/ /rtag dang chad pa smra ba yi/ /gang zhig cho ga 'dir gnas pas/ /de ni bstan pa 'jig byed gsungs/ /gal te rtags dang ldan gyur pas/ /sgrub pa 'di ni byed 'gyur na/ /de ni mtshan mo dam tshig
25b2(rgyud 'grel): spyad/ /nyin mo shin tu gsang bar bya/ /dman pa'i 'gro ba nyan thos sogs/ /ji ltar gzhan gyis mi rig pa/ /de ltar sngags pas bya ba ste/ /bdag nyid sgrub phyir shin tu spang/ /'jig rten kun gyis mi gnod cing/ /'jig rten kun la mi gnod par/ /de bzhin sngags pas 'dir
25b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /bde gshegs dngos grub 'dod gyur na/ /gsang ba grub pa la gnas shing/ /sgrub pa po la nus pa zhig /ji srid 'byung bar ma gyur ba/ /de srid brtul zhugs rtags mi bzung/ /nus pa zhig ni skyes 'gyur pa/ /de nas gsang ba'i spyod pa spangs/ /de rjes rig pa'i brtul
25b4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs bzang/ /de dag rtag tu blang bar bya/ /go 'phang nyams dga' der gnas pas/ /rnal 'byor der gtang bsgom par bya/ /'du 'dzi thams cad der bral nas/ /go 'phang mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'du 'dzi ring du spangs shing rang bzhin g.yo ba'i sems nyid rab sbyar nas/ /dngos dang
25b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos med rang bzhin bde ba'i mchog ldan de nyid la gnas bsgom par bya/ /nyon mongs pa yi dgra tshogs mang po las rgyal mi nyams bzang por gyur pa yi/ /sems can don ldan sems kyis rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams 'jig rten gsum na spyod/ /spyan ni cung zhig phye nas srid pa'i
25b6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal bsal ba'i sems dang ldan pa yi/ /cho ga shes par gyur pas sna tshogs ma lus brdzun pa'i blo dang sgra spangs la/ /mchog tu legs par spyod pa'i sems can don ldan 'jig rten gsum na grags par byed/ /dngos rnams dpag med byang chub go 'phang mchog gyur mnyam med sems can
25b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog gyur rol pa gang/ /khyim gyi 'dzin pa rtsa bzhin ma lus sgyu ma bzhin lta ba/ /spre'u dang rlung dang glog bzhin g.yo ba'i sems zhes bya la dbang du gyur pas gzhag /dngos po'i de nyid bsgoms pa'i lus can dam pa'i bde ba de nyid mchog /sems can don la spro ba'i de nyid sems la nges
26a1(rgyud 'grel): par rnal 'byor dbang phyug rol bar byed/ /don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las/ /sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dri ma med par byed
26a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gsang ba'i spyod? pa'i rim pa ma lus par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// /dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /sna tshogs gzugs rnams phun sum tshogs/ /'ching dang mya ngan rnam spangs pa/ /lha yi phyag rgya mchog rnyed nas/ /lha mo klu
26a3(rgyud 'grel): mo gnod sbyin mo/ /de bzhin lha min bu mo'ang rung/ /dri za'i bu mo gzugs ldan pa'i/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma yang rung/ /'di lta'i bu mo rnal 'byor ma'am/ /de nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa dang/ /zhags pa lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /bkug nas longs spyod nyid du bya/ /lha rdzas grub
26a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gang yin de/ /dam tshig sbyor bar rab tu brjod/ /bsgrubs na ma dag gzhug par 'gyur zhing/ /gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur/ /des ni sems ni rnam g.yeng bar/ /nam yang byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi yi bu mo mthu chen gyis/ /dam tshig bzang po 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul che
26a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhing/ /chu dang chu? bdag rnam par spangs/ /sna tshogs gzugs dag rab ston pa'i/ /lha rdzas btsun mo bsten par bya/ /de dang lhan cig mnyam ldan pa'i/ /skye bo med pa'i tshal song la/ /'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /seng ge bzhin du rnam par spyad/ /lha rdzas btsun mo
26a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs pa yi/ /nus pa gal te med gyur na/ /'dod pas gnod pa nyid gyur la/ /des ni mi yi bu mo bsten/ /longs spyod bzang po dang ldan pa'i/ /g.yeng ba'i myos pa zhi bya'i phyir/ /de phyir sgrub pa'i dbang po la/ /mi las byung ba'i bu mo bsten/ /rnam g.yeng khro ba mnga' dang/ /skyon rnams thams cad 'byung 'gyur zhing
26a7(rgyud 'grel): rgas shing mya ngan gyis non pa'i/ /mi yi bu mo shin tu spang/ /de lta'i lha rdzas med gyur nas/ /dngos grub bzang po'i rgyu yi phyir/ /rgyud kyi bya ba'i rim pa yis/ /mi yi bu mo bstan par bya/ /de ltar tha mal byang chub nyid/ /sngags kyi cho ga bzhin byas nas/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i
26b1(rgyud 'grel): yid can gyis/ /byang chub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /tha mal pa yi rim pa yi/ /phyag rgya de nyid bshad par bya/ /mthar skyes dang por byas pas ni/ /gang gi dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o/ /mthar skyes mi srid bu mo dang/ /de bzhin tshos ma'i bu mo dang/ /smad pa'i rigs las byung gyur
26b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gang yang bde ba rnyed pa dang/ /rgyud nas gsungs pa'i rig byas pa'i/ /khyad par du ni bu mo nyid/ /dam tshig spyod pa thams cad la/ /byis pa nyid nas rim gyis brlab/ /byang chub sems la dga' zhing mkhas/ /chos nyid la ni bzod byas pas/ /mkhas pas cho ga ji
26b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /rdo rje gsum dbyer med par bsgrub/ /rgyud nas ji skad gsungs pa yi/ /mchod pa de la gnas nas brtsam/ /gus pas 'o ma sgron ma dang/ /phreng ba la sogs rgyan rnams dang/ /thal ba bzang po bsdu? bya zhing/ /ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan par/ /sngags pas rang
26b4(rgyud 'grel): gi gzugs nyid dang/ /de yi gzugs kyang bya ba nyid/ /stag gis bags pas gos byas shing/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje kha TwAM ga blang zhing/ /dril bu cang te'us rnam par brgyan/ /de bzhin rna ba mgrin dpung? pa/ /rus pa'i dum bus rnam par
26b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /mi yi thod pa g.yon pa sta/ /de bzhin g.yas par DA ma ru/ /bdag dang phyag rgya de bzhin du/ mA ma kI 'am spyan dag gam/ /bdag nyid rdo rje mchog 'dzin pas/ /'di 'dra'i gzugs su byas nas ni/ /rgyud las byung ba'i cho ga yis/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs
26b6(rgyud 'grel): bzang po spyad/ /gnyis med nges par byas nas ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba las rig pa'i brtul zhugs nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun
26b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //mthar skyes ngo mtshar chen po las/ /rgyud las sgrub thabs gang gsungs pa/ /ji ltar nges par des 'thob pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /skyob pa'i nges pa yongs spangs la/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug gzugs byas nas/ /gang dus sus
27a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang mi shes par/ /mthar skyes nang du 'jug par bya/ /tshogs kyi mtshan ma blangs nas ni/ /mgo bo'i skra ni bregs nas kyang/ /ral pa sbom po gcig bzhag nas/ /gtsug phud gcig ni bzung bar bya/ /ru rag sha dang shel bzang po/ /tshan
27a2(rgyud 'grel): tshan dag tu spal byas pa'i/ /phreng ba'i do shal 'phyang po dag /mgul ba'i rgyan du bzung bar bya/ /dpung rgyan gdu bu bzang po dag /'od zer 'phro zhing 'khrug gyur dang/ /'bad pas mtshan gsum byas nas ni/ /mdzub mo la ni zangs ma'i rgya/ /mdun gyi phyogs su 'phyang gyur
27a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /smad g.yogs dum bu de nas bzung/ /lcags mdung la btags me tog snod/ /phrag pa dag la dgal bar bya/ /yan lag thams cad rnam brgyan nas/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug gzugs su bya/ /phrag pa gnyis ni dag ba byas nas/ /mthar skyes khyim du 'jug par bya//
27a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang po de ltar gsang byas nas/ /de nas bsgrub par bya phyir dpyad/ /gang zhig sus kyang mi shes par/ /bzang po'i yul du 'khyam par bya/ /grong khyer sum brtsegs nye ba'i mthar/ /mthar skyes nang du 'jug par bya/ /yang dag tu na lta gzhan ni/ /des ni shes par
27a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu khrus dang lha mchod cing/ /rtag tu rang gi grub mthar bsgom/ /yi ge las ni cung zhig gis/ /rang byung lta la chags gyur pas/ /gdol pa'i gzugs kyi tshogs nyid gyi/ /de ltar de yi nang zhugs la/ /byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /chos
27a6(rgyud 'grel): dang grub mdza' sngon 'gro bas/ /de nas de la ston par byed/ /dus kyi phyi ma la sogs pa'am/ /yang na dbugs kyi sgom pa ston/ /de nas rgyud nas gsungs kun gyis/ /yid brtan pa nyid 'grub bar 'gyur/ /dbang dang dkyil 'khor sngon 'gro bas/ /bdag nyid kyis ni slob
27a7(rgyud 'grel): mar byas/ /de yi byin pa'i rdzas rnams dang/ /snga mo? yod pa dang bcas pas/ /de ni de la gtad byas la/ /de yi bla ma mchod phyir byin/ /de yi bkas gnang blang bya ste/ /shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma/ /de ni rgyud don bden pa la/ /mkhas shing dam tshig 'dod
27b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /sangs rgyas nyid du nges byas la/ /blo ldan rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /nges par rgyud gsungs dam tshig gis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /ri 'am rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam/ /skyon rnams spangs pa'i yul 'khor dang/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs
27b2(rgyud 'grel): sam/ /phug dang grong khyer rnying pa dag /dri med chu mi? gu'i? ba dang/ /me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan/ /ljon shing 'khri shing gis brgyan pa khyad par du ni dben gyur pa/ /der ni phyag rgya dang bcas par/ /sgrub po brtan zhing nges pa yis/ /sgom pa'i sbyor ba der gtad pa'i/ /rtag tu nags su bsod snyoms blang//
27b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems la dga' zhing mkhas/ /lus ni nus pa can byas nas/ /yang dag rim pas der gnas nas/ yang dang yang du goms par bya/ /ljon shing rgyal po de dag kun/ /sgrub po dbang po mdangs ldan pas/ /de nyid sbyor bas bkug byas nas/ /zhal zas
27b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang po steng? bar 'gyur/ /blo bzang rtag tu 'dod med cing/ /blo yis rtag tu goms par bya/ /rdo rje theg pa la dga' zhing/ /rtag tu bde gshegs bsam pa can/ /bstan bcos ma lus la goms shing/ /de bzhin gtong ldan dpa' zhing gsal/ /phongs par gyur
27b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshe na yang/ /mnyam pa'i sems nyid gcig tu bsgom/ /phyag rgya 'ang de 'drar shes bya ste/ /chags med zhen pa med pa dang/ /zab mo'i chos dang ldan pa dang/ /sgrub po 'dod bzhin rjes su 'phrang/ /bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ma/ /gzugs dang lang
27b6(rgyud 'grel): chos rnam par brgyan/ /byang chub sems la dga' zhing gsal/ /rdo rje sgrub la shin tu gsal/ /ci ltar bu bzhin brtse ba dang/ /de bzhin spun dang pha ma ltar/ /rtag tu sgrub po mthong ba na/ /brtse bas shin tu goms byed na/ /bud med sgyu bral yid du 'ong/ /skal pa
27b7(rgyud 'grel): bzang zhing snyan par smra/ /phrag dog spangs shing rjes su mthun/ /sgrub pa po yi bka' bzhin byed/ dmar ser lus phra gzugs bzang ma/ /tshul khrims yon tan gyis brgyan pa/ /mdog snum cho ga shes pa dang/ /ring min thud pa ma yin pa/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa
28a1(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ /yang na de bzhin bcu drug gam/ /de nyid rig pa dang ldan pas/ /mur gong mdza' ni rnam par mdzes/ /yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /skra yi rtse kun cung zhig 'khyil/ /skad snyan shin tu dga' ba can/ /lta ba bzang po rnam rgyas ba//
28a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas bu mo 'di 'dra ba/ /dngos grub don gnyer gyur nas su/ /rtogs las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ /de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs brtsam/ /'bad pas de ni bzung byas nas/ /go 'phang mchog ni sgrub par bya/ /rang gi rdo rje mchod nas ni/ /byang chub sems ni btang
28a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de nas sku yi rdo rje bsgom/ /ngag gi rdo rje kun nas bzung/ /de yi b+ha gar byung ba'i khus/ /sems kyi rdo rje rab tu mchod/ /de la gus pas mchod nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba las/ /de nyid sbyor la bsgom par bya/ /tsun da 'am ni mA ma kIr/ /dang po'i rnal 'byor
28a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam bsgoms nas/ /thams cad bya ba kho na yin/ /dam tshig gi ni khyad par dang/ /bud med mchog ni bsten par bya/ /b+ha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni/ /byang chub sems ni btang mi bya/ /der bskyed pa yi dga' ba yis/ /sems ni bkang bas bsgom par bya/ /ji srid rnal
28a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor byang chub sems/ /gtong bar byed pa ma yin pa/ /de srid kun dga' las byung bde/ /ci yang rgyun mi 'chad par 'thob/ /bde ba de yi ngo bo dang/ /yang dag ldan pa'i byang chub mchog /bdag nyid rtag tu bsgoms nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//
28a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub kun gyi rten gyur pa/ /byang chub sems ni der lhung bas/ /phung po rnam shes brgyal gyur nas/ /ma smad dngos grub ga la yod/ /phyag rgya ma la dam 'khyud nas/ /yang dang yang du 'o byas la/ /gnas de ru ni bskyod pa yis/ /byang chub sems ma rab 'bab
28a7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /phyag rgya chen po rnam bsgoms la/ /lha mo de la 'o yang bya/ /mig gnyis dag ni rgyas gyur nas/ /bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba/ /ma mchu cung zhig rgyas pa yis/ /nu ma cung zhig dam par 'dzin/ /brla gnyis dri ma med pa mchog /mig kyang cung zhig rgyas pa dang/
28b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje theg par ngal byas pas/ /der gtang pa yi bsgom dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu dir gtang bsam pa can/ /'o ma byin nas yang dang yang/ /khyad par du ni rab tu mchod/ rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya bzhin/ /de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /yid 'ong bcos
28b2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i zas dang ni/ /dri dang me tog sogs bsnyen bkur/ /nya dang sha dang dur chang sogs/ /sems ni spro bar byed pa can/ /'bad pas de lta bus mchod nas/ /de nyid ched du bsgom par bya/ /cho ga 'di yis bskul nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag 'grub 'byung?/ /byang chub sems
28b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa yi/ /bdud rtsi me tog myang bar bya/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas pa/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod/ /bsgom dang dam tshig nyams len pas/ /de lta'i dngos grub myur du thob/ /sems kyi dam tshig sdang pa la/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dngos grub med/ /lha yi
28b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bsgom pa dang/ /dam tshig bsrung bar bya ba ni/ /shes pas 'bad pas bsgoms byas na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i sa phyogs su/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad na ni/ /sdig pa ma lus sbyangs nas ni/ /rig ma dang bcas grol bar
28b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /grong dang grong khyer dag tu 'am/ /sems ni rab tu dga' ba der/ /der ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /dgag pa dang ni bsgrub pa med/ /dpal ldan 'dus rab yongs gsal ba'i/ /sgrub thabs rgyud las gang gsungs pa/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi//
28b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i spyod pas rnam brgyan pa/ /de ni dngos grub myur thob par/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i zhal nas gsungs/ /dam tshig spyad pa dang ldan par/ /rtag tu goms par bya ba yin/ /don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang
28b7(rgyud 'grel): ba grub pa zhes bya ba las tshogs kyi brtul zhugs nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ /me dang chu dang dug sogs la/ /thabs ni gang gis mi shes pa/ /de ni tshig dang nub pa dang/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gsang 'dus rgyud kyis ni/ /shes rab thabs ni spangs gyur pa/ /'gal ba dag ni spyod byed pa'i/ /bsam ngan de ni brlag par 'gyur/ /gang gis de yi de nyid shes/ /yang dag rab sbyin la gnas nas/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa la dga' ba'i//
29a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can de ni steng du 'gro/ gsang ba'i spyod dang brtul zhugs dang/ /phyag rgya rgyas pa gang gsungs pa/ /'di dag thams cad rtog don yin/ /bsgom pa 'ba' zhig tsam yin te/ /gang yang rgyas pa'i bdag nyid can/ /kun kyang sems can bsam pas gsungs/
29a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa la ni rab gnas pa'i/ /ye shes ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnam rtog du ma rgyas gyur pa/ /'di ni thams cad spangs byas nas/ /phyag rgya chen po la 'bad bas/ /shes rab ldan pas rtag tu bsgom/ /'du 'dzi thams cad spangs nas ni/ /gnyis pa thams cad
29a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam spangs nas/ /yang dang yang du goms byas nas/ /pad+ma rdo rje'i tshig bzhin du/ /dus mi ring bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig dag ni thams cad las/ /bla ma mchod pa mchog yin te/ /sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog /dpal ldan 'dus pa 'am gzhan du bstan//
29a5(rgyud 'grel): bzung min brjod pa ma yin pa/ /sems can kun la yang dag gnas/ /lus ngag yid kyi bde ba yin/ /rnam rtog med cing gnas med pa/ /dag cing ngo bo nyid med pa/ /byang chub sems zhes dran par bya/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis/ /de ni myur du thob par 'gyur/ /khams
29a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum rin po cher gyur pa/ /slob dpon las ni mchog gzhan med/ /gang las bka' drin thob pa yi/ /mkhas pas dngos grub du ma 'thob/ /yang dag gsungs pas spyod pa gang/ /dpal ldan mnyam nyid gnyis med gsungs/ /des ni slob dpon bya ba ste/ /gzhan gyis
29a7(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /gos dang rgyan dang longs spyod dang/ /rang gi phyag rgyas brgyan byas nas/ /bla ma mchod cing phul byas pas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /rang gi phyag rgya phul nas ni/ /rgyud nas gsungs pa'i dngos grub 'grub/ /gzhan dag phyi rol
29b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gis/ /bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni rgyud kyi bden don gyis/ /dam tshig gtso bo mchog yin no/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mngon gsungs pa'i/ /dam tshig dag ni thams cad las/ /gnyug ma'i phyag rgya dbul ba mchog
29b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du phyi rol tshul dag gi/ dam tshig 'grub par mi 'gyur go /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /gus pas bla ma mchod par bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya pad+ma yi/ /mchod mchog mgrin pa'i dbyangs dag dang/ /brla brdab pa yi rol mo dang/ /rdo rje 'jug pa'i spyod pa dang/ /rig ma'i
29b3(rgyud 'grel): ma mchu'i ro myang dang/ /cung zhig 'khyud par spro ba yi/ /bza' ba chos pa sna tshogs gang/ /nya dang khung ba la sogs dang/ /sha dang bur chang bzang po dag/ /rgyud nas gsungs pa sna tshogs dang/ /phyag rgya gnyug ma phul byas nas/ /de nas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di lta'i
29b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su ma byas nas/ /gzhan du dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje ston la gang gus pas/ /'di lta'i tshul du byed 'gyur ba/ /de nyid rig pa'i las nyid kyis/ /dri med rdo rje gsum dbyer med/ /yang dag rab sbyin gsang 'gyur ba/ /sems can des 'dir thob par 'gyur/ /bla
29b5(rgyud 'grel): ma rdo rje mnyes 'gyur bas/ /dngos grub bzang po kun sbyin byed/ /rgyud nas gsungs pa'i dam tshig bzang/ /de ltar rtag par rab bsgrub pas/ /rdo rje slob dpon thugs rje mchog/ man ngag myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'di lta'i tshul gyis 'ongs gyur pa'i/ /de nyid gsal por yongs
29b6(rgyud 'grel): shes nas/ /gus pa'i dngos po 'phel 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchod pa'i dus su 'bad pa yis/ /gus pas bla ma phyag byas nas/ /phyi nas sangs rgyas dngos grub gtso/ /rab sbyin rtse gcig sems kyis bsgom/ /slob dpon mchog la dmod pa dang/
29b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' khyad par du/ /dkon mchog gsum la dmod pa dang/ /'di dag 'bad pas spangs par bya/ /gang gi sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos/ /nam mkha' lta bu mi shes pas/ /theg pa mchog 'di thos gyur nas/ /sems can de ni skrag 'gyur na/ /rdo rje theg pa dmod pa dang/ /ngan 'gro
30a1(rgyud 'grel): dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dman la mos pa'i sems can rnams/ /bskal pa brgya yi bar du yang/ /ngan 'gro dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ngan 'gro dag nas byung nas yang/ /de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /gang
30a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig gus par mi byed pa/ /sdug bsngal 'phongs pa kun 'byung bar/ /sdig pa'i las kyi 'gro 'gyur te/ /bde gshegs mtshan ma la brten nas/ /mnar med par ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig gus pa dang ldan pas/ /chos nyid bsgom par byed 'gyur bas/ /de ni sdig pa
30a3(rgyud 'grel): kun spangs nas/ /gtso bo'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs pa las/ /sems can rnams ni des grol 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gnas/ /bla na med pa'i chos rnams ni//
30a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten kun la ston pa por/ /dus mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi shes sgrib pas ldongs gyur pa'i/ /sems can rnams la don dam gyis/ /ye shes snang bar byed 'gyur te/ /mun pa la ni mar me bzhin/ /bde chen mgon po gcig pu nyid/ /gang zhig rtag tu
30a5(rgyud 'grel): dran byed cing/ /zhabs kyi pad+ma gnyis gus pa'i/ /sdig pa thams cad zad gyur nas/ /sems can de nyid de yi mthus/ /pad bsnams 'jig rten mgon po ltar/ /dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa/ /dus mi ring bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /gang zhig dag pa'i de nyid sems// gus pas lcags kyus brtan bkug nas/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /gsang ba'i sgrub thabs gang byas pa/ /gal te de ni bzang gyur na/ /bzang zhes ci phyir rjod par byed/ /gal te dman dang 'dres gyur na/ /slob dpon rnams kyi de bzod mdzod/ /gang zhig rgyud kyi rjes
30a6(rgyud 'grel): 'brengs nas/ /brjod pa dag gis ma shes pa'i/ /rang gi bu bzhin 'phags pa rnams/ /ma lus pa dag bzod par mdzod/ /dpal ldan mgon po bde chen gyis/ /zhabs kyi pad+mas nyer 'tsho ba/ /pad+ma rdo rjes sems can kun/ /rjes su bzung phyir byas pa yi/ /gsang ba grub pa
30b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ /dngos grub kun gyi bla ma'i bla/ /grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po/ /'bad pa nyid kyis bsten par bya/ /blo bzang rtogs pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /gsang ba grub par gang spyod pa/ /mi yi tshe 'di nyid la ni/ /dngos grub ma lus 'thob par 'gyur/ /sems can kun dang dus gcig du//
30b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i spyod pa gang grub pa'i/ /legs pa ma lus gang yod pas/ /dpal ldan slob dpon zhabs grub shog /sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur pas/ /yul gzhan la ni sems zhen pas/ /sgrub dka' yul dang lan cig tu/ /kun rtog thams cad spang bar bya
30b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas skabs lnga ni gnod gyur na/ /skad cig gis ni 'khor bar ltung/ /snyoms dang gnyid dang 'gyod pa dang/ /rgod dang the tshom zhes bya ba'i/ /sgrib pa lnga po sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi bzhed do/ /lnga po de ni yongs spangs nas/ /sangs rgyas
30b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid du nges byas nas/ /smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyis rol na/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang ba de nyid mchog de nyid/ /grub pa gang zhig de brten pa/ /der ni rgyal ba kun 'byung ba/ /gsang ba grub pa zhes byang brjod/ /ces bya'o/ /dgu bcu rtsa lnga pa
30b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i/ /tshigs su bcad pa lnga brgyar ni/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba grub pa zhes byar brjod/ /pad+ma rdo rje'i dga' bas thob gyur bsod nams gang yin pas/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i sar gyur 'jig rten gyur pa yon tan rgyan gnas
30b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur gsang ba grub pa gtan du nyin dang mtshan su sbyor gyur cig /sems can 'di kun ma lus byang chub snying po'i bar du legs par spyod gyur cig /gang zhig rgya mtsho dang bcas sa gzhi ri dang ljon shing sogs pas brgyan pa rnams
30b7(rgyud 'grel): de dag de nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin du chen por gyur pa'i khongs su chud par snang gyur pa/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub dri med zla ba'i 'od zer dpal ldan gsang ba grub pa mchog /mdzad pa thugs rjes gzhan gyi dbang gyur dpal ldan pad+ma rdo rje gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
31a1(rgyud 'grel): don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las/ don dam pa'i slob dpon gyi mchod pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
31a2(rgyud 'grel): ste dgu pa'o// //lha dang lha min la sogs pa ma lus pas/ zhabs kyi pad+ma zung la me tog gi phreng bas mchod pa dpal mgon po bde ba chen po pad+ma badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po
31a3(rgyud 'grel): kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang/ /lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// (//gnyis su med par grub pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba dpal mor mdzad pa bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyo pa ya bi ni shtsA ya
31a4(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+hi/ bod skad du /thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrub pa/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin dri med cing thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin sems gang las ni sangs rgyas kyi//
31a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ma yin kun rtog mdza' dag dri mas ma gos chos sku dang ni mtshungs med pa'i/ /dam chos char gyi gzhir gyur longs spyod dang ni sna tshogs pa yi gzugs dang spyod ldan pa'i/ /yang dag sprul pa skye 'gyur de la gus par phyag byas nas ni de
31a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid bshad pa bya/ /de yi rang bzhin mi shes pa'i/ /skye bo ma lus la phan phyir/ /dpal ldan yan lag med rdo rje/ /bdag gi de nyid mdor bsdu bya/ /byis pas 'khrul pa'i bden min pa'i/ /kun tu rtogs pa las byung dngos/ /kun tu rtogs pa'i bdag
31a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid can/ /de ni srid pa mkhas pas bshad/ /de las bzod dka' rgyun chags pa'i/ /nyon mongs ma lus tshogs rnams dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgya che ba'i/ /las kyi tshogs ni skye bar 'gyur/ /de gnyis las ni skye ba dang/ /'chi ba la sogs rab rgyas
31b1(rgyud 'grel): ?/ /mi bden la zhen sems ldan pa'i/ /shin tu sdug bsngal 'khor mor 'byung/ /shes rab nyams chung de dag ni/ /ji srid dngos 'dzin chen po yod/ /de srid srid pa'i btson rar gnas/ /bdag dang gzhan phan ga la yod/ /de phyir 'gro ba gsum po dag /dga' bar byed
31b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod rang gi ni/ /'khrul pa gsal bar 'dod pa yi/ /bshes gnyen can gyi dngos 'dzin spang/ /gal te ming tsam tha dad kyang/ /rtog pa nyid du dbyer med phyir/ /mkhas pas dngos 'dzin yongs btang ste/ /dngos med bar yang mi brtag go /mar me 'bar ba bsad rung gi /shi
31b3(rgyud 'grel): na ci yang byar med par/ /dngos por 'dzin pa nyid rung gi /dngos med 'dzin pa de ltar min/ /yang dag dngos po med rtog pa/ /de yi dngos po mtshon 'gyur te/ /gang phyir nam mkha' zhig pa ni/ /med pas dang po bral ba min/ /thabs dang bral bar gyur pa yi/ /dngos med tsam zhig
31b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub gyur kyang/ /med phyir nam mkha' i me tog bzhin/ /bdag gzhan don ni nus ma yin/ /mig 'phrul lta bur 'khrul ba'i phyir/ /de ltar dngos po yongs su btang/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yi/ /med phyir dngos med de bzhin no/ /de gnyis ji ltar yongs btang dang/ /btang
31b5(rgyud 'grel): nas gang du gnas pa ni/ /'khor min mya ngan 'das min pa/ /de ni mkhas pas mnyan par gyis/ /shes dang shes bya rab phye ste/ /sbyor bas yongs su brtags nas ni/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /shes rab de nyid du ni brjod/ /ma lus sdug bsngal rgya mtsho dang//
31b6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal las 'don gang yin pa/ /snying rje sems can la chags pas/ /'dod chags zhes ni bya bar grags/ /rtag tu rjes mthun sbyor ba yi/ /skye bo mngon par 'dod pa yi/ /'bras bu gang yin nyer sbyin pas/ /de nyid thabs zhes bya bar bsgrags/ /chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa
31b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /gnyis med rnam par sbyor ba yis/ /gnyis po 'dus pa gang yin pa/ /shes rab thabs zhes bya bar brjod/ /de ltar gang la bzhag pa dang/ /gsal bar nus pa ma yin zhing/ /bzhag dang bsal ba spangs pa ni/ /chos rnams de bzhin nyid ces brjod/ /bzung
32a1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba/ /yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs shing/ /mtshan gzhi dang ni mtshan nyid grol/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /gnyis dang gnyis med zhi ba dang/ /thams cad la gnas dge ba ste/ /so so rang rig mi g.yo zhing
32a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab mi 'khrugs pas/ /de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa'i gnas/ /legs dang lha yi phun tshogs byed/ /chos kyi dbyings su rab tu grags/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa'i/ /mi gnas mya ngan
32a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa ste/ /yid 'ong bdag byin brlabs pa'i gnas/ /shes rab pha rol phrin dge ba/ /theg pa gsum dang sku gsum dang/ /bye ba grangs med sngags dang ni/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dag/ /'jig rten pa dang de las 'das/ /lha dang lha min mi
32a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /yi dags la sogs de bzhin gzhan/ /de nyid las ni byung nas su/ /de nyid du na thim par 'gyur/ /ma lus pa yi 'gro rnams la/ /yid bzhin nor ltar kun tu gnas/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /spyod dang grol ba yang dag
32a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /de nyid yang dag rtogs nas su/ /sngon gyi bde gshegs sangs rgyas la/ /thams cad du ni sangs rgyas zhing/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /dpag med bde ba'i rang bzhin phyir/ /dpal ldan bde chen zhes bya la/ /kun tu bzang po mdog
32a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang/ /mngon par byang chub byed pa po mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rjes 'gro ba gsum yi sdug bsngal ma lus pa/ /'joms par byed pa gcig pu rab 'jug dang ni dpag med sna tshogs pa'i/ /tshogs la chags pa las ni rnam grol blo mchog mnyam
32a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa/ /bdag gzhan phan dang bde rgyud de nyid du ni thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs/ /de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa bsgrub pa las/ /shes rab dang thabs rnam par spros pa'i rim par phye ba ste dang po'o// /
32b1(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhom dka' 'khrul ba yi/ /nad kyis gzhom pa dag la phan pa dang/ /de nyid rin chen thob bya'i phyir/ /de nas 'di la cung zad bshad/ /dpal ldan yan lag med rdo rje/ /snying rjer zhugs pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/ /thabs ni ji bzhin
32b2(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdu bya/ /de 'di yin zhes rgyal bas kyang/ /de ni brjod par nus ma yin/ /so so rang rig rang bzhin phyir/ /dag gi lam ni bzung bya min/ /de lta na yang dus gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas 'gro rnams dag mdzad pas/ /mdo sde du ma gsang sngags kyi/ /spyod pa la sogs rim gyis
32b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /sgra dang don dag 'brel med phyir/ /thos pa la sogs shes pa yis/ /yul du nam yang 'gyur ma yin/ /bstan bcos mtshan nyid ston pa yin/ /de phyir skyes bu dam pa yi/ /bla ma dam pa bsten pa'i rigs/ /de ma gtogs par de nyid ni/ /bskal pa bye bas thob
32b4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur/ /zhing bzang shin tu sbyangs pa las/ /sa bon med pa'i myu gu bzhin/ /de nyid rin chen ma rnyed par/ /nam yang dngos grub 'gyur ma yin/ /rnam par mi rtog lam la gnas/ /thabs dang shes rab don ston pa'i/ /man ngag ldan pa 'ga' tsam ste/ /yid bzhin nor bu bzhin
32b5(rgyud 'grel): du 'byung/ /sa steng gi ni slob dpon te/ /nges par yongs su shes byas la/ /dngos grub mchog ni bdag sgrub phyir/ /de ni 'bad pas bsnyen bkur bya/ /gang zhig gis ni gzi brjid kyis/ /khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i/ /'byung po kun gyi dge legs dang/ /dpag
32b6(rgyud 'grel): med byang chub bde mchog thob/ /ltos pa med par thugs brtse ba'i/ /thugs rje'i sku can de la ni/ /bsam ngan rgyu yi dri bcas pa'i/ /sems kyis ci phyir 'dud par byed/ /ji srid 'dod pa rnyed par du/ /kun tu phyag dang bkur sti dang/ /'bad de 'chang la sogs pas mchod/ /bsnyen bkur sri
32b7(rgyud 'grel): zhu bla mar byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gnas/ /rin chen de nyid thob gyur nas/ /sdang las skyon rnams rtog byed cing/ /'dri med tsam yang byed mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gzhan yang ngan pa'i bdag /bla ma rdo rje can bsten nas/ /tso 'dri bar ni byed pa'i bdag /bsam ngan rang la tsa 'dri 'am/
33a1(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum gyi bskor dang ni/ /bla ma'i phyag rgya 'phrog par byed/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dam chos la/ /ma spyad pas na dmod par byed/ /dam tshig ngo mtshar che gyur la/ /rtag tu smod byed blo ldan la/ /nga yang shin tu skrag byed ces/ /dpal ldan rdo
33a2(rgyud 'grel): rje mgon pos gsungs/ /bsnyen bkur med par myur ba ru/ /bdag ni rjes su bzung 'tshal brjod/ /sdang ba'i sems kyis gzhan brten te/ /kha cig nyes pa sgrogs la brtson/ /sangs rgyas don du mi gnyer zhing/ /rnal 'byor pa dang slob dpon zhes/ /bdag ni ci nas ?
33a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba/ /de tsam la ni zhugs pa yin/ /brgya la ye shes rnyed 'gyur na/ /khengs pa bla ma las sdang bar/ /sngags kyi rim pa las 'ongs pa/ /'di ni bdag gis shes zhes brjod/ /slar la 'bul gyi yas dang bzung/ /de nas brtsams te yas kyis ni/ /slob ma
33a4(rgyud 'grel): nga min slob dpon min/ /khro bcas sma ba gzhan dag yod/ /bla ma slu ba'i bsam pa yi/ /co 'dri byed cing khyad byed pa/ /tshe 'di bde ba yod min na/ /de dag ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de lta bu yi sems can gang/ /rang gi don la rgyab phyogs yin/ /de ni ngan 'gro
33a5(rgyud 'grel): kun snod du/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mgon pos gsungs/ /bdag nyid sun 'byin byed pa de/ /dmyal las 'gro ba gzhan yod min/ /shin tu mi zad? las rnams kyis/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos 'tshed/ /de bas dam pa don gnyer ba'i/ /skyes bus dngos po thams
33a6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis/ /dpag med 'bras bu rab ster ba'i/ /slob dpon kun tu bsten par bya/ /byang chub tu ni nges byas pas/ /phrag dog nga rgyal ser sna dang/ /de bzhin g.yo dang sgyu dang ni/ /skyo dub 'du shes yongs spangs te/ /rtag tu du yi spyod pa bzhin/ /mi g.yo ba yi sems
33a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni/ /dngos grub kun don ster ba'i bla/ /'gro ba'i mgon po bsnyen bkur bya/ /shin tu gus pas dus gsum du/ /zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas shing/ /rang gi lus la'ang ltos med par/ /maN+Dal sngon 'gro mchod pa bya/ /de nas bla ma'i bka' drin gyis/ /dus gsum
33b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/ /de nyid dam pa bgegs med par/ /slob ma yis ni thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu 'od gsal dag pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i gnas 'gyur byang chub sems/ /gsal ba chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos/ /phun tshogs ma lus bde par 'gyur/ /mun pa'i tshogs
33b2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'joms byed pa'i/ /nyi ma dang ni nye ba yi/ /me shel gyi ni nor bu las/ /rab 'bar me lce 'byung ba bzhin/ /slob ma'i sems ni nor bu la/ /'gro ba gzigs pa nyer 'gyur na/ /dri ma 'joms byad rnal 'byor gyi/ /ma lce rno 'bar de bzhin no/ /dpal ldan de nyid rin
33b3(rgyud 'grel): chen ni/ /rab tu rtogs pas 'bar rjes la/ /phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/ /thugs rjes thugs ni 'phangs nas su/ /myur du byin nas slob ma ni/ /sangs rgyas byin rlob gdon mi za/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin
33b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /brtan pas g.yo dang zol dang nga rgyal sgrib pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas ni/ /man ngag ldan pa'i bla ma mtshungs pa med pa dang pas 'dir ni bstan par bya/ /nges de nges par rgyal ba'i yon tan bter 'gyur de nyid rin chen rnyed gyur nas/ /bde gshegs gnas
33b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brnyes pa'i byang chub mchog ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa las rdo rje slob dpon bsnyen bkur nges par brtan pa'i rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o// //rdo rje sems dpa' i gnas 'dod
33b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ /dbang bskur srid gsum phun tshogs gnas/ /de nas 'di la yang dag bshad/ /bde gshegs gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyud kyi lam gyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /mkhas pas gang tshe dbang bskur na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum
33b7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /dpag med 'jig rten khams dbang phyug /bdag phyin brlab pa'i dbang thob pa/ /dam tshig nyams kyi 'jigs pas na/ /blo ldan de dag gis kyang 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du/ /sngags kyi lam las de bzhin gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
34a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs lha'i/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'i/ sngags kyi laM du de bzhin gsungs/ /de bas do kun la 'bad pas/ /dbang bskur don gnyer rgyal bdag sras/ /rdo rje slob dpon yon tan mtsho/ /ji ltar rig pas bsnyan par bya/ /gzugs dang lang tsho
34a2(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs/ /mig bzad? phyag rgya rnyed nas ni/ /gos dang tsandan phreng sogs kyis rab tu brgyan te dbul bar bya/ /dri dang phreng sogs bsnyen bkur dang/ /chang dang ston mo rgya chen dang/ /phyag rgyar bcas pa'i gtso bos ni/ /gus pas 'bad de yang dag
34a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /slob mas dad pas pus lha nga/ /sa la legs par btsugs nas ni/ /thal sbyor bcas pa'i bstod pa 'dis/ /ston pa la ni gsol gdab bya/ /rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa yi/ /stong nyid snying po bstod phyag 'tshal/ /kun mkhyen ye shes
34a4(rgyud 'grel): phung po can/ /ye shes sku khyod phyag 'tshal la/ /'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa po/ /bdag don de nyid ston mdzad pa/ /chos bdag med las yang dag byung/ /rdo rje sems khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang/ /sa dang pha rol
34a5(rgyud 'grel): phyin yon tan/ /rtag tu mgon po khyod las byung/ /byang chub sems khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /dkon mchog gsum dang theg chen gyi/ /de nyid brtan dang g.yo bcas pa/ /khams gsum 'di dag thams cad kyi/ /'gro ba'i sa bon khyod la 'dud/ /'gro don sna
34a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs grub pa'i phyir/ /yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung/ /dpal ldan bde gshegs bka' bzhin mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sras po khyod la 'dud/ /yon tan rgya mtsho bka' drin gyi/ /de nyid bla med shes par 'tshal/ /kun mkhyan ye shes dbang bskur ba//
34a7(rgyud 'grel): da ltar bka' drin mdzad du gsol/ /dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po/ /rdo rje chos la bstan pa bzhin/ /de ring mgon pos bka' drin gsol/ /khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni/ /bdag la gzhan ni skyabs ma mchis/ /
34b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i dgra las rab rgyal ba'i/ /mgon pos de phyir brtse bar mdzod/ /da nas dpal ldan slob dpon ni/ /phan pa'i bsam pas rjes brtse bas/ snying rje slob ma la bskyed de/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas gang ba'i/ /dril bu sil snyan sgra dang bcas/ /bla re 'bar ba bres ba ru
34b2(rgyud 'grel): me tog bdug pa nyams dga' 'khrigs/ /phreng ba dri zhim mchog tu bde/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lan gyi lha/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnal 'byor ldan/ /mchog tu rmad byung gnas gyur pa'i/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor bkug nas ni/ /de nas slob dpon bskal bzangs kyis/ /phyag rgya dang ni
34b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar byas te/ /rgyal ba'i gnas gyur byang chub sems/ /pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni/ /bkra shis glu yi tshigs bcad dang/ /gdugs dang rnga yab rgyal mtshan bcas/ /phyag rgyad ldan pas slob ma ni/ /'gro pa'i gtso bor dbang bskur bya/ /slob dpon dbang phyug mchog gis
34b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dbang bskur rin chen byin nas su/ /rang bzhin gsal zhing mngon sbyangs pa/ /dam tshig nyams dga' sbyin par bya/ /rin chen chen po ga bur bcas/ /tsandan dmar po sbyar ba dang/ /rdo rje yi ni chu dang bcas/ /lnga pa dag las yang dag byung/ /'di ni bu khyod dam tshig ste//
34b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis 'thun par gsungs/ /bzang pos rtag tu bskyang bar byos/ /de ni ston pa mnyan par gyis/ /srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing/ /bud med rin chen spang mi bya/ /khyod kyi slob dpon yong mi spang/ /sdom pa shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur bas/ /
34b6(rgyud 'grel): slob ma sdig dang bral bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sras mchog de la ni/ /rjes su gnang ba de nas sbyin/ /byang chub snying po'i mthar thug par/ /phyogs kyi 'khor lo kun tu ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pa/ /sems can mchog gis bskor ba gyis/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin bdag
34b7(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin nor ltar rgya che ba/ /chags dang bral zhing mi skyo bas/ /da ni sems can rnams don gyis/ /rjes gnang bcas pa'i dbang bskur thob/ /bya ba byas shing rab dga' bas/ /'gro kun dga' bar byed pa yi/ /'jam pa'i tshig ni brjod par bya/ /de ring bdag gson
35a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu yod/ /de ring skye ba 'bras bu yod/ /de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /de ring sangs rgyas sras por gyur/ /skye la sogs pa'i rba rlabs dang/ /nyon mongs 'dam ni rgal dka' ba'i/ /rtog pa'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen las/ /mgon pos
35a2(rgyud 'grel): de ring bdag bsgral to/ /khyod zhabs bka' drin shes nas su/ /byang chub gang gis bdag 'tshal ba'i/ /bag chags thams cad spangs nas su/ /rdzogs pa'i bzhin du bdag 'gyur ro/ /mig mdangs 'dzum dang bcas pa yi/ /gus pas zhabs la btud nas su//
35a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rdzas ni gang dang gang bzhed pa/ /de dang de ni dbul bar bya/ /bla ma thugs rje can gyis kyang/ /slob ma'i 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir/ /de la phan phyir blang bar bya/ /bla ma'i yon ni phul nas su/ /de nas mchod de phyag byas la/ /mngon
35a4(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pa'i gnas thob nas/ /slar yang 'di yi mkhyen par gsol/ /de ring sangs rgyas mchog khyod kyis/ /bka' drin bdag gis thob par 'gyur/ /de mthus bla med byang chub ni/ /ji bzhin bdag gis sgrub par bgyi/ /mchog kun gyis ni mchod pa'i
35a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /bla med byang chub thob nas ni/ /srid gsum gnas pa'i sems can gnas/ /de nyid la ni dgod par bgyi/ /cho ga 'di dag nyid kyi dbang bskur byin nas ni/ /slob ma'i lhag par mos pa'i yid kyis brtag byas la/ /zab cing rgya che ba la lhag
35a6(rgyud 'grel): par mos na ni/ /tshig gi rin chen dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur mchog ni ma lus thob par gyur pa de/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin rnyed dka' mtshungs pa med pa'i gnas/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa dang ni dpal gyi zhing gyur pa/ /byang chub sems chen dbang bskur
35a7(rgyud 'grel): blang bar bya/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrub pa las/ byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba nges par bstan par rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o// //gzhan don la phan brtson 'grus can/ /sgrub pa po la phan
35b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /shes rab thabs kyi bsgom pa mchog /de nas 'di las gsal bshad bya/ /gang zhig bsgoms pas 'khor ba yi/ /'jigs rung rgal dka' i rgya mtsho min/ /rang don tsam gyis mya ngan 'das/ /der yang rnal 'byor pa mi gnas/ /gang zhig rab kyi mthar phyin
35b2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /dri med rmad byung sangs rgyas nyid/ /'phel dang 'grib las rnam grol ba'i/ /bla med byang chub skye 'gyur ba'o/ /phung po lnga la sogs chos rnams/ /gang yang dor bar bya min zhing/ /nam yang gzung bar bya ba'ang min/ /chos kun mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid/ /stong nyid
35b3(rgyud 'grel): sgom par bya min la/ /stong nyid min pa'ang mi sgom mo/ /stong nyid rnal 'byor pas mi gtang/ /stong nyid min pa'ang yongs mi btang/ /stong nyid stong min nyid 'dzin pa/ /rtog pa rab rgyas skye bar 'gyur/ /yongs su btang ba'ang rtog pa ste/ /de bas de gnyis yongs su spangs//
35b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa gnyis ka yongs btang na/ /chags bral rnam par grol ba'i gnas/ /de dang 'brel bdag ces pa yang/ /kun rtog de phyir de gnyis spang/ /chags pa med cing 'gyur ba med/ /sdig pa dang bral mngon zhen med/ /thog ma tha ma'i rtog las grol/ /mkhas pas nam
35b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lta bur bsgom/ /snying rjer ldan pas sems can la/ /rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya'o/ /sems can yod dang med ces par/ /rnam rtog nyid ni mi bya'o/ /spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang/ /shes rab ces byar rab tu grags/ /yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhin du/ /ma
35b6(rgyud 'grel): lus 'gro don byed snying rje/ /mi dmigs gnas kyi shes rab dang/ /mi dmigs snying rje chen po ste/ /nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /blo ldan lhan cig gnyis su med/ /gang na'ang bsgom pa po med cing/ /rnam par bsgom pa'ang ci yang med/ /bsgom bya nyid
35b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang yod min pa/ /de ni de nyid bsgom par bshad/ /bya ba'ang cung zad yod min la/ /dpyad par bya ba nyid kyang med/ /byed po dpyod pa las grol ba/ /don dam rnam par bsgom pa yin/ /gtong bar byed pa'ang yod min zhing/ /'gog par byed pa'ang ci yang med//
36a1(rgyud 'grel): des na dor bar bya med cing/ /'di la blang bya gang yang med/ /gzugs rnams kun tu blta ba dang/ /de bzhin sgra rnams nyan pa dang/ /rgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang/ /ro rnams sna tshogs myang ba dang/ /las rnams thams cad byed ba ni//
36a2(rgyud 'grel): sems ni mi g.yo gnas byas nas/ /de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/ /rnal 'byor rgyun tu skye bar 'gyur/ /de nyid gnyis med brtan pa ste/ /byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
36a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /pha rol phyin pa kun dngos kyi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin 'di nyid/ /'di ni mnyam nyid brjod pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bsgom pa'i mchog /byang chub sems dpa' mdza' yas dang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i bdag
36a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi/ /'gro ba thams cad 'di las skyes/ /dngos dang dngos med dang bral ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid bsgom/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol ba/ /bsgom pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyes pa ma lus dang bral zhing/ /nges par sdug bsngal
36a5(rgyud 'grel): ldog 'gyur na/ /dpal ldan bde gshegs yon tan ni/ /mdza' yas de las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /kun rtog mun pa sdug bsngal ba/ /stug pos mngon par zil gnon cing/ /'dod chags la sogs bzlog bka' i dri mas g.yogs gyur pa'i/ /rab tu
36a6(rgyud 'grel): 'thor rlung gis skyod glog ltar g.yo ba yi/ /sems ni 'khor ba yin par rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rtog pa las ni rnam par grol zhing 'od gsal ba/ /'dod chags la sogs dri ma'i sgrib g.yogs rab tu spangs/ /bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa med na de nyid e
36a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i don du sems can mchog gis gsungs/ /de bas sdug bsngal mang po chogs? kyi rgyur gyur pa/ /'di las gzhan pa gang yang yod pa ma yin la/ /thar 'dod 'phags pa khyed kyi bde ba dpag med pa/ /skye ba'i rgyur yang 'di las
36b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa gang yang med/ /sdug bsngal ma lus zad bya'i go cha bgos nas ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bde mchog thob par 'dod pa yi/ /sems ni brten byas de la 'bad de dpyad byas la/ /de yi rang bzhin bdag gi rang bzhin nyid du bya/ /skye ldan rnams kyi yid 'di ji srid
36b2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i mun pa snam bu 'thug pos dkris gyur pa/ /de srid sdug bsngal dpag tu med yin de nas de ni ji srid bshus par gyur pa na/ /de srid bde ba rgya chen mtshungs med yin pas 'phags mchog de la nan tan gyis shig dang/ /de zad nas ni de nyid la gnas yon tan rgyas pa
36b3(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid kyis ni snang bar 'gyur/ /de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa las de kho na nyid bsgom pa'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o// //chos kun mnyam nyid rmad byung ba/ /de nyid spyod pa bla na med/ /rnam rtog dgra rnams
36b4(rgyud 'grel): gsod byed pa/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa gzhan rdzogs sangs rgyas la gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas la phan bya'i phyir/ /de nyid yan lag med rdo rjes/ /de nas 'di las gsal bshad bya/ /rga ba la sogs rba rlabs 'khrigs/ /skye ba'i rgya mtshor cher 'jigs las/ /'byung po
36b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sgrol ba'i gru/ /nyes med par ni 'gro ba'i gru/ /yid 'ong yon tan kun gyi gnas/ /myur du dngos grub bzang po byed/ /'dod pa'i don kun rab sgrub pa/ /yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung/ /ma lus pa yi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyur 'gyur rdo rje 'dzin pas
36b6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bsngags pa ste/ /'di ma gtogs par dngos grub skye bar 'gyur ba min/ /de phyir thar pa 'dod pas spyod pa mnyam med 'di spyad bya/ /lha min sgra dang brgya byin grong khyer gsum dgra nor sbyin tshangs sogs rnams kyi zhabs kyi pad+mar mched byas pa/ /bde bar
36b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i go 'phangs mchog ni myur du thob byed sdig pa zad byed 'di ni mkhas pas spyad par bya/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpas 'gro la phan phyir yang dag spyod pa 'di gsungs te/ /sna tshogs gzhan dag ma lus gdul bya'i skye bo du ma'i dbang du byas nas ni/ /ji skad gsungs
37a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs bla med dngos grub ma lus rab sgrub min/ /kun bzang mtshungs med spyod pa 'di las 'grub 'gyur bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /dpal ldan slob dpon rdo rje can/ /mgon la kun nas phyag byas la/ /bya ba byas pa'i
37a2(rgyud 'grel): blo can gyis/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa brten par bya/ /de nas rang 'dod nges byas la/ /'du 'dzi kun la rgyab phyogs te/ /seng ge'i bdag nyid kun rgyu ba/ /de nyid ldan pas spyad par bya/ /'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis/ /ji bzhin yang dag don rig pas/ /yang dag ldan pas
37a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa bdag /gnas med sems ni brtan par bya/ /khams gsum 'di dag de nyid de/ /phung po khams la sogs mtshan nyid/ /thams cad sgyu ma rmi lam bzhin/ /mdor bsdus 'di ltar shes byas las/ /'gyod dang rmugs dang gnyid la sogs/ /longs spyod
37a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen 'du 'dzi dang/ /de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad po/ /shin tu thag ring spang bar bya/ /gnyis med nges par byas nas ni/ /rtag tu g.yo ba med pa yis/ /pha rol phyin drug sbyor ba ni/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub sgrub par bya/ /sems can rnam par mi rtog bzhin//
37a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can don la shin tu chags/ /sems ni byang chub nges byas la/ /de nyid spyod pa la brten bya/ /shes rab thabs su ldan pa yis/ /chags pa kun la rgyab bstan te/ /de nyid goms pa la 'bad pas/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag byin brlab
37a6(rgyud 'grel): par rab gsal bas/ /sems ni ji ltar rjes mthun par/ /sngags kyi lam las rab bshad pa'i/ /dam tshig dag ni kun spyad bya/ /bgegs dang bdud tshogs zhi bya'i phyir/ /bdud rtsi lnga po byin gyis brlabs/ /bshang gci la sogs rnams gnas pa/ /'di ni
37a7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba bla med yin/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyi 'tshe/ /bdud dang log 'dren nyid dag ni/ /'di yi rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /mi dang rnga mo las byung dang/ /rta dang glang po las byung ba/ /lnga pa khyi las byung ba ste/ /sgron ma
37b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab can gyi bza' / /sems ni dga' bar byed pa yi/ /dam tshig chen po gzhan dag kyang/ /rlung ni 'khrug bzhi bya'i phyir/ /thugs kyi rdo rje can mnyes bya/ /thams cad du ni thar 'dod pas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin bsten bya/ /dam pa'i don du gang gnas pa/ /kun rdzob
37b2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i lus bzung nas/ /bud med mdzes pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /thams cad du ni kun tu gnas/ /de bas phyi rol don las byung/ /rdo rje mgon pos don de gsungs/ /bram ze rigs sogs las byung dang/ /mdza' las skyes dang phyag rgya dang/ /gzhan gyi chung ma tshul
37b3(rgyud 'grel): nyams dang/ /dman dang cha lugs mi sdug dang/ /skyed ma dang ni sgyug mo dang/ /rang gi bu mo sring mo dag /de nyid sbyor bas don sbyor na/ /sgrub po myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems ni tshim par byed pa yi/ /gling bu sogs las byung ba mnyan/ /phyi rol phyag rgya ka ri na/ /ro
37b4(rgyud 'grel): ni sna tshogs tshim byed bya/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan mchog rnams kyis/ /sems ni rin chen dag bya'i phyir/ /rtag tu bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /chu skyes rdo rje chu dang ni/ /sgron ma'i 'o ma rab rgyas mchod/ /phreng dang tsandan gos bzang
37b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /sems ni skyo ba med par bya/ /bgrod dang bgrod min sogs pa ni/ /'dir ni nam yang bya ba min/ /sgyu ma lta bu sogs sbyor bas/ /thams cad la ni longs spyod bya/ /chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na/ /mi mthun phyogs ni gang yang med/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems
37b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab spyad bya/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa/ /'di dag thams cad longs spyad phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa yin/ /ye shes mdza' yas rnyed pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs la 'ang phyag min na/ /rtag tu
37b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom la 'grus pa yis/ /lugs ma la sogs smos ci dgos/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /de bas bdag nyid lha yin no/ /smyung ba dang ni dkyil 'khor 'bri/ /phyag rgya bcing dang mchod rten las/ /sbyin
38a1(rgyud 'grel): sreg dang ni gsang sngags bzlos/ /po ti klog pa la sogs pa/ dpal ldan rdo rje mgon po yis/ /mos pa'i dbang du mdzad nas ni/ /gzhan dag la ni bstan pa ste/ /de nyid rig pa'i sems kyis min/ /mar
38a2(rgyud 'grel): sar 'dod pas snying po ni/ /blangs te dar ba 'dor bar byed/ /de ltar chos kyi snying thob pas/ /rtog pa ma lus spang bar bya/ /rnam par mi rtog gnas blo can/ /gnas min dags pa spang byas na/ /thugs kyi rdo rje bka' bzhin du/ de nas 'grub 'gyur the tshom med//
38a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya sbyor bas kun tu 'khyud/ /rdo rje bcug ste bskyod pa dang/ /ma mchu'i sbrang mchog btung bya zhing/ /de yi mgrin pa'i sgra gsal ba/ /glang zhing dul bas longs spyad na/ /nges par dga' ba rgya chen gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod pa'i rgyal/ /ring por
38a4(rgyud 'grel): mi thogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar yid 'khrugs mi 'gyur bas/ /de lta de ltar spyad par bya/ /sems kyi rang bzhin 'khrugs gyur na/ /nam yang dngos grub 'gyur ma yin/ /de bas dngos grub mchog 'dod pa'i/ /grub pa pos ni 'dzin pa spang/ /sems
38a5(rgyud 'grel): dang rjes mthun sbyor ba yis/ /dngul chu bzung bar bsgrub ji bzhin/ /thabs kyi gzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin sems kyi dngul chu bzung/ /sbyor ba dag ni gang yin pa/ /de ru de yi gnas par bya/ /dus dang grangs ni yongs spangs nas/ /de nyid rig pas
38a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur/ /gnyis med mtshungs pa med pa gang yin nyin re zhing/ de nyid mchog ni rgyun tu rjes su bsten par bya/ /'di yi dri ma med cing rdo rje lta bu dang/ /grib ma lta bu sku ni mtshungs med thob par 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pas shes rab kyis ni chos rnams
38a7(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /mchog gi go 'phang sgrub par bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dri ma med par rnam 'byed de/ /'jig rten gsum gyi sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir/ /nyin rar brtson 'grus go cha chen po bgos nas su/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje sems//
38b1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan ma lus pa yi gter gyur bsgom par bya/ /sems ni byang chub ngo bor gzhag nas yul gyi ni/ /bde la dga' bas tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang bzhin gyis ni ma lus 'di dag rnam dag ste/ /tha mal yul rnams bdag med sgyu ma lta bu dang/ /mig
38b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul dang ni mig yor dag dang mtshungs pa ste/ /gnas med rtog pa'i tha snyad dag las rnam par grol/ /gang tshe skyes bu dag pa rgya che bsam pa dang/ /'dzin pa med pa'i sems ni kun tu rtogs 'gyur ba/ /de tshe lhan cig skyes pa'i rtog pa zil mnon te/ /yul 'di rnams
38b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi nus pa 'ching bar nus ma yin/ /gang rnams rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags dang/ /bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal rab tu rgyas pa dang/ /bstod dang smad pa'i dri ma rab tu ma lus pa/ /zad pa rang gi sems ni mnyam pa nyid du bya/ /chags pa med dang 'gro la snying ni
38b4(rgyud 'grel): brtse ba yi/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad las grol sbyor ba dang/ /ldan pa de yi phyag na bde gshegs go 'phang ni/ /gnas pa yin zhes rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gsungs/ /gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i blo can gyi/ /skye bo gshis ngan kha yi du ga ni/ /zab mo
38b5(rgyud 'grel): gya? gyu nas byung tshig ngan sprul/ /rtsub mo'i las kyi su zhig 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /shin tu dri med dga' byed 'od kyi phreng can gyi/ /'od zer 'tsho skyes kyis ni bzod par mi nus ltar/ /yid 'phrog byed pa'i bdud rtsi mang du bshad pa yang/ /skye po 'dzangs min
38b6(rgyud 'grel): yid ni chags par byed pa min/ /zla ba'i 'od zer de nyid chu shel nor bu dang/ /shin tu nye bar 'dus nas bdud rtsi chu 'dzag bzhin/ /de nyid skye bo bzang yid bdud rtsi rol brlan zhing/ /mi gnas mchi ma 'dzag bzhin chags par byed/ /de bas bdag ni chos nyid
38b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i skye bo bzang/ /'phags pa shes ldan khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /bdag gis mdo du bsdus te gsal bar bya ba ni/ /rab mchog gang yin de ni khyod la dbul par bgyi/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa ni bdag gis kyang ni 'di ru
39a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nges par bstan/ /ci ste nyes par smras pa yod gyur pa/ /de lta na yang 'phags pa bzod par zhu/ /bla ma zhabs kyi pad+mar bsten pas rnam sprul pa'i/ /bdud rtsi dge ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba/ /gang yin can de 'gro ba
39a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi thun mong yun ring du/ /phan byed ma lus brtse bas bdag gis byas pa ste/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum gyi rgya mtsho yon tan mtsho/ /rab mchog lha dang lha min dbang po'i cod pan gyis/ /sgrub thabs de nyid rig pa rnams la myur du ni//
39a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu ster ba gang yin 'di ni byas pa las/ /bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen thob gyur pa/ /'di yis 'gro rnams rtog pa'i dgra yi tshogs las ni/ /rgyal bar 'gyur te blo ldan yon tan rgyur 'gyur ba/ /byang chub sems dang de dag shin tu ldan gyur
39a4(rgyud 'grel): cig/ de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa las/ /de kho na nyid kyi spyod par nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o// //thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa slob dpon
39a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos lha btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// (//ye shes grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub
39a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs dbang po'i blos mdzad pa bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na sid+d+hi nA ma sA d+ha no pi kA/ bod skad du/ ye shes grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun dang dngos grub ni/ /nam
39a7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lta bur khyab gyur pa/ /rgyal mchog mchod dang bcas pa yi/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje mchog /sems can kun la kun gsol ba'i/ /'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal te/ /dngos grub kun la bdag gus pas/ /sgrub pa'i rim 'di bshad par bya/ /ma
39b1(rgyud 'grel): lus sbyong rgyud las gsungs pa'i/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /rmongs pa gang gis mi shes pa/ /de ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyam/ /gang zhig rtog pa kun spangs pa'i/ /de nyid la ni yang dag gnas/ /sgrub pa po de tshe 'di yis/ /byang chub dam par gnas par 'gyur/ /sngags dang
39b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dkyil 'khor sogs/ /bzlas dang bsgom la 'bad pa yis/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med duAng/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob mi 'gyur/ /gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs/ /longs spyod dbang phyug stobs rnams dang/ /rigs de brgyud dang gtso bar 'gyur ba'i/ /sems can
39b3(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal bcang mi bya/ /bdag ni blo ldan mkhas pa dang/ /bzo dang sgyu rtsal thams cad la/ /mkhas pa dag ni rgyal po zhes/ /sems ni bskyed par mi bya'o/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing thos ldan brtan/ /sbyin pa la sogs yang dag ldan/ /bshad dang gzhan yang ma bshad? pas/ /bdag
39b4(rgyud 'grel): tu dmigs par mi bya zhing/ /sems can kun gyi yid khyab par/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid zhugs/ /de ltar bsams nas rnal 'byor gyis/ /dbang pos gang la'ang brnyas mi bya/ /byis pa blun dang dbul po dang/ /tshul khrims 'chal cing nad kyis gzir/ /de la sogs
39b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dpag med dang/ /yang dag ldan yar brnyas mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus/ /byang chub sems kyis rnam par brgyan/ /sems can kun la rjes su brtse/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom la gnas/ /dri chen dmar dang sha nyid dag/ /byang chub sems dang rab sres la/ /
39b6(rgyud 'grel): chu chen dang ni yang dag ldan/ /de nyid rig pas rtog tu bza' / /mi khyi rta dang ba lang sgron/ /sna can dang ni khur skyed kyi'ang/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs la/ /de nyid grub phyir bza' bar bya/ /srid gsum las byung bsad bya zhing/ /pha rol nor ni 'brog pa dang/ /gzhan
39b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi bud med la 'dod spyod/ /brdzun gyi tshig ni smra bar byed/ /las gang gis ni sems can rnams/ /bskal pa bya ba brgya phrag tuAng/ /mi zad dmyal bar 'tshed 'gyur pa/ /des ni rnal 'byor pa 'grel 'gyur/ /thabs chen yang dag ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor 'jig rten don
40a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa/ /sems can kun gyis smad pa yi/ /bya ba de la mi bya med/ /shes rab thabs dang ldan pa la/ /sdig par grags pa yod med ces/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sprul pa las/ /rdo rje lan ni nyid kyis gsungs/ /bza' dang bza' min las 'das dang/ /btung
40a2(rgyud 'grel): dang btung min rnam par spangs/ /bgrong dang bgrong min rnam grol bdag /rnal 'byor pa ni mnyam 'jog 'gyur/ /rten 'brel las byung yang dag dngos/ /dngos po thams cad rnam par brtag/ 'gro 'ong dag las rnam grol zhing/ /skye ba med pa bdag med can/ /sgyu ma
40a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra sogs dpe yis ni/ /de rnams sbyor bar rab shes pas/ /nga dang bdag ni rnam rtog dag/ de nyid shes pas der mi bya/ /rdo rje chen pos kun khyab cing/ /nam mkha' kun la rab tu zhugs/ /sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing/ /bsod nams thams cad 'byung ba
40a4(rgyud 'grel): che/ /phan tshun khyab mdzad rdo rje ni/ /kun rig 'jig rten 'dren pa po/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /rgyud rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin/ /gang la bla ma'i drin yod pa/ /de yi de nyid mchod rten 'gyur/ /gzhan du byis pas yun ring du/ /rnam par rmongs pas nyon
40a5(rgyud 'grel): mongs 'gyur/ /bla mas sangs rgyas chos 'gyur cing/ /dge 'dun yang ni de bzhin te/ /de yi drin gyis shes 'gyur bas/ /de bas dkon mchog gsum yin no/ /mi shes rab rib kyis ljongs la/ /'di ni lam rab ston byed yin/ /bde ba kun gyi mchog 'gyur dang//
40a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa thams cad rab ster yin/ /zab mo'i chos la nges pa'i bdag/ shin tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /dkon mchog gsum rnams don du gnyer/ /chos sbyin pa la zang zing med/ /bla ma de ni slob ma sdud/ /sangs rgyas kun rjes sgrub byed cing/ /'gro ba'i mgon gyis
40a7(rgyud 'grel): bka' stsal te/ /gzhan dag bla ma min par bshad/ /de bas de dang mnyam pa yi/ /mchod bya po chen yod ma yin/ /des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /brtul zhugs can ni bla mchog mchod/ /de snyam 'gro ba 'jig rten na/ /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /rdo rje sems nyid
40b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten na/ /phun sum tshogs kun phyir zhugs yin/ /slob ma phun tshogs mchog 'dod cing/ /bsod nams mi zad 'dod pa dang/ /bgegs kun rnam par bzlog byed pas/ /rnam pa du mas mnyes par bya/ /dam tshig dag ni thams cad kyis/ /bla med dam tshig 'di yin te/ /
40b2(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs kun ster ba'o/ /brtson ldan rnams kyis rtag tu bsrung/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /ye shes mchog bzang thob pa yi/ /rdo rje ye shes dbang bskur bas/ /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /yang dag ye shes kun ldan na/ /bris pa'i dkyil 'khor
40b3(rgyud 'grel): logs gzhan du/ /dbang bskur ba ni len tsa na/ /'di ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/ /dam tshig nyams pas sdug bsngal ni/ /lus dang de bzhin yid dang ni/ /de yi don rnams nyams 'gyur zhing/ /myur ba nyid du shi bar 'gyur/ /shi nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ni//
40b4(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tuAng/ /myong nas gnas las 'phos gyur na yang/ /gdol pa 'am dman pa'i rigs su skye/ /lkugs pa 'am yang na 'on pa 'am/ /skye zhing skye bar dmus long du/ /skye bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni//
40b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ye shes zhes byar bshad/ /blo ldan de yi dbang bskur na/ /dbang bskur bar ni shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /'gro ba'i bdag po lha sogs pa'i/ /tshogs kyis thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /byas nas mngon par phyag byed 'gyur/ /byang chub
40b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' stobs chen dang/ /bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kyang/ /dpal chen bsrung ba mdzad gyur te/ /rdo rje sku yi rtag tu bzhugs/ /bden pa'i chos 'dzin mi 'khrug cing/ /sangs rgyas gdung ni rab 'jug pa/ /byin gyis brlabs dang ldan pa rnams/ /gus dang bcas
40b7(rgyud 'grel): pas bsngags par mdzad/ /'jig rten skyong dang de bzhin gzhan/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa rnams/ /gnas rnams kun tu rtogs pa na'ang/ /bsrung bzhin du ni rab tu gnas/ /gang yang sems can thams cad la/ /bdud dang bgegs su gnas pa rnams/ /de 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): yang de la mi byed de/ /bgegs rnams skrag nas 'byer bar 'gyur/ /lha la sogs dang grub pa rnams/ /mkha' la rgyu dang mi rgyu kun/ /ngan 'gror 'gro bas 'jigs pas na/ /de yang de la 'jigs mi byed/ /gal te rmongs pa'i dbang gis
41a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rnam par rmongs rnams mgon byed na/ /brtson dang ye shes rnam shes dang/ /dngos grub dag kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /kun mkhyen mchog sbyin gsungs pa'o/ /dbyibs kun dang ni rnam bral zhing/ /'gro dang 'ong las rnam grol bdag /rlung kun gyis
41a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang bskyod mi nus/ /me yi phung pos mi tshig cing/ /chu rnams kyis kyang g.yengs mi 'gyur/ /rab tu 'bad pas mtshon cha ni/ /rnon pos kyang ni chod mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar mi gnas nam mkha' ni/ /khyab cing mtshan nyid rnams dang bral/ /'di ni don dam de nyid de//
41a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ye shes bla med yin/ /kun tu bzang po zhes bshad cing/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes kyang bya/ /'di ni chos skur shes bya ste/ /me long ye shes zhes kyang bya/ /ji ltar gzugs brnyan me long la/ /rang nyid nges par snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin chos skur ye shes
41a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /snang bas me long zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes dang/ /rang gi dang ni 'gro ba'i yang/ /dngos nyid gcig pur thugs su chud/ /mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o/ /gdod nas dag cing skye ba med/ /rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal pa//
41a6(rgyud 'grel): phan tshun khyab pa'i ye shes pas/ /so sor rtog pa can zhes bshad/ /kun tu kun nas sangs rgyas kyis/ /mdzad pa thams cad la 'jug pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mdzad gcig pas/ /bya ba sgrub pa zhes bshad do/ /gang tshe nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib/
41a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad las grol de yi tshe/ /rnal 'byor pa mchog rdo rje can/ /shin tu rnam dag ces bshad do/ /ji ltar gdul bya'i chos rnams dang/ /'dod yon kun las sangs rgyas rnams/ /thams cad longs spyod gcig pas na/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur 'dod do//
41b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rnams kun dang yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs sku ste mtshan nyid med/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul ba bas/ /sprul pa'i skur ni bshad pa yin/ /phyag rgya chen po rab sgrub phyir/ /shes nas rnal 'byor bas de bsgom/ /kun rtog thams cad rnam spangs na/ /tshe
41b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag mdzad pa/ /phyag rgya che zhes shes par bya/ /grub sde du ma'i rgyud rnams su/ /rnal 'byor mchog rnams la bstan te/ /mngal 'byung rig pa gang yin dang/ /zhing dang zhing du so sor brtul/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
41b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni/ /der ni yang dag brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /gzhon nu'i rol pa thams cad dang/ /de bzhin bzo gnas yang dag bstan/ /btsun mo'i 'khor las mngon 'byung zhing/ /bdud rnams 'dul bar mdzad nyid dang/ /lha yul nas ni 'bab pa dang/ /chos kyi
41b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /mya ngan 'das chen yang dag bstan/ /gang yang rol pa gzhan rnams dang/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin las/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/ /'dir ni sngon chad ma byung med/ /sngon gnas pa ni sbyor mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs kun
41b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa ni/ /thams cad rdo rje'i dngos bzhi pa/ /dus gsum lam gyi mthar thug pa/ /thams cad de bzhin lta bar bya/ /'og gi spyod yul kun las 'das/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid kun ster ba po/ /rnal 'byor 'di ltar bsam par bya//
41b6(rgyud 'grel): sa kun las ni rnal 'byor zhing/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam spangs la/ /grub pa bzhin du rnal 'byor bsgom/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje can kun rnal 'byor pa/ /thabs kyi cho ga kun shes nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i gsung bzhin du/ /bla med de ni grub par
41b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /'dug dang nyal dang gnas pa dang/ /yang na 'chag pa dag la yang/ /rdo rje tshig ni smra byed na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang reg /brtul zhugs can ni rtag sbyong tshe/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa ni/ /bya'o zhes ni yang
42a1(rgyud 'grel): dag spyod/ /de bzhin bza' dang gos sogs sam/ /gzhan yang ci yang rung ba dag /sems can rnams la ci ster ba/ /cho ga de bzhin spyad par bya/ /glu gar de bzhin rol mo dang/ /me tog phreng sogs rgyan rnams dang/ /chun 'phyang rnga yab
42a2(rgyud 'grel): gdugs rnams kyis/ /pha rol bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /dri bzangs dri yi byug pa sogs/ /cho ga bzhin du byugs pa dang/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran zhing/ /rnal 'byor bas ni thams cad mchod/ /brtul zhugs can nam mgo bregs pa'am/ /khyim
42a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'am bsnyen bkur ba dag gam/ /rgyal po 'am sde dpon rnams kyang rung/ /brtul zhugs can gyis ji bzhin spyad/ /rnal 'byor pa ni ci spyod pa/ /thams cad du ni smad mi bya/ /rtog pa kun las rnam grol bas/ /ji ltar 'dod par bya ba byed/ /de ni dngos kun ngo
42a4(rgyud 'grel): bo ste/ /khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rang nyid ji ltar 'dod par spyod/ /sems can kun gyi snying la bzhugs/ /de nyid thams cad bla med pa/ /de nyid rnal 'byor dbang pos bsgom/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun 'grub pa/ /rdo rje nyid ni myur thob 'gyur/ /'dir ni
42a5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs med bdud kyang med/ /thams cad kyang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol/ /brtul zhugs can gyi bdag nyid sgrub/ /bdag nyid thams cad yang dag ldan/ /brtul zhugs che ldan gang tshe mthong/ /nyin zhag dang ni tshang bral bar
42a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad nyid 'grub 'gyur/ /mchod pa kun gyi khyad par gyis/ /bdag nyid la ni rtag tu mchod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bla med pa/ /phan tshun du yang de bzhin sbyin/ /sems can kun lus las byung dang/ /phyi sa las byung srog chags rnams/ /
42a7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor chen pos legs blangs la/ /de nyid grub phyir bza' bar bya/ /sgron ma che dang yang dag ldan/ /smad pa'i dam tshig gzhan rnams dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams rtag bza' zhing/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mchod/ /yan lag kun ni smad pa dang/ /brnyas pa dag
42b1(rgyud 'grel): tu mi bya ste/ /bud med rigs kun las byung ba/ /rdo rje can gyis mchod par bya/ /ma skyes me tog yang dag ldan/ /byang chub sems dang ldan pa dag /mi rtog cho ga la gnas te/ /de nyid grub phyir bza' bar bya/ /sme sha can gyi rigs las byung/ /sme sha can dang khyad par du/ /smad pa'i rigs
42b2(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba rnams/ /brten ma dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /bram ze la sogs rigs las byung/ /bu mo rnal 'byor pas spyad de/ /ji ltar sems sun yi 'byin pa/ /de ltar shin tu mdzes par bya/ /sbrang ma skyugs pas 'dres pa dang/ /bshad la sogs dang bsres pa yi/ /rnam
42b3(rgyud 'grel): par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i bdag nyid mchod/ /ci 'dod bya ba byed pa dang/ /ji dga' bar ni spyod pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub bya ste/ /gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs ? bsdom pa dang/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i/ /lha yi
42b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su bsgom pa yi/ /sgrub pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dzam gling rdul phran mnyam pa yi/ /gsang sngags bzlas dang bsgom pa la/ /brtson pa che dang ldan gyur kyang/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i dpag med pa'i/ /byis pa rnams kyis
42b5(rgyud 'grel): brtags tshul gyis/ /bde 'gro skye ba rnyed dka' na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gzugs la sogs/ /bcom ldan thub pas gsungs pa ni/ /yang dag ye shes mnyam sbyor gyis/ /skal pa dang bral bdag nyid la'o/ /gang zhig rang rig ngo
42b6(rgyud 'grel): bo nyid/ /de nyid rin chen bla med pa/ /lung dang rig pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /gang zhig 'dzin par mi nus pa/ /mi shes rmongs pas kun tu khebs/ /spyod pa med pa'i blo can rnams/ /dang po'i las can rnal 'byor te/ /dman pa'i chos kyi snod yin te/ /'gro ba mgon gyis
42b7(rgyud 'grel): de don du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sogs bsgom pa/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan kun ldan zhing/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gsungs/ /gang yang gzhan rkyen khar ma las/ /zab mo'i ye shes dag gi snod/ /sdig pa'i grogs dang bdud dang bgegs/ /leg 'dren rnams kyis mi
43a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyong pa/ /de la de nyid dag pa ni/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /sems can kun dang tshangs sogs kyis/ /rnam pa kun tu mi rtog pa'i/ /shin tu rmad 'byung ye shes ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba dag /tshe 'di nyid la grub
43a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ /'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yin/ /ye shes grub pa las/ /phyag rgya chen po bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bo las/ /phung po lnga ni rgyal bar bshad/ /khams rnams spyan la sogs yin te//
43a3(rgyud 'grel): de bas sangs rgyas skur 'dod do/ /de lta yin na srog chags kun/ /srid gsum rtag tu rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyid phyir bya kun dang/ /thos dang bsgom pa don med do/ /'jig rten thams cad sangs rgyas na/ /phongs pa kun kyang mi 'byung la/ /bde
43a4(rgyud 'grel): dang sdug bsngal bsgom la sogs/ /gnod pa de la yod ma yin/ /gal te sangs rgyas skur gyur na/ /mngon shes drug la sogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas yon tan 'byor pa yang/ /ci phyir de dag med par 'gyur/ /gang yang de ltar mi shes pa/ /de ni rdzogs
43a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs ji ltar 'gyur/ /'ga' zhig de ltar shes pa ni/ /'di ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yin/ /gang zhig rims kyis bslabs pa yi/ /sbyor bas sems ni 'jug 'gyur ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pa ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /gzhan dag sangs rgyas 'grub pa min/ /gal te
43a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gis sangs rgyas na/ /bslab pa dgongs pa ci zhig yod/ /rig par bcas pa'i goms bya yin/ /rig pa med par goms bya yin/ /gal te mgon med skye bo 'ga' / /rgyal por 'gyur zhes bsgoms pas/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya yis kyang/ /'di ni rgyal po thob
43a7(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig log pa'i rtog pas ni/ /gang la rgyal po yong min ltar/ /de bzhin log par bsgoms pa yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ma yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rgyud rgyal du/ /phung po skye mched la sogs pa/ /de nyid dam tshig skad ces pas//
43b1(rgyud 'grel): de dang de ming gis bstan pa/ /dri chen rnam snang zhes bshad de/ /gci ba de bzhin rdo rje chu/ /ji ltar mo dbang pad+ma ste/ /ji ltar pho dbang rdo rje yin/ /gang phyir lung dang rig pa yi/ /rjes 'brang smra bar mi nus pas/ /de bas gang gis lha yi sku/ /smra bar nus pa ma yin no/ /gal
43b2(rgyud 'grel): te byas pa'i lha yi gzugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gyur na ko /gang phyir 'dus byas las byung bas/ /bum pa la sogs bzhin du 'jug/ de bas byang chub spyod pa ni/ /du ma 'ang 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /gal te byung nas zhig 'gyur na/ /bsgom pa nyid ni don cing
43b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /yid kyi rang bzhin byas pa'i gzugs/ /ji ltar 'dus byas yin zhes bshad/ /de dang de ni ji ltar 'jig /rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho khyod nyon cig /'di rnams sems kyis brtags pa ste/ /de yang 'dus byas mtshan nyid na/ /yid kyis brtags pa gang yin
43b4(rgyud 'grel): de/ /mi 'jigs par ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /phyag dang sku mdog yang dag ldan/ /ji ltar sngon nas rnam bzhugs pa/ /ma byas pa yi lha yi sku/ /gal te de nyid du bsgom bya/ /ma skyes ngo bor gnas pa ste/ /bsgoms pas dgos pa ci zhig yod/ /de 'dra'i gzugs su
43b5(rgyud 'grel): ma gyur pas/ /de 'dir bdag ces bsgom pas na/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams gzugs bsgom pa/ /de 'dra'i gzugs su gyur pa 'am/ /de ni bdag yin zhes sgom bya/ /bsgom pa gnyis su 'di rnams brtag /de 'drar bdag ni 'gyur ro zhes/ /gang tshe bsam gtan gyis brtags
43b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /gang tshe bsam gtan gsal gyur pa/ /lha rnams su yang de snang 'gyur/ /khyod kyi ras ris sogs gzugs ltas/ /gang tshe bsam gtan rnams bsgoms pa/ /de ni 'ong 'gyur bsam gtan gyis/ /de bzhin skyes par 'gyur ma yin/ /ma skyes pa yi lha yi
43b7(rgyud 'grel): sku/ /khyod kyis bsam gtan gyis byin na/ /mngon shes thams cad 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /de gzugs kyang skad cig des/ /de ltar khyod la yang dag med/ /bsam gtan gyis ni gang du 'ongs/ /khyed nyid kyis ni bskyed pa'i sku/ /bcos ma yin par bcos ma rtogs/ /
44a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid de yin zhes phyogs kyang/ /gnyis pa der ni yod min te/ /grub pa'i sgrub pa min min na/ /bsam gtan brtag pa ji lta bu/ /kun mkhyen nyid ni thams cad mkhyen/ /slar yang thob par med bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa
44a2(rgyud 'grel): khyad byed na/ /sangs rgyas nyid pas byed bcug mod/ /de ltar yang dag khyed la med/ /ji ltar log par rtag par byed/ /ma byas sangs rgyas sku gang yin/ /de bdag yin zhes bya don med/ /ma byas pa yi lha yi sku/ /de ni de ltar rnam par dpyad/ /gzugs ni yin
44a3(rgyud 'grel): pas ? sogs yin/ /ma byas de smra nus ma yin/ /de bas 'gro ba'i mgon po yis/ /byis pa rnams kyis rtogs pa'i phyir/ /sku yi mi rtag ston mdzad pas/ /mya ngan 'das pa gnyis bstan mdzad/ /de bas sangs rgyas skur ldan par/ /'jig rten gang yang
44a4(rgyud 'grel): lus ma yin/ /sangs rgyas skur ni rab sgrub phyir/ /gzugs kyi bsgom par bya ba min/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas gzugs med pa'i/ /rig pa bems po'i bdag nyid nyon/ /yul na gnas gyur gzugs can ni/ /mngon shes drug tu ji ltar 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams
44a5(rgyud 'grel): ni thams cad na/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams/ /mig gi skye mched la sogs pa/ /ded rnams der ni 'ongs ma yin/ /gang tshe mig la sogs pa yi/ /'gro ba dmigs par mi 'gyur na/ /de rnams ji ltar phreng bar 'gyur/ /ma phrad na ni kun rig
44a6(rgyud 'grel): min/ /song nas shes par 'gyur zhe na/ /rims kyis shes par ji ltar nus/ /shes bya du ma'i ngo bo bas/ /thams cad mkhyen pa de 'dra med/ /sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa yi/ /de bas dgongs pa yod ma yin/ /mig sogs dbang po ma gtogs pa//
44a7(rgyud 'grel): lus gzhan dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan lta bur sems med par/ /sangs rgyas sku ni shes byas na/ /gang phyir yang dag rigs med pas/ /sangs rgyas sku ni kun mkhyen min/ /rtser ldan rnams kyi lha yi spyan/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mnga' bar bshad//
44b1(rgyud 'grel): lha yi snyan ni thams cad mnga' / /ji ltar thams cad mkhyen te min/ /gal te ye shes kyis mkhyen na/ /de tshe sangs rgyas skus ci bya/ /skur gnas ye shes der rig pas/ /de bas sku ni sku mkhyen yin/ /sku las tha dad tha dad min/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni/ /sku
44b2(rgyud 'grel): dang yan lag ldan zhe na/ /mya ngan 'das na de yang 'jig /lus ni 'jig pa'i chos can pas/ /ye shes kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bas sangs rgyas ye shes sku/ /'jig par rig pa ma yin no/ /sku med pas na sku mkhyen min/ /rten 'brel las byung
44b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes de/ /de bas 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur/ /nyams 'gyur ye shes sku rnams ni/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid mi rigs so/ /de bas sangs rgyas sku dag ni/ /thams cad mkhyen par bya ba min/ /ye shes las gzhan phyogs la yang/ /sangs rgyas skur ni ji
44b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'gyur/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan du/ /de ltar rnal 'byor smra ba'i rigs/ /gang zhig 'jig rten rmongs pa rnams/ /gzugs gang bsam par 'dod pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab sgrub phyir/ /nam mkha' za bar 'dod pa yin/ /'gro
44b5(rgyud 'grel): snying rje dman ba dang/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos rnams la/ /de rnams blo gros yod pa yin/ /de lta'i chos dang bral ba ni/ /phan tshun dag ni rgyug pa na/ /chos la rmongs rnams smyon pa bzhin/ /g.yang sa dag tu btung
44b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba/ /de dag kun la khyad par du/ /snying rje chen po bya ba ste/ /yang dag ye shes nyer shes pas/ /de la brnyas par rigs ma yin/ /ye shes grub pa las gzugs su bsgom pa dgag pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //de ltar gzugs
44b7(rgyud 'grel): su bsgom pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mi 'grub ste/ /rnam bcas rtog pas kyang de bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mi 'grub bo/ /rnam nyid ye shes de yin pas/ /rnam pa las ni tha dad 'gyur/ /'on te rnam pa ye shes 'gyur/ /de ltar 'di ni mi rigs so
45a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa ye shes de min te/ /shes la rnam pa nyid med de/ /dper na bum pa mkhar mi 'gyur/ /mkha' yang bum par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med gzugs su mi 'gyur te/ /gzugs med gzugs can yod ma yin/ /ye shes
45a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ni med par grags/ /rnam pa gzugs can yin par bshad/ /ji ltar de gnyis gzhan min nyid/ /'gyur ba yin zhes brtag par bya/ /rnam par ye shes nyid yin zhes/ /rtog pa 'di yang mi rigs so/ /nges par gzhan du thal 'gyur ba/ /mdo tsam du ni mnyan
45a3(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi/ /gal te rnam de shes yin na/ /'dus byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur/ /ngo bo 'dus ma byas 'gyur pa/ /byis pa rnams la yang ma yin/ /byas pa nyid dang rnam 'jig nyid/ /sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar 'gyur/ /thog mdza' med cing zhi ba zhes/ /de
45a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa rnam gsungs la/ /de sras rgyal ba chen po yang/ /ye shes 'dus byas min zhes gsungs/ /de kun sgyu ma lta bu dang/ /mig yor lta bur nges bshad de/ /skye dang 'gag pa med pa dag /ye shes su de cis mi 'gyur/ /mig gi rnam shes zhes bya
45a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /ye shes su ni de mi rtag /'gyur ba nyid du thal 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas ye shes gzhan du min/ /ye shes de ni mi 'gyur bar/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gsungs te/ /de bas gcig pa nyid duAng/ /nges par smra ba rigs ma yin/ /shes pa'i rab tu snang de yin//
45a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dag tu de mi rtag /so sor snang ba dgag ba las/ /ye shes ci phyir dgag mi 'gyur/ /de bas gcig pa nyid mi 'grub/ /tshig de shin tu nges yin na/ /ci phyir de dag gcig nyid du/ /khyed ni yongs su rtog par byed/ /lung dang rigs pa dang 'gal bas/ /rnam
45a7(rgyud 'grel): pa kun tu 'bras bu med/ /ye shes de nyid rnam par shes/ /de ltar yang ni mi rigs so/ /rnam pa las ni tha dad med/ /shes pa'i shes nyid mi rigs te/ /shes bya las ni shes 'gyur gyi/ /shes bya med par ma yin no/ /gal te shes pa tha dad 'gyur/ /ye shes su
45b1(rgyud 'grel): ni brtag mgo /rnam pa tha dad gyur pa ni/ /ye shes nyid las gnas med yin/ /ye shes 'byung ba'i dus su yang/ /rnam pa kun tu mi 'byung la/ /rnam pa'ang kun tu 'byung ba na/ /ye shes nyid ni mi rigs so/ /dper na bum pa rdzogs pa la/ /snam bu 'byung ba med pa
45b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /tha dad pa yi chos rnams ni/ /ji ltar 'jig rten dag na snang/ /bu ni ma skyes pa dag ni/ /gzhan dag gis ni gang yin pas/ /mo gsham bu ldan 'jig rten na/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu gang yang med/ /bu dang bcas pas lha bzhin ni/ /gang tshe rang gi bur bcas
45b3(rgyud 'grel): na/ /gzhan dag gi ni bu yin kyang/ /bu dang bcas pa'i rigs ma yin/ /de bzhin ye shes gnas med ni/ /rnam bcas yin par ji ltar 'dod/ /gang la ltos nas ye shes ni/ /gang gis de ni rnam bcas 'gyur/ /ye shes rnam bcas yin zhes pa/ /rnam
45b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bral ma yin te/ /rnam pa dang bral ye shes ni/ /rnam bcas nyid du ji ltar 'gyur/ /rnam pa dang bcas gang yin pa/ /de ni rnam bcas nyid yin na/ /rnam pa kun las rnam grol ba'i/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas ye shes 'gyur/ /gal te rnam pa med kyang ni/ /'di ni rnam
45b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas nyid 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas ye shes med par yang/ /sangs rgyas su khyed cis mi 'gyur/ /kun mkhyen min te ye shes min/ /ye shes tha dad par rab brtags/ /de bas rnam bcas ye shes la/ /dngos grub rigs pa ma yin no/ /gal te rnam pa bcas pas ni/ /rnam
45b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas nyid 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas gdung la rab 'jug pas/ /de dang phrad par ma mthong ngo/ /gzugs can yang dag mi sbyor te/ /gzugs med pa la rnam kun min/ /dper na nam mkha' bum pa dang/ /yang dag sbyor bar mi 'dod ltar/ /de ni rnam pa dang ldan yang/ /de ni
45b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam bcas 'gyur ma yin/ /ltos dang bcas pas rnam 'jig nyid/ /tshogs pa med pa dag tu 'gyur/ /tshogs pa las byung gang yin te/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'gyur ma yin/ /gang tshe ye shes 'dus byas pas/ /rnam bcas yin par mi 'grub bo/ /gal te rnam pa
