46a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dag /gzhan nyid dag tu 'gyur na ni/ /de ltar phan tshun ltos pa dag /ye shes su ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /rnam pa shes las tha dad par/ /gal te de ltar rtogs na ni/ /de rnam shes pa las gzhan pas/ /shes med nyid du thal bar 'gyur//
46a2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig rnam pa las gzhan nyid/ /de bas rnam pa med 'gyur na/ /shes te rnam pa med par ni/ /ci phyir de ltar rtogs mi byed/ /ye shes grub pa las rnam pa dang bcas pa'i ye shes dgag pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// //ji ltar
46a3(rgyud 'grel): rig pas rnam brtags pa/ /rnam pa dang bcas rab bkag nas/ /rnam med nyid kyang mi 'grub pa/ de ltar du ni brjod par bya/ /gal te rnam pa med na yang/ /ye shes 'gyur bar rnam rtog na/ /rnam pa dang ni rnam bral ba/ /'dis ci rig nas kun rig yin/
46a4(rgyud 'grel): kun mkhyen de la yod min zhing/ /ye shes zhes bya rtog pa nyid/ /rnam pa thams cad ma gzigs pas/ /bems po nyid du thal bar 'gyur/ /bems med rtogs pa'i ngo bo ni/ /rnam pa med pa yin par bshad/ /gang zhig bden na thams cad rig /yang
46a5(rgyud 'grel): dag ma yin ji ltar rig /rnam rtog kun las nges grol zhing/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med par/ /de ltar mkhyen na ye shes de/ /brdzun pas ji ltar rig par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma 'dra sogs dpe rnams kyis/ /chos rnams thams cad rab rtogs te/ /'gro la
46a6(rgyud 'grel): phan phyir de dang der/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ston par mdzad/ /sgyu ma la sogs dpe gang zhig /log par rtog pas brtags pa ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyis od min na/ /kun mkhyen de ni ji ltar mkhyen/ /ri bong rwa dang de bzhin du/ /mo gsham bu ltar mi rigs te//
46a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med pa ji ltar rig /de bas rnam pa med par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma la sogs dpe rnams ni/ /sras bcas rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa/ /dngos po med pas brtags pa tsam/ /thams cad du ni 'gog pa min/ /dpe nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru/ /rnam pa kun tu ches
46b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad na/ /bsgrub bya yin pas thams cad du/ /dpe nyid du ni mi 'gyur ro/ /dper na skyes bu seng ge yi/ /dpe ni 'jig rten la yod na/ /dpal sogs yon tan ldan pa ste/ /mjug ma la sogs yod ma yin/ /de bas dngos po thams cad ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyi thams cad
46b2(rgyud 'grel): min/ /lung dang rigs pa'i rjes 'brangs te/ /skyes bu mchog gis rtogs par bya/ /de nas khyed kyis gang smras pa/ /byis pa drang ba'i thabs yin gyis/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i bsam pa yis/ /bden par smras ba de ma yin/ /ji ltar ri bong rwa dang ni/ /de bzhin mo gsham bu lta
46b3(rgyud 'grel): bur/ /dngos po thams cad gang du yang/ /rgyal bas dngos med ma gsungs so/ /gal te gzugs sogs dngos po rnams/ /rnam pa kun tu yod min na/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyis/ /lha yi spyan ni ji ltar 'grub/ /lha yi snyan sogs thams cad kyang/ /de
46b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du ni yod med pas/ /mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ /de bas kun mkhyen med par 'gyur/ /rnam pa med pa'i ye shes ni/ /sangs rgyas sku la yang dag ldan/ /mngon shes thams cad 'jug 'gyur ba/ /thams cad rig pa ji ltar med/ /gzugs la
46b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i skye mched ni/ /mig la sogs pas shes pa ste/ /sems dang bcas pas rjes myong ba/ /de ltar 'jig rten dag na gnas/ /gzugs sogs yod pa ma yin te/ /khyod nyid kyis ni ma smras sam/ /gal te dngos po med pa yin/ /phrad pa ji ltar rab tu/
46b6(rgyud 'grel): brtag /gal te dngos med phrad gyur na/ /'di 'dra khyed smra rigs ma yin/ /'di nyid rnam kun dngos po med/ /de dang phrad pa ji ltar 'dod/ /sbyor med gyur kyang ye shes ni/ /smon lam dbang gis de bzhin du/ /gdul bya'i dbang gis ji bzhin du/ /sems can rnams
46b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi don mdzad do/ /gang tshe 'di yang mi mkhyen na/ /'gro ba'i don ni ji ltar mdzad/ /rig pa med pa kun mkhyen min/ /sems can sdug la thugs rje med/ /yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin du/ /smon lam dbang gis sems can don/ /mdzad ces pa ni rigs ma yin/ /'di
47a1(rgyud 'grel): ni yod pa snang bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun don legs sgrub phyir/ /gang che des pa nyid 'gyur bas/ /ye shes yid bzhin nor bu bshad/ /bems po'i bdag nyid ma yin no/ /gang du ma mthong ma byas kyang/ /rang gi ye shes kyis brtags pa/ /bdag ni kun mkhyen
47a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i bdag /'gyur zhes pa de ci phyir bya/ /yang dag byang chub sems bskyed pas/ /legs par tshogs kun bsags na ni/ /spro chen rtogs dang brtson 'grus kyis/ /bsgom dang bsam pa la sogs pas/ /dam chos mnyan la sogs pa la/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyis dgos
47a3(rgyud 'grel): med de/ /sngon med pa ni 'byung ba med/ /sngar gnas pa yang 'jig par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'di 'dra na/ /ma lus thams cad don med do/ /'chi la sogs pa'i 'jigs las grol/ /dmyal sogs gnod pa rnams las thar/ /sdug mi sdug sogs sdug bsngal sogs//
47a4(rgyud 'grel): bral ba bems po'i bdag min gang/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid mkhyen pa/ /kun mkhyen zhes ni nges par bshad/ /rang bzhin mkhyen pas kun mkhyen zhes/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid bshad ces/ /thams cad mngon sum mkhyen pas na/ /des na kun mkhyen zhes bshad do//
47a5(rgyud 'grel): nyis na 'khor bar 'khor 'gyur zhing/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag dang ni/ /'khor lo sgyur sogs bde ba rnams/ /'di ni nges par thob kyang bla'i/ /ye shes grub pa las rnam pa med pa dgag pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //de ltar nyes pa'i tshogs gyur
47a6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /de bas rnam med de ma yin/ /de nas sems med de nyid ni/ /da ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /shin tu rmongs skabs ye shes ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni la la 'dod/ /rmongs pa bsgoms pas rmongs pa ni/ /tshul ngan rnams kyis thob par 'gyur/ /thams cad rgyu dang mtshungs pa yi//
47a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu 'jig rten las spyod de/ /ko Ta pa las 'bras skye ba/ /gang la'ang yod pa ma yin no/ /de bas mi rtog ye shes ni/ /ldan pa med par shes par bya/ /ye shes nyid kyi mi rtog nyid/ /gzhan du rig pa ma yin no/ /ye shes mi rtog nyid du ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bden
47b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ /ye shes kyis ni rmongs pa dag /mi rtog nyid du ma gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas ye shes lhun grub pas/ /de bas mi rtog par bshad de/ /bsam pa'i dbye ba yod min gyi/ /sems med 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /mi rtog 'di ni mi shes par/ /gang du yang ni ma gsungs so//
47b2(rgyud 'grel): ches la nyes pa yod min pas/ /de nyid gzhan du rtog pa yin/ /kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs pa dang/ /sems can kun don grub pa po/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i 'gro mgon gyis/ /de dang der ni ston mdzad pa/ /rnam par mi rtog tsam nyid do/ /gal te dran pas byas na ni//
47b3(rgyud 'grel): gang che 'di dag thams cad kyang/ /ci yi phyir na dran ma gyur/ gnyis ka'i don dang ma bral bas/ /shes min kun mkhyen pa'ang yin/ /log pa'i shes pa rmengs rnams kyis/ /ye shes 'dir ni rab tu bkag /ye shes grub pa las rmongs pa bsgom pa dgag pa ste le'u lnga
47b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //dbugs 'byung ma yin rdub min na/ /de nyid grub pa rig pa min/ /de gnyis dbus na'ang yod ma yin/ /rlung gi de nyid ji ltar 'gyur/ /dbus na'ang cung zad yod min na/ /ji ltar de nyid dag tu 'gyur/ /gal te rlung ni de nyid 'gyur/ /sdud
47b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yang ni 'gyur du 'ong/ /ji ltar 'ga' zhig spud 'bud pa/ /spud pa rlung gis 'thor ba dang/ /de bzhin 'dren pa dag kyang byed/ /lus kyang yid kyi de bzhin no/ /rlung las 'bud pa 'ga' med cing/ /de bzhin rlung yang 'bud pa yin/ /lus kyi 'bud pa gang yin dang/ /spud pa 'bud par byed pa dag /
47b6(rgyud 'grel): dag khyad par ma mthong ste/ /de nyid mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'bud pa yin byi ba min/ /ming dang yid kyang mtshungs pa yin/ /dbugs rdub dbugs 'byin rlung dag gis/ /rlung dang spud pa mtshungs pa yin/ /spud ldan de nyid ji bzhin du/ /lus kyi rlung yang de bzhin 'gyur
47b7(rgyud 'grel): gang tshe lus kyi rlung de nyid/ /sgo rnams kun nas 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de nyid yin pas bshad rigs na/ /rlung dang khyad par med pa yin/ /mngon par rmengs shing lam las nyams/ /log pa'i don ni rab bsgoms pa/ /de dag bde 'gror mi skye ste/ /dmyal bar gcig pur? 'gro
48a1(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid/ /ye shes grub pa las/ dbugs rdub pa dang 'byung ba'i de kho na nyid dgag pa ste le'u drug pa'o// //dbang po 'byung ba bde ba yin/ /de nyid yin zhes skye ngan smra/ /de ni bde ba che yin zhes/ /rgyal ba
48a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis ma gsungs so/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung las skyes pa/ /gang duAng de nyid shes mi 'grub/ /gang phyir bde de thams cad du/ /ngo bo nyid kyi yod ma yin/ /bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes ni/ /rang nyid ngo bo nyid mkhyen pa'i/ /bde ba kun gyi gtsor gyur
48a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /bde ba chen po zhes bshad do/ /bde chen mi rtag ma yin te/ /bde ba chen po rtag tu rtag /mchan khung g.ya' phrugs las byung ba'i/ /ci'i phyir na bde chen min/ /chags pa mnyam pa'i bde med de/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams la phul/ /'dod pa'i don kun longs
48a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod cing/ /smad pa dag tu mi bya zhes/ rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad las/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa sems bde ba'i phyir/ /don dam pa yi de nyid min/ /ye shes grub pa las bde ba chen po smra ba dgag pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// //
48a5(rgyud 'grel): bde ba myang ba bkag pas na/ /de bas yang dag ye shes med/ /rmongs bcas rnams kyis brtags pa yi/ /de nyid thams cad log pa yin/ /mkhas pa yis ni thams cad kyang/ /rang blo nyid kyi bkag pa yin/ /ji ltar yang dag de nyid rnyed/ /de dag da ni
48a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya/ /sems can blo gros chung ba dang/ /bsod nams chung zhing brtson zhan nyams/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /ye shes mchog rnams ji ltar 'thob/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa dag /de 'dir rim gyis bshad par bya/ /pus mo
48a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni sa dag la/ /legs par rab tu bzhag nas su/ /lus srang thal mo sbyar byas te/ /dad pas 'di skad brjod par bya/ /ston pa 'jig rten 'byung gyur dang/ /ma 'ongs pa na 'byung 'gyur dang/ /da ltar byung bar gtogs pa nyid/ /dam chos ston par mdzad pa
48b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gang yang de nyid ston mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de la bdag ni nyin mtshan du/ /mchod cing bsnyen bkur las kyi phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni/ /gtso bos gzhes par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad
48b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /nam mkha' i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ /tshad med pa ni yongs bzung ste/ /chos kyi dbyings las yang dag 'byung/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sna tshogs mchog /'das dang ma 'ongs pa kun dang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rnam 'phrul gyis/ /'gro ba'i bla ma mchod
48b3(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi/ /sdig pa rnams ni kun 'byung ba/ /'gro la phan phyir thams cad kyang/ /so sor bshags shing slar yang ni/ /mi bgyi sdom pa slar yang nod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bsod nams gang/ /de sras blo gros ldan pa dang/ /rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos
48b4(rgyud 'grel): dag /gang gzhan lus can thams cad kyi/ /skye ba kun tu gang byas pa/ /bdag gi dang ni gzhan rnams kyang/ /yang dag dga' ba'i sems kyis ni/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang/ /phyogs bcu kun na yang dag bzhugs/ /chos kyi de nyid shing rtar bzhugs/
48b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje che dang ldan pa'i thugs/ /chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams/ /de rnams chos ni stan par mdzad/ /bdag ni rab tu skul ma 'tshal/ /'gro kun sangs rgyas gyur pa ni/ /thams cad ji srid gnas gyur pa/ /sems can kun don mdzad pa po/ /mgon po de
48b6(rgyud 'grel): srid zhugs nas ni/ /nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' bar/ /thal mo sbyar nas gsol bar 'tshal/ /lus ngag yid kyi bsod nams ni/ /bgyis sam bgyid du stsal ba'am/ /rjes su yi rang ci yang rung/ /des ni 'jig rten kun mkhyen shog /sangs rgyas kun gyi
48b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid la'ang/ /dus gsum du ni ci nus par/ /me tog la sogs rnams kyis mchod/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres byas pa'am/ /gal te ma sres brtags pa rnams/ /rtog kun rnam grol bdag nyid can/ /dam tshig la
49a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bzung bar bgyi/ /de nyid sdus sogs rgyud rnams las/ /gsungs pa'i dam tshig sdom pa rnams/ /srog chags gsad bar mi bya'o/ /ma byin par yang mi blang zhing/ /'dod pa log par mi spyod la/ /brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /nyes
49a2(rgyud 'grel): pa kun gyi rtsar gyur pa'i/ /char ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /phra ma de bzhin dag rtsub dang/ /khyab pa'i tshig rnams smra ba dang/ /ma rig sems can la sdang dang/ /log par lta ba 'ang kun tu spang/ /sngon du sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing/ /mya ngan 'das la bgod par bgyi/ /ting
49a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin yan lag de thams cad/ /sdom pa'i mchog ni bzung bar bgyi/ /bsod nams kun gyi 'byung gnas che/ /byang chub sems kyang de bzhin bskyed/ /bdag gi sems can 'di dag kun/ /kun mkhyen sa la bzhag par bgyi/ /'di kun sdug bsngal sel mdzad
49a4(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun ster ba/ /byang chub lam ni ston pa pa/ /thugs rje can du bdag gyur cig /lus can kun la mnyam nyid kyi/ /yang dag sems ni legs bskyed pa/ /byang chub sems su 'di zhes bya/ /gzhan du na ni log par 'gyur/ /gang tshe mi mnyam nyid
49a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa/ /byang chub sems shes de mi bya/ /thog mdza' dbus dang bral ba yi/ /ye shes de ni skye mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun/ /de la byin gyis rlob mi mdzad/ /lta la sogs pa thams cad kyang/ /de bas thabs shes rnal 'byor pas/ /sems
49a6(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi gnyen gcig pas/ /rnam par bslu ba med pa'i sems/ /des na brtan pas bskyed par bya/ /'di byas pa ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can kun mnyes/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa rnams/ /byin gyis rlob pa rab tu mdzad/ /bdud dang
49a7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs la sogs pa yang/ /glags skabs tshol bar mi byed cing/ /phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ /dgyes pas brtag tu bsrung bar mdzad/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa/ /mi yi skyes bus thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams thams cad skyed pa dang/ /gzhan du de nyid
49b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba ni/ /rnam pa kun tu mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas thog mar sbyor shes shing/ /ye shes thob par 'dod pa dang/ /tshe 'di nyid la grub don du/ /'tshe ba med pa nyid phyir dang/ /bgegs rnams thams cad zhi phyir dang/ /tshe dang nad med 'phel ba ni/ /'bras bu 'dod pa'i
49b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas/ /de bas nges par bya ba yin/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis/ /sna tshogs rgyud du bstan pa ni/ /lam 'dir gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /yar ngo'i zla ba ji bzhin du/ /rim gyis yang dag 'phel 'gyur gyi/ /nam yang zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /brtson
49b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grus dman pa la zhig /sangs rgyas nyid thob mi 'gyur na/ /'khor lo sgyur rgyal bde ba ni/ /skye ba kun tu thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bsod nams gang/ /phyogs dus kun na yod pa rnams/ /de yi ba spu'i khung gnas zhes/ /rgyal ba mchog
49b4(rgyud 'grel): gis rab tu gsungs/ /ye shes grub pa las/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //ji ltar bshags pas sdig pa ni/ /shin tu mi bzad zad 'gyur zhing/ /de bzhin
49b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang bas/ /ji ltar bsod nams yang dag rdzogs/ /srog gcod pa la sogs pa ni/ /bya'o zhes ni yang dag bshad/ /rgyud rnams la lar min zhes par/ /de dag ji ltar 'gal mi 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs thams cad kyang/ /de bzhin bza' 
49b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bgrong min sogs/ /btung mi bya sogs du ma rnams/ /de yang ji ltar dge bskyed yin/ /blo dman skye bos rtogs bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pas/ /rgyud dang rgyud du nges gsungs pa/ /de ni rim gyis bshad par bya/ /las gang bya ba ci yang
49b7(rgyud 'grel): rung/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis te/ /zhi ba gzhan dag yod min pas/ /de rnams 'di ltar rnam par dpyod/ /sems med par ni lus ngag gis/ /ci yang byed par nus ma yin/ /de med par ni tshig gis kyang/ /nam yang nus 'gyur ma yin no/ /de bas lus
50a1(rgyud 'grel): dag las rnams ni/ /yid dag nyid las gyur pa yin/ /'gro ba thams cad sems nyid kyis/ /dge dang mi dge gang byed pa/ /phan don gyur pa'i las rnams gang/ /thams cad legs par spyad par 'gyur/ /bzlog pa'i bsod nams ma
50a2(rgyud 'grel): yin zhes/ /rgyal po mchog gis rab tu gsungs/ /de bas dge dang mi dge kun/ /sems nyid kyis ni byed pa dang/ /sems nyid kyis ni 'jigs 'gyur zhes/ /'gro ba'i bla mas gsungs pa yin/ /sems can gnod byas rdzogs pa yi/ /bdag gis sdig pa
50a3(rgyud 'grel): yongs bshad pa/ /phan sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /kun tu bsgrags pas bshags par bya/ /gnod pa shin tu sbyar ba yis/ /spro zhing sngon chad gang byas pa/ /gnyen po yis ni 'jigs 'gyur te/ /gang phyir de nyid kyis de byas/ /gang zhig bum pa
50a4(rgyud 'grel): skyed byed pa/ /rang nyid kyis ni da bshig pa/ /de phyir sdig pa kun 'byung ba/ /gang zhig bdag nyid kyis 'jig 'gyur/ /phyi nas bshags par bya'o zhes/ /rmongs rnams gal te byed 'gyur na/ /de ni bshags par mi rigs shing/ /sdig byed de'ang 'jig
50a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin bsod nams 'jigs pa'ang/ /de bzhin du ni 'gyur bas na/ /bsod nams byas kyang mi dga' bas/ /'jig par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /gang tshe sems la mi sbyin nyid/ /sbyin 'dod pa la rab 'jug pa/ /sbyin du zin kyang bsod
50a6(rgyud 'grel): nams ni/ /rnam pa kun tu 'byung mi 'gyur/ /thams cad las ni lhag pa'i gnas/ /gang du thams cad 'jig pa ste/ /bskal pa bye ba stong du yang/ /yang dag bskyed pa'i bde ba che/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa yi/ /bsod nams tshogs ni bsags pa'o/ /bskal
50a7(rgyud 'grel): ba bye bar 'byung ba ni/ /skad cig nyid na rnam 'jig pa/ /de dang 'dra ba'i sdug ba'i mi/ /gnyis pa la ni sdang byed pa'o/ /de bas srung ba'i don gyi phyir/ /'di skad de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /de las gnod byas chung du yang/ /sdig pa'i phung po chen por 'gyur/ /de
50b1(rgyud 'grel): las gnod byas chung ngu yang/ /sdig pa'i phung po chen por 'gyur/ /de la phan byas chung ngu yang/ /bsod nams phung po cher 'gyur te/ /bde ba dag ni thams cad kyi/ /yon tan rgya mtshor gnas phyir ro/ /rab rmongs byis pa la la ni/ /lung dang rigs pa ma
50b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba/ /rtog nyid sdig pas 'gyur yin zhes/ /bdag nyid 'jig pa po rnams smra/ /rtog dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gal te sdig pas mi gos na/ /zhe sdang skye ba'i rgyu la'ang/ /rnam par 'gyur nyid mi rigs so/ /'jig rten pa yi tshul spangs nas/ /gzhan
50b3(rgyud 'grel): du ci yang mi 'gyur te/ /mgo dang rgyug par byed pa dang/ /de bzhin rdo yang bza' ba'i rigs/ /rlung dang grangs dang sgom sogs kyis/ /gnod pa de la ma rigs so/ /mchod brus gnod par byas kyang ni/ /skyo ba nye bar skye mi 'gyur/ /gal te rang gi bya ba la/ /chags
50b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs drangs te spang dka' ba/ /rnam par mi rtog rab rtogs pa/ /de ltar gzhan du der mi 'gyur/ /ma skyes pa ni zin min te/ /'di ni sdig pa'i las can gyis/ /khro dang nga rgyal ldan pa yi/ /sdig pa yongs su dag mi 'gyur/ /lha nyid kyis ni de thams cad//
50b5(rgyud 'grel): byas so zhes ni rab rtog na/ /sngon nyid 'di ni byung ba la/ /ji lta bzhin du byas pa yin/ /lha nyid kyis ni byas zhes pa/ /yongs su rtog pa log pa yin/ /gang phyir chags pas zil gnon pa'i/ /bya ba nyid ni byed 'dod do/ /rjes su yi rang la sogs kun/ /thams cad
50b6(rgyud 'grel): sems ni kho na las/ /bsod nams tshogs dang ldan par ni/ /blo dang ldan par shes par bya/ /lus ngag bcas pa'i dman pa ni/ /bsod nams de la spyod mi 'gyur/ /drag po'i sems ni gcig cig gi /bsod nams sangs rgyas gang gsungs pa/ /srog gcod
50b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs las rnams gang/ /chags pa rgya che ba yi sems/ /thams cad dge min mi 'gyur te/ /bsod nams snying rje las byung yin/ /gzhan phyi ni las rnams gang/ /snying rje can gyi gang byas pa/ /de kun bsod nams yin zhes ni/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa rdzogs
51a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad gsungs/ /snying rje bsam pa gdol ba la/ /bkag pa rnams kyang rjes gnang gi /rang gi don la rjen 'gyur zhing/ /lus can snying rje bral ba min/ /bsod nams byas kyang gnod pa'i phyir/ /skye bo 'ga' la rnam sdang ba/ /de ni sdig pa
51a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'gyur zhes/ /rgyal ba mchog gi rab tu gsungs/ /gang 'di dge dang mi dge rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun rtogs pas/ /thams cad dge ba nyid 'gyur te/ /gang phyir de rnams yid dbang yin/ /ye shes grub las bsod nams dang sdig skyed pa dang
51a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa yongs su shes pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //bdud rtsi lnga ni mi shes phyir/ /sems ni yang dag sbyang phyir dang/ /glang po sha sogs kyang de bzhin/ /rnal 'byor pa ni rgyal bas gsungs/ /srog chags thams cad bsad nas ni/ /ba? ru zin
51a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang sangs mi rgyas/ /sems dang bral ba'i sems can rnams/ /rmongs pa rnams kyis mi shes so/ /thams cad kyang ni gang ba'i phyir/ /re zhig lus la gtsang ba med/ /dri 'dzag za ba la la ni/ /des ni thams cad kyis ma zos/ /ji ltar 'o ma la sogs kun/ /lus
51a5(rgyud 'grel): can 'di dag thams cad kyis/ /bza' dang bza' min rab grags pa/ /rang gi sems la yod ma yin/ /zas dang gos la sogs pa kun/ /mi gtsang bar ni rab shes na/ /gang phyir chu la yongs dag pas/ /de rnams 'di na rab tu 'jug/ chag gyi tshogs ni 'bab
51a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /smad pa thams cad bkru ba dang/ /'bru sna thams cad bskyed nas ni/ /de nas rgya mtshor 'bab par 'gyur/ /mi gtsang rnams dang ldan pa yi/ /chu yi klu yis blangs nas su/ /chu ni gang dang gang yin pa/ /thams cad de bzhin char du 'bab/ /rdzing bu la sogs
51a7(rgyud 'grel): kun rgyas shing/ /thams cad kyis ni thams cad 'khrud/ /de bas gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs/ /thams cad 'dir ni yod ma yin/ /gtsang ba nyid ni yod 'gyur na/ /mi gtsang nyid ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dag pa med pas mi gtsang nyid/ /rnam pa kun tu mi rnyed do/
51b1(rgyud 'grel): dper na pha rol tshul rol bzhin/ /de ni phan tshun ltos pa ste/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang la sogs rtog /rtog 'di 'jig rten pa yi yin/ /ye shes grub pa las gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bar rtog pa las grol ba ste le'u bcu pa'o// //
51b2(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis/ /bgrod min pa la bgrod gyur pa/ /yang dag rjes me snang 'gal ba/ /da ni rnam par dpyad par bya/ /'di ltar lus can thams cad ni/ /sems las skye dang 'jig pa ste/ /de yang las rnams dbang nyid kyis/ /srid dang ?
51b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du/ /pha dang ma yang bur 'gyur cing/ /bu dang ma yang phar 'gyur la/ /bran mo chung ma 'ang phar 'gyur zhing/ /chung ma yang ni ma ru 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i tshul rnams ni/ /shin tu rgya che du mar ni/ /srid par bzod nas gyur te zhes/ /rdo rje sems
51b4(rgyud 'grel): dpas gsungs pa yin/ /de ltar gnas shing 'khor bar ni/ /yun ring dus su 'jug pa dang/ /pha dang mar ni ma gyur pa'o/ /sems can gang yang yong ma yin/ /de bzhin bu mo la sogs kun/ /'gro ba drug tu ston byung nas/ /de bas snying rje chen po ni/ /bya
51b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes rgyal ba'i mchog gis gsungs/ /de bas rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/ /mgon po'i mchog ni de rnams kyis/ /rnal 'byor ba yi sems sbyang phyir/ /bu mo la sogs rjes su gnang/ /rtog pa'i chus ni gal ba yi/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni/ /rdo rje
51b6(rgyud 'grel): theg lam zhen par/ /su zhig pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur/ /log pa'i shes pa thams cad ni/ /lung dang rigs pa legs ldan pas/ /nyes pa kun gyi 'byung gnas ni/ /de rnams rims kyis bkag pa yin/ /ye shes grub pa las bgrod pa dang bgrod pa ma
51b7(rgyud 'grel): yin pa dang bral ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //rdo rje theg pa rab rtogs phyir/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mchog don du/ /rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs dpe dang ni/ /rig pas kyang ni de bshad bya/ /gzugs sku la sogs dngos rnams ni/ /de nyid ngo bo ji
52a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin min/ /de bkag sngar ni byas zin pas/ /de bas gzugs med duAng gnas/ /nyes pa kun tu thal 'gyur bas/ /dngos po de nyid 'gyur ma yin/ /sdug bsngal kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ med pa de yang de nyid min/ /dngos dang
52a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos med de nyid min/ /gzhan du gyur pa'ang rnam spangs yin/ /de bas phyogs yod rigs min te/ /de tshe kun mkhyen 'gyur ma yin/ /yang dag ye shes rig pa las/ /khyab dang rdo rje'i sku nyid dang/ /'gyur ba med pa nyid dang ni/ /kun mkhyen nyid ni de yi 'grub/ /gzugs?
52a3(rgyud 'grel): can khyab pa nyid dang ste/ /de bas rdo rje sku ma yin/ /de la mi 'gyur yid min pas/ /thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ma yin/ /rims kyis shes gang ci yang rung/ /'di ni thams cad rtog min te/ /shes bya rnams la ched med pas/ /kun mkhyen du ni 'di mi
52a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod do/ /gang zhig shes byar rab bshad pa/ /phyogs kyi tsha ni gcig pur nyid/ /'di ni bskal pa stong phag dag/ bye bas kyang ni shes mi 'gyur/ /gal te skyes nas 'jig 'gyur na/ /de bas bskyed par bya ba min/ /shin tu gnas pa'i ye shes nyid/ 'khrud?
52a5(rgyud 'grel): pa tsam zhig rnam par 'jig /gang zhig 'gro dang 'od 'gyur ba/ /de la khyab pa yod ma yin/ /g.yo zhing phyogs gcig la gnas pas/ /de ni 'jig par thal bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig kha dog med gyur chos/ /nga ni gang gis 'jig par 'gyur/ /mtshon dang dug?
52a6(rgyud 'grel): me dang chu/ /gnod pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' kun nas gnas bdag nyid/ /mi 'gyur mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ /nyon mongs med cing 'gyur med la/ rnam pa thams cad dus kun la/ /gang zhig dus kun pa min pa/ /de yang kun mkhyen 'gyur ma yin/ /des
52a7(rgyud 'grel): dus rnams kun tu yang/ /'gyur ba min par shes par bya/ lus can dag ni thams cad la/ /ye shes che gnas nyid yin na'ang/ /mi shes rab rib kyis khebs pa'o/ /byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so/ /ji ltar khyi ni bod ba la/ /snyeg cing 'phen par byed la min/ /de
52b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sems kyis gang bsam bya/ /snyeg gi sems nyid la ma yin/ /gang zhig sems kyi bsam bya yang/ de nyid la'ang ngas rtog gi/ sems nyid de nyid ji 'dra zhes/ /sems pa la ni 'jug mi byed/ /ye shes grub pa las de nyid gnas pa bzhag pa zhes bya ba ste le'u
52b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis pa'i// //shin tu rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /gal te gzhan gyi rab bskul na/ /thar pa'i don du bdag gi bdag/ g.yang sar yang ni 'dod par mdzad/ /rmongs par gyur pa mang po yang/ /spyod pa dag ni 'di 'dra bas/ /bde gshegs
52b3(rgyud 'grel): lam ni kun spangs te/ /dmyal ba'i lam ni sten pa snang/ /long ba'i mi ni la la zhig /gzhan dag la ni lam ston byed/ /gang dang gang brtags de dang de/ /'dri bar byed rnams de mi 'dri/ /gal te rmongs pa'i dbang gis lam/ /mi mthong de ni ston byed kyang/ /sdig
52b4(rgyud 'grel): can gyi ni lam de yis/ /bgrong ba nyams pa thob par 'gyur/ /rang nyid kyi lam mi mthong bar/ /ji ltar shin tu gzhan bdag 'dren/ /long ba gnyis ni 'grogs 'gyur na/ /gnyi gas sdug bsngal the tshom med/ /ji ltar dmus long bya ba yi/ /'brog dag tu
52b5(rgyud 'grel): ni zhugs gyur pa/ /gnyis ka'ang de 'dra la la zhig /ji ltar grong du 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin dmus yong gyur pa des/ /yang dag ye shes ma mthong bas/ /gnas de thob par mi nus na/ /ji ltar de ni gzhan grol byed/ /de bas bla ma bsten pa ni/ /yang dag
52b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan slob ma yis/ /yongs su brtags par bya'o zhe/ /rgyal ba'i mchog gis rab tu gsungs/ /dkon mchog gsum la dang gis dang/ /sems can kun la snying rjer ldan/ /brtan zhing gtong sogs yon tan ldan/ /bsod nams thams cad cher bskyed la/ /byang
52b7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /blo bzangs rab dang yon tan ldan/ /khro ba med cing spro ba che/ /zab mo'i chos la lhag par mos/ /de ni chos kyi sbyin pa dag /zang zing med la rtag par dga' / /de ni rtag tu 'dod pa chung/ /tshogs gnyis yang bdag bsags pa po//
53a1(rgyud 'grel): de ni bla mar sangs rgyas dang/ /rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun gyis gsungs/ /de nyid sems can thams cad kyi/ /ston pa 'jig rten 'dren pa yin/ /gang gzhan bla mar bshad pa dag /log shes mngon pa'i nga rgyal can/ /chags
53a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs don du chos rnams ni/ /mchog dag ston par byed 'gyur ba/ /'gro ba'i sdig pa'i grogs po ru/ /'jig rten na de rab tu gnas/ /bdud kyi phyogs kyi rigs can te/ /bdag gzhan phung bar byed pa yin/ /'gro ste rtag tu spang bya zhing/ /de la bsnyen
53a3(rgyud 'grel): bkur bya ba min/ /de la khong khro mi bya zhing/ /shin tu nye bar mi bya'o/ /ji ltar nyan thos rnams dang ni/ /lhan cig bde gshegs bzhed min ltar/ /de bzhin de 'dra dang lhan cig /gnas par shin tu mi bya'o/ /ye shes grub pa las slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid kyi
53a4(rgyud 'grel): le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //sngar bshad pa yi mtshan nyid las/ /slob dpon du ni bshad pa yin/ /slob ma yis ni mtshan nyid kyang/ /ji ltar gyur pa bshad par bya/ /ji ltar 'ga' ni grur zhugs pa/ /skya ba 'dzin la legs slob
53a5(rgyud 'grel): na/ /mtsho chen pha rol 'gro 'gyur zhing/ /gzhan du pha rol bgrod mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin bla ma dkon mchog gsum/ /byang chub sems la'ang dang ldan zhing/ /'jig rten la ni snying rjer ldan/ /'di ni gru zhes bya bar bshad/ /bla ma mkhas pa skya pa
53a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /gru ni thams cad rang ston pa/ /'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro rnams la/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin/ /skya ba 'dzin pa med par ni/ /gru ni pha rol bgrod mi nus/ /yon tan thams cad rab rtogs kyang/ /bla ma med par srid mthar min/ /de bas
53a7(rgyud 'grel): nges pa nyid du 'di/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas de bzhin du/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can rnams kyi/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor pa mchod bya/ /phyag la sogs pa'i bya ba kun/ /dus rnams kun tu rab tu bya/ /shes rab dad par yang dag ldan/ /skye bo rnams la snying rjer ldan
53b1(rgyud 'grel): khro ba med cing slu ba med/ /gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /spro chen rang gi brtson 'grus ldan/ /rtag tu bla ma'i bka' bzhin byed pa/ /ma bsgo yang ni rang gi blos/ /yo byad la sogs dngos po rnams/ /ci snyed pa dang ci nus dang/ /de bzhin bza' dang bca' sogs
53b2(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ /ji ltar brnyas par gyur kyang ni/ /yid ni zhum pa med par bzod/ /lung dang rigs pa rtogs pa po/ /slob ma yon tan kun ldan yin/ /mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin can/ /gang yang 'dri ba med pa ni/ /rlob par bya ba mi nus zhes/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis rab
53b3(rgyud 'grel): tu gsungs/ /ji ltar byis ba 'dag gong gis/ /ji dga' bar ni 'phen pa ltar/ /de bzhin gang zhig gzhan dbang gyur/ /dam pa chos kyi snod ma yin/ /ye shes grub pa las slob ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //yang da
53b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid ji lta bar/ /rig par bcas pas sngar bshad pa/ /de nyid rgyud kun la gnas pa/ /de rnams las ni cung zad bshad/ /'jig rten na ni rkun ma'i sgra/ /'bras can don du ston par byed/ /la la rkun ma nyid la smra/ /rgyud kyang de dang 'dra ba yin/ /sems can
53b5(rgyud 'grel): phan mdzad sangs rgyas rnams/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha mal/ /yi ge de dang de yi bstan/ /chos ni de nyid gsung bar mdzad/ /de nyid 'ba' zhig gsung ba dang/ /de bzhin la la tshig gnyis dang/ /dbang po gzhan pa 'ga' la chos/ /'ga' zhig gsung
53b6(rgyud 'grel): gi gzhan du min/ /dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa las/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa/ /byang chub sems zhes bshad pa yin/ /zhes gsungs te/ thog ma tha ma med ces bya ba ni skye ba dang 'jig pa
53b7(rgyud 'grel): med pa ste/ /'dis ni khyab pa nyid dang/ gzugs can ma yin pa nyid dang/ mi 'gyur pa nyid dang/ dus thams cad pa nyid du yang ston te/ phyogs na gnas pa dang/ gzugs can dang/ 'gyur ba dang dus rgyun chad pa rnams ni/ rnam par 'jig pa yin
54a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ gal te gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyang yul na gnas par 'gyur na/ 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur te/ dper na gla rtsi la sogs pa dri zhim pa rnams ni gzugs can ma yin na'ang yul na gnas pa gla rtsi la
54a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa 'am/ des bsgos pa'i rdzas rnams med na/ rnam par 'gyur pas 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad ni blo bur ba yin pa'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'o/ /sngar bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas na/ de nyid dngos dang dngos
54a3(rgyud 'grel): med zad pa'i gtso bo ste/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi don rnams rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir gtso bo 'am bdag po'o/ /stong pa dang snying rje mi phyed pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
54a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i stong pa nyid de dang/ thugs rje chen po mi phyed cing gcig tu gyur pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni snying rje zhes bya ba ste/ sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal po 'di nyid la rab tu bzhag par bya zhing/ bde ba'i
54a5(rgyud 'grel): yo byad thams cad kyis phan gdags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i bsam pa'o/ /'di skad ston par gyur te/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang lhan cig phan tshun khyab pa dang
54a6(rgyud 'grel): khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pas sems can thams cad la thugs rje chen pos gces par 'dzin par rtogs pa/ byang chub sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i don te/ 'dis ni bsgom pa yang de ltar bya'o zhes ston pa yin no/ /byang
54a7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems zhes bya ba ni/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ma lus pa rnams las dgongs pa 'di nyid yin no/ /las dang po pa rnams la yang byang chub sems ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems yin
54b1(rgyud 'grel): par gsungs so/ /yang de nyid las sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba ni/ /'dus pa 'dres par bshad pa yin zhes gsungs so/ /gzugs can rnams ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa mi srid pas/ sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku can yin te/ de rnams kyi 'dres pa ni de bzhin
54b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes te/ rdo rje 'chang ba nyid yin par ston gyi gzhan du na gzugs kyi sku ji ltar 'dres par 'gyur/ rdul phra rab tsam gyi tshad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'dres na yang rab tu gang zhing de bas lhag par
54b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ thams cad kyi sgras ni ma lus pa'i tshig yin pas nyung dus kyang 'dres par mi rigs so/ /yang de nyid las/ bskyed pa yis ni rim nyid dang/ de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste/ /rdzogs pa zhes bya ba/ /yang dag ye shes de nyid de/ /ma bcos pa zhes
54b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nyid/ /de nyid las ni yang dag bshad/ /gang gis thog mdza' med pa'i dngos/ /rnam dag yid kyis bsgom byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /le'u dang po las de nas nam mkha' i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo
54b5(rgyud 'grel): bor gnas par gyur to zhes gsungs pa dang/ yang ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la/ /dngos po med de bsgom pa'ang med/ /nam mkha' i tshul du sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po 'di dag rab tu bsgrags/ /yang chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i/ /gzod nas dag pa mkha' 
54b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshungs/ /byang chub med cing rtog pa'ang med/ /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ le'u dgu pa las/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ste/ chos thams cad nam mkha' i khongs su gtogs pa'o/ /chos
54b7(rgyud 'grel): de dag thams cad kyang/ 'dod pa'i khams na'ang mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na'ang mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na'ang mi gnas 'byung ba chen po bzhi la yang mi gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o de
55a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni don gyi dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar nam mkha' i tshig nges par brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes
55a2(rgyud 'grel): su rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na gtsub shing dang gtsub stan dang mi'i lag pa skyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba rab tu byung zhing/ me chen po 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/ me de yang gtsub stan la yang mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so/
55a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa rjes su rig par bya'o/ /le'u bcu pa las/ lus ngag sems rnams bsgom pa ni/ /rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa/ /gang la'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid/ /sku
55a4(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom/ /le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ /nam mkha' i khams dang mnyam gyur cing/ /rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la/ /rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom/ /le'u bcu drug pa las/ rdo rje thig ni gdab pa dang/ /tshon rtsi dag kyang
55a5(rgyud 'grel): dgye ba ni/ /sngags kyi sems dpa' mi bya ste/ /byas na byang chub rnyed pa dka' zhes gsungs te/ dkyil 'khor thig gdab dang tshon rtsi dgye ba la sogs pa mi bya'o/ /sngags kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni/ yid skyo bar byed par bya ba'i phyir sngags ni ye shes yin te/ yang dag
55a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gal te rmongs pas de ltar byed na ni byang chub rnyed par dka' bar 'gyur te/ byis pa'i skye bo las dang po sems can gyi bya ba byed pas sangs rgyas nyid dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid rnyed par dka' bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/
55a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa de la ni dkyil 'khor bri ba dang/ 'jug pa dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ni bkag pa yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i snang ba yis/ /rang rang ngo bo gsal bas na/ /de bzhin gshegs
55b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes dang/ /rnam snang mdzad du de bshad do/ /skye bo mi 'dod pa kun dang/ /log shes slob dpon skye bo yis/ /mi bskyod pa yi ngo bo bas/ /'di ni mi skyod yang dag bshad/ /gang phyir nges par sangs rgyas sogs/ /rin chen rnams ni rang 'byung nyid//
55b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems can don ldan pas/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bshad do/ /mi gnas pa yi mya ngan 'das/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das ma gos/ /grangs med yon tan yang dag ldan/ /'od dpag med par de bshad do/ /sems can kun don bya ba rnams/ /rang nyid
55b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni rang bsgrubs pas/ /don yod ye shes chen po ste/ /don yod grub pa zhes bshad do/ /phra ba dang ni rgya che'i tshul/ /'jig rten gsum po yongs mkhyen cing/ /zhing rnams kun nas gnas gzigs pas/ /des na spyan zhes bshad pa yin/ /de bzhin
55b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /nyid kyi nyid kyi thugs su chud/ /phan tshun du ni khyab nyid pas/ /des na mA ma kIr bshad do/ /kun mchog de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ /nyes pa kun sel ye shes ni/ /sems can yang dag sbyor bar brtson/ /gos dkar mo zhes bya
55b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bshad/ /thugs rje chen pos rtag tu ni/ /'gro ba 'don pa'i dgongs pa ni/ /sems can sgrol ba mkhas pas na/ /ye shes sgrol mar rab bshad do/ /khams gsum pa la sogs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes nyer longs spyod/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod
55b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni/ /spyan la sogs par rab tu bshad/ /kun mchog de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /bsod nams 'jigs pa las grol bas/ /rab gdug 'dul ba'i ye shes te/ /de bas gshin rje gshed du bshad/ /log pa'i shes pa rnam sel ba'i/
55b7(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pa'i sems can rab ston can/ /yang dag ye shes rab mchog ste/ /ldan pas shes rab mthar byed bshad/ /'gro ba kun gyi dga' ba rnams/ /rnam par brtags shing mi 'dzin la/ /srid pa dri med thugs chud pas/ /des ni pad+ma mthar byed bshad/ /bgegs
56a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa las rnam grol bdag /ye shes kun don bsgrub pa po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'grub/ /des na bgegs ni mthar byed bshad/ /shes dang shes bya zad gyur pa/ /snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bshad do/ /srid gsum mngon
56a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs ye shes ni/ /chags sogs gsum ni sbyong ba ste/ /sangs rgyas sun gyi rang bzhin dag /zhal gsum du ni de yongs bshad/ /gtsang zhing rnam dag ngo bo pas/ /sku mdog dkar po rab tu ston/ /sbyin pa kun kyang ser po nyid/ /dmar po dag tu thugs rjes mtshungs//
56a3(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed sogs/ /'dul bar mdzad par brtson gyur pa/ /'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa'i mchog /ye shes de ni nag por bshad/ /sna tshogs thabs ni rnam dag gang/ /sku mdog ljang gur rab tu bshad/ /gang phyir gzugs sogs skye mched
56a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /'di ni rab tu spyod mdzad de/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs ye shes/ /thugs chud phyag ni drug par bshad/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'gyur/ /shes rab dril bu yin par bshad/ /'khor lo mi shes yang dag gcod/ /rin chen de pas kyang rnyed dka' / /srid pa'i
56a5(rgyud 'grel): nyes pas ma gos phyir/ /ye shes de ni pad+mar bshad/ /ral gri nyon mongs dgra nges gcod/ /utpal steng du gyur ba ste/ /'khor ba'i chur ni nub pa yi/ /shes pa gang phyir skyes pas so/ /sangs rgyas rjes gnang sems can rnams/ /rdeg pas tho ba yin
56a6(rgyud 'grel): par bshad/ /dpyig pas chad pa 'dul ba ste/ /ye shes 'gro ba 'dul ba po/ /pad+ma skyes pa rnam dag phyir/ /rnam rtog dri ma spyod byed pa'o/ /phan tshun khyab pa byed pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs rdo rje yin par bshad/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom
56a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i snying po btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te zhes pa las/ 'di skad bdag gis dus gcig kho na'i tshe na thos te/ bcom ldan 'das ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang
56b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po ni ye shes so/ /de nyid rdo rje btsun mo ste/ mi phyed pa'i ye shes rang gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad 'jig pas b+ha ga ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
56b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga de rnams la bzhugs so/ /'di skad ston pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phan tshun khyab par bya ba dang khyab pa por gyur pa rnams su rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes de'i nang du chud pa yin no//
56b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nyid do zhugs so zhes bya ba ni/ de yang ye shes thams cad la rim gyis mi bzhugs te/ cig car nyid du ye shes thams cad la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i don to/ /brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang bzhes bya ba la sogs pa ni byang chub
56b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' tshad med par 'dod pa dang lhan cig ces bya ba'i don to/ /de rnams kyang tshul 'di nyid kyis bzhugs so zhes bya bar dgongs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po de kho na nyid 'dus pa las kyang gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen por
56b5(rgyud 'grel): sems brtan pa dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i thugs byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so/ /de nas de
56b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba skyed cing/ ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
56b7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags/ ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ bka' stsal bar gsol/ de bzhin gshegs 
57a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la rtog cing mnyam par gzhog la/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags ni ci dgar bzlas shing sgrub par gyis/ swa tsit+ta be taM ka ro mi/ byang chub sems dpa' chen
57a2(rgyud 'grel): pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gda' bar 'tshal ba lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na zla ba lta bu ste/
57a3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes de nyid do/ /dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rims kyis rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bsam pa rin po che yang rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dper na zla ba'i
57a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ni glo bur gyi dri ma rnams dang bral zhing/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer dang bral bas rim gyis rdzogs par snang ngo/ /de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi rin po che yang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma'i nag nog dang
57a5(rgyud 'grel): bral zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su rdzogs par snang ngo/ /gnyis su med par mnyam par rnam par rgyal ba las kyang/ oM sarba ta thA ga to dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ /yang le'u dgu pa las/ dngos po du mar ma gos pa/ de nyid ces bya de bsgoms
57a6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /sangs rgyas sku yi cho ga zhes/ /de bzhin nyid du nye bar spyod/ /gzhan du sngags la sogs pa kun/ /dge ba grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang le'u bcu gsum pa las/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /de nyid shes pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ /'di
57a7(rgyud 'grel): ni de nyid sgrub pa yin/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur bshad/ /zla gsang nor bu'i thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsungs te/ yan lag kun bsgom las 'das shing/ /rtog dang brtag bya rnam spangs la/ /gug skyed thig le yang dag 'das/ /'di ni dkyil
57b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dam pa yin/ /yang de nyid las/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /de nyid dngos po thams cad kyis/ /thams cad du ni yang dag bzhugs/ /yang/ byang chub sems las ma gtogs pa'i/ /bde gzhan srid pa
57b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum na med/ /byang chub sems dngos bde ba ni/ /bde ba thams cad skyed byed pa'o/ /'dus pa'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid las bstan te/ /nga yang 'dod dang gzugs mchog tu/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /ngas kyang chos kyi sku mchog tu/ /sangs
57b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad byin gyis brlabs/ /'dra dgyes bcom ldan rtag par ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /gang phyir de rnams skyes pas na/ /'di ni de nyid yin par 'dod/ /yang/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje sems dpar de bshad do/ /de yi sems
57b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' thog mdza' med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen yin/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khams gsum pa/ /mi rgyu thams cad 'di yin no/ /rdo rje chen po mchog chen po/ /rgyu ba sems kyi 'dus byas te/ /kun mdzad thams
57b5(rgyud 'grel): cad 'di yin no/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las kyang gsungs te/ /ye shes mig gcig dra ma med/ /ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/ /mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po/ /phra zhing zag med sa bon bral/ /le'u bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i le'u las/ chos
57b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams skye ba med pa ste/ /'gyur ba med cing gnas pa med/ /rtog dang bral ba'i tshul spangs 'di/ /bskyed par bya zhes rab tu gsungs/ /yang de nyid las/ chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ /gzod nas dag cing rtog pa med/ /sems can med cing srog
57b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang med/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang byang chub sems/ /dpal rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan las gsungs pa/ thams cad du ni khams kun dang sems can kun la thams cad du/ /lus kun la ni mnyam par khyab/ /sems can khams bzhin yang dag gnas/ /zag
58a1(rgyud 'grel): pa med kyang bsam mi khyab/ /dri med nga med rang bzhin dang/ /stong dang mkha' dang mnyam nyid dang/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'o/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba'o/ /chos kun gyi ni dbang phyug sku/ /gzugs rnams kun gyi 'byor
58a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ bden pa gnyis la yang dag gnas/ /mchog yin dam pa'i don gyis na/ /de ni chos kyi sku zhes bshad/ /dbang po kun dang rnam shes dang/ /sems can kun las yang dag tu/ /yid dang rnam shes zhes bshad cing/ /shes rab blo dang blo gros ldan/ /lhag
58a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong kun mkhyen ye shes ni/ /shes bya nyon mongs thar pa nyid/ /rtag dang chad pa'i mdza' las grol/ /mdza' gnyis dag ni rnam par spangs/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam las/ /de ni rnam pa gnyis su brtag /dper na bud shing la gnas te/ /me yi sa bon kun tu
58a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /dper na til la til mar dang/ /bu ram shing la khu bar brtag /dper na me tog la dri dang/ /dper na zho la mar sar bzhin/ /kun tu sems can thams cad dang/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu dang/ /gzugs dang gzugs med rtog pa la/ /phyag rgya chen po rab
58a5(rgyud 'grel): tu gnas/ /yang/ ye shes 'di mi 'jigs pa dang/ /mi bzad pa dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ bzod ma nas dag pa dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ 'od gsal ba dang/ brjod du med pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /bde mchog gi rgyud las kyang gsungs te/ /gzugs
58a6(rgyud 'grel): brnyan lugs ma la sogs las/ /rnal 'byor skye bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /byang chub sems la rab brtson na/ /sems las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni/ /de bas thams cad bdag 'byor pas/ /sangs
58a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang/ /thos pa dang ni dran pas kyang/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /mthong zhing mtshang ba byas par 'gyur/ /'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor dag
58b1(rgyud 'grel): tu ma zhugs dang/ /bde ba dag kyang mthong bas na/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang/ /thos pa dang ni dran pa yin/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub/ /'di dag sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam
58b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i/ /bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing/ /sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad kun/ /bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub par/ /de yis bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /'di yi bdag nyid
58b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gnas pa/ /mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi/ /bkod pa'i rab 'byams mchog dag gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par mdzad/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi longs spyod kyis/ /ji ltar bde ba bsten byed cing/ /rang gi lha mi rnal 'byor gyis//
58b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya/ /yang sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sna tshogs 'dul ba'i bdag nyid ni/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /gzhan pa thams cad sgrub par bya/ /gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /sangs rgyas phyag
58b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i brda' yis ni/ /skal bzangs shes nas rnam par grags/ /yang/ cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la/ /las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /gdul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin/ /dpal mchog dang po las kyang/ /gsang
58b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i pad+ma'i tshogs mthong ba la sogs pa ni gzhung mangs kyis dogs nas ma bris so/ /ye shes grub pa las gsungs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi yi ge'i tshogs nges par bstan pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o// //de ltar shes mchog thams
58b7(rgyud 'grel): cad ni/ /bcas pa yang dag bsgom pa ni/ /shin tu drag po'i bdag nyid can/ /skye ba gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /thabs dang snying rje'i rtse ba can/ /byang chub sems ni legs bsags la/ /sems can kun la snyoms pa dang/ /dkon mchog gsum mi
59a1(rgyud 'grel): dad pas mchod/ /stong nyid mngon du ye shes shing/ /'dod pa kun las chags bral zhing/ /longs spyod rnams kyang mchod pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'chang/ /phyag la sogs pa rnam dag ni/ /bsngo ba'i bar du
59a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ /thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /snying rje la sogs rab tu gsungs/ /de ltar thabs shes rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs rgyas kun 'dra gnyis pa yin/ /de la 'tsho ba cung zad kyang/ /rtag par kun tu yod ma yin/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor
59a3(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /gang zhig bsrung bar yongs bsgrags pa/ /sangs rgyas kun dang de sras kyis/ /lung kun tu ni nges gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas de rnams kyis/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya bar du/ /bsrung ba mdzad pa gang yin pa/ /de ni ye shes de bsgom pa'i
59a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam bzhi dang ldan pa ru/ /bsgom pa ru ni gsungs pa yin/ /bde ba thams cad ster byed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ba yi gnas ma gsungs/ /rnal 'byor smyung la mi gnas shing/ /gcer bu rnam rtog dag pa min/ /sna tshogs rtogs las rnam grol
59a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag /rnal 'byor mchog gi bdag nyid bsgom/ /lus dang yid kyi sdug bsngal dang/ bskal ba bye bar mi bya'o/ /bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan/ /'grub par 'di nyid the tshom med/ /sems can thams cad skye ba ni/ /'gro drug las yod gzhan yod min/ /de bas
59a6(rgyud 'grel): gang duAng gzung bya min/ /khyad par spyan ni rnyed mi 'gyur/ /gnas dang yul dang khyim dang ni/ /glegs bam sku yi gzugs brnyan la/ /'dzin pa kun las rnam grol ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams sangs rgyas bsngags/ /ye shes grub pa las thabs nges
59a7(rgyud 'grel): par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //yang dag ye shes yang dag bskyed/ /rnal 'byor pa ni rtag gsal 'debs/ /khams gsum pa yi phyag byas pas/ /dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin bya/ /yo byad kun dang nyer ldan zhing/ /mos
59b1(rgyud 'grel): pas thams cad legs bsags pas/ /yon tan kun gyi gnas gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon mchog mnyes bya/ /bza' dang bca' la sogs pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag mchod byas la/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas brjod/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid drin
59b2(rgyud 'grel): can gyis/ /yang dag ye shes mchog thob ste/ /rang rig pa yi ngo bo la/ /bdag ni shin tu nges pa skyes/ /gnyis med ye shes 'di nyid ni/ /'gro ba gzhan la yod ma yin/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi 'di 'thung phyir/ /bla ma che la gsol ba 'debs/ /sems
59b3(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi bya ba ni/ /ci nus par ni bdag bgyid cing/ /ltos med chos kyi sbyin pa ni/ /bdag nyid ji ltar stsol 'gyur ba/ /dbang bskur ba yi rin chen mchog /gal te drin gyis thob 'gyur ba/ /bdag gis legs par 'tshal lags na/ /'jigs pa
59b4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i bka' drin gsol/ /gal te 'gro ba shes rab ldan/ /bla mas kyang ni dga' ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes gsungs pa/ /de ltar rab tu sbyin par bya/ /bcom ldan thugs rje ldan pa yis/ /gsung gi don kun phun tshogs pas/ /chos kyi rgyal
59b5(rgyud 'grel): po dbang bskur gsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni bla med yin/ /de nas nyin zhag nges byas te/ /slob ma la ni tshig bsgo ba/ /de nas nyin zhag gang gi tshe/ /bu mo thams cad rdzogs pa yi/ /yid du nges par gyur pas na/ /de bas sems ni brtan par gyis/ /ji
59b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar gangs dkar mi 'gyur ba/ /blo gros chen po de ltar gyis/ /de nas nyin zhag nges thob pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mchod/ /'phags pa dge 'dun mchod bstod ni/ /yon dang bcas pa sbyin par bya/ /tshogs kyi ston mo rgya chen dang/ /khyad par bu ni bla ma
59b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /mgon med la yang ci nus sbyin/ /cho ga thams cad kun tu spyad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing/ /kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la/ /yon dbul ba ni dam pa 'grub/ /gang la gang ni btang dka' ba/ /de ni mchog tu bshad pa
60a1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog /yang na shin tu khyad par ni/ /de dang de ni bla ma la/ /de nyid mi bzang 'dod pas dbul/ /yang na de bzhin 'dod 'gyur bar/ /'on te sems la dgos pa dag /de bzhin yang na dgos pa bya/ /de
60a2(rgyud 'grel): ni chung yang mchog yin no/ /gal te de la mchog yod la/ /de la ngan pa'i yon phul na/ /kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na/ /de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob/ /'di ni rgyud kyi rgyal po bde mchog gi yin no/ /bdag nyid kyang ni phul nas su/ /slar yang rin gyis slu ba ni//  
60a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rgyud du gsungs pa yin/ /yon ni bla na med pa yin/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun dbang bskur/ /rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos rnal 'byor ni/ /thams cad yang dag bde ba skyed/ /sems can kun gyis ma rtogs pa/ /'jig rten mgon
60a4(rgyud 'grel): pos gsungs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs/ /sku dang gsung ni thams cad 'dus/ /de ltar gnyis ka shes nas kyang/ /byin gyis brlabs pa brjod par bya/ /'di dag thams cad yid dang ni/ /lus dang ngag las yang dag 'byung/ /sangs
60a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs phyir/ /rjes gnang de la sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi phyir/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur zhing/ /'das dang ma 'ongs rnams dang ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis kyang ngo/ /nga ni blo gros chen po khyod/ /sangs rgyas kun dang sku gcig
60a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /chos dang zang zing sbyin pa yis/ /sems can rjes su bzung bar gyis/ /ci nus par ni dkon mchog gsum/ /bde ba skyed par bsrung bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i bya ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis nges gsungs te/ /rdo rje'i 'dzin mchog khyod kyis ni/ /brnyas
60a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dag kyang mi bya'o/ /yang ba ni ma spangs pas/ /dus byas shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /nga rgyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa'i tshogs/ /bskal pa brgyar ni myong bar 'gyur/ /gang yang 'jig rten sun 'byin dang/ /log pa'i chos ni kun spyod dang/ /dam chos spong
60b1(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'o/ /de dang kun tu gnas mi bya/ /rmongs shing chos bral de dag ni/ /rang gi bde ba rtson yid ldan/ /tshul ngan bsod nams bral ba yis/ /byang chub mchog thob mi 'gyur gyi/ /'khor ba ru ni phan tshun du/ /'gro ba drug tu shin tu 'khor/ /'jig rten rmongs pa'i
60b2(rgyud 'grel): ngang tshul can/ /rab tu 'dre bar byed mtshungs shing/ /de 'dra ba yi dri ma yang/ /'khrul ba'i chos la kun tu gnas/ /de rnams bde 'gror mi skye zhing/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni rnyed par dka' / /blo gros chen po khyod kyis ni/ /de rnams la ni rtag srung bya/ /de ltar bdud kyi zhags pas
60b3(rgyud 'grel): bcings/ /gzhan rnams kyang ni phung ba yin/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid do/ /da ni sems can don rnams kyis/ /ji ltar 'dul ba rnams la chos/ /'gro ba kun la rab tu shod/ /da ni khyod kyi chos rnams la/ /som nyi dag ni mi bya'o/ /slar ni dbang bskur mi rlab bo//
60b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du dam tshig nyams par 'gyur/ /yang dag chos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /dbang bskur khyod kyi thob pas na/ /'di las mchog gzhan yod ma yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /ye shes mchog gi dbang
60b5(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bdag nyid chen po ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las gsungs te/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba mngon par rtog pa'i dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon la
60b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' 
60b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis blta bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ykyi sems rdo rje dang slob dpon 'di nyid gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /rigs kyi bu mdor byas nas bstan par bya ste/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed
61a1(rgyud 'grel): cig 'khod cing 'tsho ba dang skyong ba de dag thams cad dus gsum du lhags nas/ /slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang 'gro'o/ /dag rdo rje'i yi ge
61a2(rgyud 'grel): de yang 'di skad brjod de/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha'o/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma'o/ /zhes pa nas/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa'o zhes pa'i bar du'o/ /'di lta ste dper na
61a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na ji snyed bzhugs shing rab tu spyod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi sku dang thugs rdo rje'i bsod nams kyi phung po bas kyang slob dpon gyi ba spu'i khung po gcig 'phags so/ /de ci'i phyir
61a4(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa dang/ skye ba'i gnas su gyur pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i bar du'o/ /ye shes grub pa las/ ye shes
61a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //rdo rje ye shes chen po rab tu bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i mthu ni bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang brjod par mi nus mod kyi/ dpal bde mchog las
61a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa cung zad gcig brjod par bya ste/ kun tu kun nas thams cad du/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan g.yo kun/ /kun tu dngos po de 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa sgrub par
61a7(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa ston/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /sna tshogs gzugs byed rig pa yis/ /'gro ba mdza' dag mgu bar byed/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /'joms 'du mas g.yul
61b1(rgyud 'grel): la byed grub pa dag /rgyal srid sgyu ma rnam sprul pas/ /bya ba thams cad ston par byed/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /bdag brtul phod pas mnan nas ni/ /'gro ba thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /rta ni gar gyis ston par byed/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas
61b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyi mdza' klas pa'i/ /sna tshogs kun gyi mchog gis ni/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dpal dgyes rol pa rnam 'phrul ba/ /sna tshogs kyis
61b3(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam par grol/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis/ /'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can khams ni rab tu sdud/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i/ /nam mkha' dbyings
61b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi mdza' klas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i mchog /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gsungs/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grags pas/ /lus can gang der rab grags pa/ /thams cad bdag nyid grub bar byed
61b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun tu mes pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo mtshar du/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis/ /shin tu gdug cing khro gtum pa/ /sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams/ /'jig rten
61b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu 'jig /shin tu gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams/ /byis pa rkun po chom po yis/ /thams cad rnam par spyod par byed/ /bris pa dang ni sgyu dag dang/ /ngo mthon stobs dang de bzhin du/ /dgra cha lnga yi rgal nas ni/ /de tshe 'jig rten gsum las
61b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ /skye 'gro'i gnas dang 'gro ba rnams/ /'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /mdza' dag brtul nas grub par 'gyur/ /'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu skyong/ /g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par 'gyur/ /khro ba
62a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la khro ba'i mchog /zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog /drag shul can la drag por gnon/ /sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du/ /dbang phyug dam pa rab mnan nas/ /lha mo dbu ma phrogs nas ni/ /de tshe longs spyod rang gi
62a2(rgyud 'grel): spyod/ /sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du/ /mthu bo che la? rab mnan nas/ /du phi ni yang phrogs nas ni/ /de tshe longs spyod rang gis spyod/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /skye dgu'i bdag po rab mnan nas/ /lha mo rab tu zhi ba phrogs/ /de tshe longs spyod rang
62a3(rgyud 'grel): gis spyod/ /sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du/ /'dod pa'i lha ni rab mnan nas/ /dga' sdug ma yin dbang phyug ma/ /phrogs nas de tshe bdag rang spyod/ /de la sogs te mdza' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyi mthas
62a4(rgyud 'grel): klas par/ /rdo rje las mchog rnam par gnon/ /de la sogs te rnam 'phrul ba/ /sna tshogs rgyud las bstan pa yin/ /ye shes grub pa las mthu nges par bstan pa dang dbang po mchog rnams legs par spyad pa ste le'u bco brgyad pa'o// //
62a5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig yang dag ye shes med/ /'di ltar log shes sbyor bar ldan/ /dbang po gang ma zhes bshad de/ /de yi bya ba rab bshad bya/ /gang zhig sngar ni rab bshad pa'i/ /phyag la sogs pa thams cad dang/ /de bzhin 'dus pa'i tshig tu bshad/ /de dag
62a6(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang bya ba yin/ /rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi/ /rang gi lha yi skad cig gis/ /bskyed la mngon bzhin rnal 'byor pas/ /lam la gnas te bzlas brjod brtsam/ /mthar yang 'di skad brjod par bya/ /sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /thams cad
62a7(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /bdag la bka' drin mdzad du gsol/ /thog med dus nas 'di bar duAng/ /bdag ni 'khor bar 'khor gyur te/ /yang dag ye shes ma mthong bas/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyis rtag tu dub/ /ji ltar ye shes skye 'gyur bas/ /gang
62b1(rgyud 'grel): gi ye shes mchog thob nas/ /sems can kha lo bsgyur 'gyur ba/ /khyed kyis de ltar bdag la mdzod/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de bzhin de ltar ma byon pas/ /sems can don mdzad ces grags pa/ /de ltar bdag ni bgyid par brtson
62b2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa 'di dang legs ldan pa/ /gal te yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba/ /de ni ye shes mchog 'gyur te/ /log pa'i lam du 'gro mi 'gyur/ /ye shes grub pa las/ /dbang po 'bring po bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //phyag rgya'i
62b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sku mdog sogs/ /phyag dang gdan ni rnam bsgom dang/ /ting 'dzin gsum dang phyag rgya bzhi/ /zhal gsum dang ni phyag drug rnams/ /sgom 'gyur de ni phyi shun can/ /sna tshogs spros pa'i man ngag rnams/ /de kun dman pa'i yin par bshad//
62b4(rgyud 'grel): de rnams la yang de bzhin thabs/ /de la gtan tshigs bshad par bya/ /mchog dang bar ma'i lam dag las/ /ji bzhin chung ngu gzhan bya ba/ /lha dang sngags ni rnal 'byor pas/ /rgyud las gsungs pa kun tu bya/ /gang las mnyam pa'i sems yod pa//
62b5(rgyud 'grel): de la ye shes skye 'gyur gyi/ /gzhan du bskal pa bye ba ni/ /brgyas kyang de thob mi 'gyur ro/ /kun tu sems dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsa ba cher ldan blo gros bzang/ /sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ye shes mchog thob 'gyur/ /gang zhig
62b6(rgyud 'grel): bar mdza' gnyis po nyid/ /bsgom pa gsum po gtso bo bas/ /yang dag ye shes 'byung ba'i don/ /yang dag bya ba dbang du 'gyur/ /de nyid med par 'tshang mi rgya/ /lam la bgrod pa de nyid min/ /de bas lam la gnas bdag nyid/ /bsgrubs nas
62b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig lam las nyams pa dang/ /snying rje dang bral sems ldan zhing/ /chags sogs don la spro bdag nyid/ /de rnams la ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /ye shes grub pa las dbang po tha ma bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //
63a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa ye shes grub phyir/ /bdag gis yang dag shin tu bshad/ /rgyud kun du ni sbas gyur pa'i/ /gsang ba 'di ni bshad mi bya/ /gang la ye shes mchog gi mi/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni med gyur pa/ /lha yi gzungs
63a2(rgyud 'grel): ni bsgom pa la/ /sems ni brtson pa dag tu bya/ /glegs bam tsam zhig bstan pa yang/ /sbyin mi bya bar shes bya ste/ /rdo rje ye shes rab spangs pas/ /rmongs pa dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi dmyal ba'i rgyur gyur pas/ /mi de mnar med
63a3(rgyud 'grel): 'thob par 'gyur/ /de bas bdag gzhan phud ba ni/ /'byung bas nges par bsrung bar bya/ /gzhan du ston par 'gyur na ni/ /dam tshig dag kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni dam pa ru/ /brtse ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rtog ma'i
63a4(rgyud 'grel): dra ba rnam spangs pa/ /rdo rje ye shes 'di mchog yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sgrub pa yi/ /lung dang rig pa las shes byas/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni byas pa la/ /bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa/ /des ni sems can thams cad kyang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
63a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog thob shog /dpal dbu rgyan nas byung ba/ ye shes grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon in+d+ra b+huA tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rin chen bzang pos bsgyur/ /slad kyis nag tshos bcos so// //
63a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par grub ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba dpal mos mdzad pa bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ a dwa ya sid+d+hi sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ gnyis su med par grub pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
63a7(rgyud 'grel): mgon po'i rang bzhin gsal ba ni/ /khams gsum las byung thams cad mkhyen/ /rdo rje che la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /dgos pa'i don gyi 'bras bu 'byin/ /yul dus tshes dang gza' skar dang/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa mi dgos pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i
63b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs bshad/ /bsdus te sgrub pa sgrub pa'i mchog /dam bcas dka' thub smyung ba dang/ /snying po bsgom pa smra ba la/ /'di nyid med par gyur na ni/ /bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyar mi 'gyur/ /che chung sa bon la sogs tshogs/ /sna yi nang nas 'byung ba
63b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sngags pa rtag tu mchod pa byed/ /bdag nyid de nyid bsgoms te mchod/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang/ /de bzhin tsha mo nyid dang ni/ /shes rab thabs su bya ba ste/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mchod/ /yan lag gcig med rigs ngan dang/ /gzo !bo
63b3(rgyud 'grel): khyi sha can sogs kyi/ /bu mo rtag tu mchod par bya/ /ye shes rdo rje bsgom pa che/ /de kho na nyid kyi sngags kyi 'bras bu ni 'di yin no/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ ji ltar sems can 'ching ba ni/ /drag po'i las kyi sems can rnams/ /thabs kyi 'khor ba dag
63b4(rgyud 'grel): las grol/ /dam tshig nyin mtshan rtag tu ni/ /rigs lnga las? byung bzang po dang/ /gsal ba'i tshogs kyis mchod pa byed/ /'o ma 'bab pas sna tshogs 'byung/ /sngags pa rab dga' i mig gis ni/ /rtag tu mig gi mdangs phyung ste/ yang dag sems
63b5(rgyud 'grel): ni brtan po yis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho sgom par byed/ /ji ltar g.yo dang mi g.yo ba/ /khams gsum thams cad ma lus pa/ /thams cad de nyid rnal 'byor ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du mthong/ /gzhan du kha cig smra ba dang/ /mtshan ma'i bye brag 'dug
63b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /de la brnyas par mi bya ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rdzu 'phrul nyid/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid gnas te/ /ma lus dngos po med pa ni/ /sngags pa rtag tu sgom par byed/ /phung po'i rang bzhin dag pa nyid/ /dri dang gos dang me tog sogs/ /spos dang lha
63b7(rgyud 'grel): bshos de bzhin du/ /glu dang ral mo gar sogs kyi/ /thabs kyi bdag po dga' bar 'gro /dka' thub ngan pas gzir mi bya/ /smyung ba yis ni las mi bya/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste/ /blo gros chung ngu'i spyod mi bya/ /lugs ma la sogs phyag mi bya/
64a1(rgyud 'grel): sa shing rdo sogs de bzhin no/ /bdag gi lus la rgyun tu mchod/ /rtag tu sems gcig kho nas mchod/ /sbrang bu bsre ba'i skyugs pa yis/ /che chung tshegs kyi sbyang bar bya/ /gsal ba lnga dang ldan par byed/ /rdo rje
64a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa mchod par byed/ /bud med rang byung me tog ni/ /byang chub sems dang ldan par bya/ /rtag tu lha mo mchod par bya/ /phung po'i de nyid bsgom par byed/ /gzhan gyi nor dag dbrog par bya/ /gzhan gyi bud med rgyu bar bya/ /rdzun gyi tshig kyang
64a3(rgyud 'grel): smra bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gsad par bya/ /rdo sogs mchod rten mi bya ste/ /glegs bam dag kyang bklag mi bya/ /rmi lam tsam du dkyil 'khor ni/ /lus kyi bya bar mi bya'o/ /thams cad dag ni kun la yang/ /rtog pa dag ni mi bya ste/ /rdo rje sems
64a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i bdag nyid du/ /dngos po ma lus gyur bar bsam/ /sngags pa 'gro dang 'dug pa dang/ /de bzhin za dang mi za dang/ /'thung dang mi 'thung ba dag la/ /sems ni rtog par mi bya'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad byung ba la/ /sems can thams cad yan
64a5(rgyud 'grel): lag tu/ /mkhas pas sems can kun blangs te/ /dngos grub rgyur ni bza' bar bya/ /thams cad rigs nas byung ba yi/ /bud med dag la brtag mi bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan pha rol phyin/ /kun rdzob tsam gyis gzugs nyid do/ /tshes grangs skar ma
64a6(rgyud 'grel): mi dgos te/ /smyung bar yang ni gnas mi bya/ /gnyis med ye shes ldan pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /mang po smras te ci zhig bya/ /ji lta ji ltar mthong ba dag /de dag thams cad rnal 'byor gyis/ /mthong zhing rig pas shes
64a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /ba lang rta bong rnga mo dang/ /ba dang khyi las byung ba las/ /gsal bar che ba bsres byas te/ /rnal 'byor mkhyen pas rtag tu bza' / /gcig la chags par mi bya ste/ /gang yang blang dor mi bya'o/ /rnal 'byor mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'khor ba'i
64b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho rgal bar byed/ /'byung dang 'dug dang 'gro ba dang/ /kun gyis mang po spros pa dang/ /de dag med na 'khor ba med/ /skye ba dang ni 'byung ba med/ /bcom ldan rdo rje nyi mas ni/ /shes rab mtshan mos bshad pa ste/ /de 'dra'i rnal 'byor bsgom byed na/ /
64b2(rgyud 'grel): myur du dngos grub thob par byed/ /thams cad sems kyi chos nyid ni/ /dngos por ma grub brtag dka' ba/ /de nyid slob dpon zhal nas ni/ /thob par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /mtshan ma med pa gnas ni med/ /de shes byang
64b3(rgyud 'grel): chub mchog tu 'gro /de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /blo can rtag tu brlab par bya/ /de nyid 'grub par the tshom med/ /bsod nams med pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /khams gsum na ni slob dpon las/ /che bar gyur pa gzhan med na/ /de nyid kyis ni bka' 
64b4(rgyud 'grel): drin gyis/ /dngos grub mang po thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad phyag kyang 'tshal/ /slob dpon mchod pa bla na med/ /ci tsam nus pas mchod par bya/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid/ /sems can rnams kyi don
64b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyir/ /gzugs su snang ba kun rdzob ste/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid gdan la bzhugs/ /'chi bdag de ni rtag pa che/ /thams cad ma lus stong pa nyid/ /rang gi rtog pas mi snang la/ /gzhan dag de la dka' bar byed/ /gnyis su med par grub pa'i sgrub
64b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs zhes bya ba 'di ni u rgyan gyi skye ba rnal 'byor gdan gyi sgrub pa'i lta'i gnas nas byung ba bcom ldan 'das ma lak+Sh+mI'i zhal snga nas byung ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI o Ti yan bi ni gu hya mahA gu hya tat+tA u pa de sha/
64b7(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dpal u rgyan nas byung ba gsang ba chen po de kho na nyid kyi man ngag /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo lus gnas cha shas bcas par rtogs/ /nges 'byung de bzhin cha shas med/ /cha shas 
65a1(rgyud 'grel): can dang cha med pa/ /shes nas 'di grol the tshom med/ /dngos po thams cad mnyam pa nyid/ /myur du 'jug par dka' ba nyid/ /dpe dang gtan tshigs rnam par spangs/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal zhing/ /gnyug ma ru ni
65a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ste/ /dpyad pa'i yul las 'das pa yin/ /rtsod med zhi ba mtshon cha med/ /nges pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas/ /bskul ba med cing rgyu ba med/ /shin tu stong zhing rdul med pa/ /sgra las 'das shing yon tan spangs/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gnas//
65a3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig 'gro la rnam gnas pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas sku ru brtags/ /dpe med brtag pa med pa ru/ /mkhas bsam lus bsgom par bya/ /mi brtags par ni gang rtog pa/ /de yis thams cad brtags pa yin/ /rtog pa bde dang sdug bsngal 'khor/ /nga yi
65a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud du gsal ma byas/ /shes nyen can la de yi chos/ /so so ru ni bstan pa yin/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa med pa dang/ /las rnams thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de nyid 'dir ni rab shes na/ /srid pa'i rtog las rnam grol 'gyur/ /dngos rnam rang bzhin
65a5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa la/ /rang bzhin nyid du rtog byed pa/ /de yi don dam shes min te/ /las kyi zhags pas bcings pa yin/ /kha cig dkyil 'khor las byed yin/ /kha cig 'gying zhing gsang sngags zlos/ /kha cig dag ni gsang sngags 'chang/ /kha cig sbyin sreg
65a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin byed/ /kha cig nga rgyal gyis ni gnas/ /kha cig 'dod chags zhe sdang bsten/ /de kun las kyi 'khor bar gnas/ /gang du 'gro ba gnas gyur pa'i/ /gsang chen 'di ni she gyur na/ /gang la'ang sdig pa yod min cing/ /dgag par bya ba ci
65a7(rgyud 'grel): yang med/ /las rnams thams cad byas kyang ni/ /gos med skur ni rnam par grol/ /las rnam thams cad de la gnas/ /las rnam skun gyi gtso byi/ /sku gsung thugs la sogs pa dang/ /dbang po'i yid bcas shin tu gnas/ /rtag tu
65b1(rgyud 'grel): legs par dpyad pa ste/ /lus kyi nyes pas gos med pa/ /rang bzhin dag pas sku gsum gnas/ /kun rtog yid kyi shes pa ni/ /de bas dngos po thams cad ni/ /nyin mtshan bcas te de la gnas/ /mthong sogs de yi rang bzhin nyid//
65b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pha rol cing bzhugs/ /shes rab thab kyi cho ga yis/ /las dang chos ni mnyam nyid du/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sbyang par bya/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam snyam sems pa/ /chos dang las ni mnyam nyid du/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sbyar bar bya/ /yon
65b3(rgyud 'grel): tan ldan dang yon tan med/ /rang nyid byed po sdud po gtso/ /gsang chen 'gro ba la gnas pa/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyis min/ /sems dang sems byung rang bzhin gyis/ /bde ba chen po rang nyid sang/ /'khor bar med pa'i dngos po gang/ /byang chub
65b4(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi rang bzhin bsgom/ /gnyi ga'i rang bzhin dbyer med pa/ /sems kyi rang bzhin shes nas ni/ /sems kyi rgyu ba kun spangs te/ /mnyam pa'i rom la gnas par bya/ /gsang ba chen po gnas med pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yi gsang chen sbyor/ /dpal
65b5(rgyud 'grel): u rgyan nas byung ba/ /gsang ba gsang ba chen po de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba slob dpon chen po dA ri rka pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /bya ga ta b+hA ba a nu ga ta taN+tA sid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ dngos po gsal ba'i rjes su
65b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro pa'i de kho na nyid grub pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba rnam kyi bde chen rgyal po gcig pu nyid/ /rgyu rnams dang bral rtag tu
65b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar gyur pa ste/ /gang zhig gis ni nye bar brjod pa'i dus dag tu/ /thams cad mkhyen pa tshig gi dbul gyur rgyal gyur cig /bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la yun rungs su/ /rtag tu grub pas bkas gnang khyad par gyi/ /bdag nyid dran phyir bdag nyid bris 'di
66a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ skye bo mkhas pa su zhig sdang bar byed/ /'dir gnyis su med cing rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas skabs su/ bdag nyid kyi don de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid skyes pa dang/
66a2(rgyud 'grel): bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul te/ rang gi ngo bo nyid 'byin pa po'i rang bzhin du/ dngos po gsal ba'i rjes su ston par mdzad de/ lhan cig skyes pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i nyams dga' ba'i bu mo la kun tu bltas nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba'i 'dod
66a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yid gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu chags pa dang bcas pas rol pa dang bcas kun tu gzigs par mdzad do/ /de nas shin tu 'jam zhing des pa'i gsung gis thugs 'dzin par mdzad cing/ de'i 'og tu de la dri zhim pos 'thug por
66a4(rgyud 'grel): byugs pa'i dri bsung chags pa bsnams pas thugs tshim par mdzad do/ /de nas thugs nyams su lon pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa brgyas bkrus pa bzhin du/ dga' ba dang bde ba chen po thob nas/ cham tshom med par bde ba'i bye brag ngag gis khyud do/ /de
66a5(rgyud 'grel): nas bdag nyid don byas pa bzhin du yid la sems shing/ dpe med pa'i ro myang ba'i phyir/ 'o bya ba'i ram pa dag mdzad do/ /de las kyang sos 'debs pas mchod pa dang/ 'bigs pa la sogs pa'i bye brag dag khyad par du mdzad do/ /de'i rjes la yang
66a6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bde ba skyes pas rmongs pa bsal ba'i phyir/ skabs skabs su shin tu 'jam pa'i sen mo 'debs pas sad par byed do/ /de nas kyang mgrin pa nas gya gyu'i sgra zab mo sgrog pa la sogs pa rol pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam pa ? rmi lam lta bu la bdag
66a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid gar mkhan lta bus kun tu rtse bar mdzad do/ /de dag gis ni de'i sems kyi khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rab tu spyod pa'i sgrub pas spyod pas rjes su spyod par mdzad par gyur pa yin no/ /mdza' bos chags pas kun tu lta zhing de'i rjes su sbrang rtsi 'dzag 'dra'i tshig 'ji
66b1(rgyud 'grel): dang /de nas dga' ba'i char 'bebs lag pa'i mtsho skyes skyong bas de la kun 'khyud pa'i/ rim gyis chag pa'i ra yis de ni su yin bdag cir gyur pa ma shes te/ grogs rnams sngar med bde ba tshig gis brjod du mi btub pa cig skyes par
66b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa la 'jug go /yid las byung ba las skyes pa'i spros pa'i rgyun gyi 'ching ba 'dis gnyis ka bcings te/ gang gi gnyi ga'i sems kyi 'jug pa ji srid du gzhan mi dran zhing dga' ba'i dran pa la phyogs pa ste/ 'jug
66b3(rgyud 'grel): pas dga' ba'i gdung bas chags te zhu bar gyur nas chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin du ltos pa med par rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu nang du gyur pa'i sems kyi 'jug pa'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /ma bsams
66b4(rgyud 'grel): par ka ra na'i bye brag dag las gsal bar byed cing/ gnyis ka yang sdig ces zer zhing thams cad la cher ltos pa med cing tsham tshom med pa dang bcas pas shin tu rgya che ba'i dga' ba'i sgrub pa spel bar gyur to/ /de las kyang bde ba'i bya ba shin
66b5(rgyud 'grel): tu goms pas longs spyod kyi thogs pa sad par byas te/ dga' ba dang bde bas yang dag par spel ba 'jug pas bskyed pa ni/ dbang po las 'das shing rang gi rtogs pa'i spyod yul 'khor ba'i snying por gyur pa bde ba'i phung po bskyed par gyur
66b6(rgyud 'grel): to/ /'gro ba rnams kyi bde ba mtshan mar bcas pa ni/ /gang yin de nyid mtshan ma spangs par gyur pa na/ /rang 'byung ye shes nyid kyi ngo bor gyur pa ste/ /rtog pa rnams kyi stong pa'i bde ba chen po yin/ /bag chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyi de kho na
66b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi 'byung ba'o/ /de lta bu 'di las sgyu ma lta bu thog ma med pa nas rang gi byas pa'i 'khor ba ni bag chags kyi rgyun shin tu phra bas shin tu g.yo zhing bzung du med pa'i sems kyi rgyun gyi 'jug pas nyams pa'i gnas skabs kyi dus blangs par
67a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas/ /phyi rol tu bzhag pa'i rtog pa mdza' dag gi sgrib pas g.yogs te/ mi mngon par gyur pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid dag pa'i rang bzhin skye 'gro'i gtso bo gang yin pa de rlung dang bcas pa'i khu ba'i thigs pa rnams dang lhan
67a2(rgyud 'grel): cig tu btsun mo'i tshig la bab pa rnyed pa na/ lte ba'i 'og tu kha thur la ltas pa'i pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du khrag 'dzag pa'i lhag ma kun tu bzung ba ste/ de'i rjes la yang dag par pad+ma kha zum par gyur to/ /de yang khrag dang khu ba gnyis
67a3(rgyud 'grel): ka yang chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin du gyur nas gong bu gcig tu gyur te/ rang gi rang bzhin rtsom par byed do/ /de nas rjes su 'gro ba'i rim gyis nur nur bu la sogs pa yongs su brgyud pas rim gyis skye ste/ 'byung ba mdza' dag tshogs nye bar bsags pa rnyed
67a4(rgyud 'grel): nas gang du sa la sogs pa lnga po 'dus pa dang de'i tshor ba des dngos po gsal ba'i de kho na nyid 'di ston par byed cing/ phung po nga dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus su 'gyur ro/ /nang gi tshor ba de so sor nye bar 'gro ba 'brel pa shin tu nges pa thams
67a5(rgyud 'grel): cad la khyab cing thams cad du 'gro ba yang shin tu g.yo ba yid dang/ 'byung bar yang dag par ldan pas de phyogs gcig par gyur nas/ phyi rol dbang po lnga'i grong gi rjes su 'gro zhing yid kyis brtags pa'i phyi rol tu gyur pa'i gzugs
67a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gzung ba dang/ 'dzin par gyur pas mngon par zil gyis mnan te/ nga rgyal dang gti mug dang ser sna dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ mya ngan dang/ phrag dog dang/ brtse ba dang/ sred pa dang/ sdug pa dang/ mi sdug pa la sogs pa shin tu yid du
67a7(rgyud 'grel): mi 'ong ba'i 'khor lor 'khyams par 'gyur ba yin no/ /skye ba snga mar byas pa'i las kyi rgyu las ni/ /sems de 'di ru skye ba 'ongs su len cing 'gro /de yi rgyu yis ma lus 'di dag thams cad ni/ /bag chags bcas pa'i sems kyis byed par
67b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba nyid/ /'khor ba'i gnas skabs so/ /de ltar 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs su rung zhing rgal dka' ba/ nga rgyal chu bo gting zab pa yul gyi rlung shin tu drag pas gcig na gcig tu phan tshun rlabs pas brla rlabs shin tu 'khor zhing 'khrigs pas
67b2(rgyud 'grel): steng du 'gro ba dang 'og tu 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas rgyun chags pa'i 'khor ba'i las shin tu sgrol bar byed pa'i gru thugs brtse ba'i bdag nyid can/ /mchog tu mnyes shin pa'i bdag nyid rang bzhin thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sman
