94a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i thabs cung zad tsam gyis las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa khyad par can gyi thabs dang bral nas/ /thabs med la gnyis ka la mtshungs pa ma yin no/ /de kho na dka' ba med par gang 'di 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pa nyid kyis
94a4(rgyud 'grel): yun mi ring bar rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid 'bras bu chen po 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /dka' thub brtul zhugs kyis brtul bas/ /sdug bsngal gyur nas lus skams te/ /sdug bsngal nyid kyi sems g.yengs te/ /g.yengs pas
94a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub gzhan du 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ gzhan nas kyang/ dka' thub dka' spyod drag po yis/ /bsten na 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing/ /bsten na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa dang
94a6(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin pa'i tshul la yun rings dka' bas 'bras bu smin/ /sngags tshul dka' ba med par myur du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur zhes bstan pas so/ /chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i snyam du rtogs pa de yang ras
94b1(rgyud 'grel): rig ma rtogs pa med pa la/ rang rig pa yang bde ba chen po'o zhes bya zhing/ de yang sngags kyi bstan bcos nye bar bstan pa ma rtogs par nam yang 'byung bar mi 'os te/ shin tu spros pas chog go /dbang po rnon po ni sngags kyi theg pa 'di
94b2(rgyud 'grel): la so so skye bo nyid kyis kyang sngags kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par nus te/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i nga rgyal la gnas pa slob bzhin pa'i gnas skabs su yang/ de lta bu la bstan par 'gyur ba srid pa'i phyir/ rgyu dang 'bras
94b3(rgyud 'grel): bu 'dus par byas nas phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams ni sa brgyad pa nyid la ni phyir mi ldog pa ste/ de skad du phyi nas sa brgyad pa la ni/ dogs pa ldog par 'gyur ba yin
94b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la ni de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid yin na zhes zer yang/ de lta bu nyams su myong ba med pa'i phyir/ so so'i skye bor 'gyur ba las phyir mi ldog par zhes brjod par mi nus te/ 'di ni ji srid dus
94b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa mthar thug pa'i dbugs phyin pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /grogs dag nyon cig theg pa chen po bas/ /gal te yul la spyod kyang mos la skrag /e ma'i 'khor ba 'di dag kun/ /yul gyi ngo bo rtog pa nyid kyis su/ /de bzhin nyid
94b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi de dag rnam dag pa/ /yin nam snyam du de dag dran byed kyang/ /dpe'u 'gu 'dzi'i phung po la re bzhin/ /'jigs pas nyug par byed cing snyom pa yin/ /gang yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par mos pa'i dbang po rnon po
94b7(rgyud 'grel): yod do zhe na/ de ma yin te/ rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag med na mi rung ba'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa 'dis chog go /gang yang 'phags pa chos 'phags sa bcu thob pa la 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa bag tsha ba med par smra ba 'di ni rig pa kho na yin
95a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ 'dir ni de bzhin du khyad par can gyi thabs yod pa'i dbang gis slob bzhin pa khyad par du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan slob pa'i dbang du byas nas lam stobs can dang stobs med pa dpyod pa'i skabs su byang chub
95a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug dper byed pa ni/ rig pa med pa kho na'o/ /gzhan yang de bzhin nyid tsam la brten nas theg pa chen po'i don gang smras pa de ni rig pa med pa ste/ sngags kyi de kho na nyid khong du chud pa ma rtogs par de mngon
95a3(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du mi 'dod pa su zhig yod/ dngos po kun gyi ngo bo 'di/ /so sor rtogs pa dka' ba yin zhes gsungs/ /gang yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i rtog pa dang bral ba
95a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes zer ba de ni bden te/ kho bo cag ni mchog dang dga' bral dag gi dbus su rang gi rig pa grub pa la/ sdug bsngal lam bde bar rtogs pa ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu
95a5(rgyud 'grel): mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ /gsum po spangs pa de nyid ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i byang chub 'dod/ /ces gsungs so/ /'on kyang kun tu rtog pa med pas rang rig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba grub pa yang med do zhes gang smras pa de mngon
95a6(rgyud 'grel): sum du 'gal ba ste/ chad par smra bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /de skad du yang/ rang rig ma rtogs ye shes su/ /gal te spyod par byed na ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes dag pa min/ /de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dpal
95a7(rgyud 'grel): mnga' bsnun gyi zhal snga nas kyang/ /rtog pa zhi bas blo de'ang zhi bar 'gyur/ /blo gros dman pa kha cig smra zhes grag /blo bzangs nyid ni blangs nas ci yang rung/ /mkha' las lhag par ci ste mi 'gyur ro/ /rtog pa thams cad bcos pas gyur pa'i blo/ /gang
95b1(rgyud 'grel): yin de ni bde ba dam par gsal/ /de ni bya ba byas pa mkhas pa ste/ /gzhan pa gang de rkang gnyis phyugs yin no zhes gsungs so/ /gzhan dag 'dod chags kyis 'dul ba gang yin pa'i don du 'di bstan gyi/ de kho na nyid ma yin no zhe na/ de ni sangs
95b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i tshig ma yin no/ /'dod chags can 'dul ba'i don du ni 'dod chags chen po bstan par mi rigs te/ de dag gi 'dod chags zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ mi sdug par bstan pa ma yin nam zhe na/ 'dod chags 'dod pa zhi bya'i phyir/ /gtso
95b3(rgyud 'grel): bo mnyam par dgod par mdzad/ /chags bral chags pa dar ma la/ /'dod chags tshan po 'joms pa yin/ /de yi theg pa ni gcig nyid de/ /gang 'di theg pa chen po'o/ /bstan pa yang ni gcig bu ste/ /gang 'ang 'dod chags chen po
95b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o/ /de skad du yang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gang phyir theg pa gcig cir tshul yang gcig /'dren pas bsten pa 'di yang gcig pa ste/ /gang yang thag pa gsum du bstan pa ni/ /nga yi thabs la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
95b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid ces gsungs pa dang/ gzhan yang/ ji srid sems ni 'jug pa'i bar/ /theg pa'i mdza' la thug pa med/ /sems ni yongs su gyur pa ni/ /theg pa med cing 'gro ba'ang med/ /ces gsungs so/ /gzhan yang nor bu dang sngags dang//
95b6(rgyud 'grel): sman gyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed pa yang/ gang zhig thob nas/ tshe 'di nyid la mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i lha bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /lam 'di ring du bgrod pa ste/ /rtog ge skam
95b7(rgyud 'grel): po'i bya dag gi/ blo yi rgya mtsho pha rol 'gram/ /mdza' yas mthong nas song ba ldog /blo yi yul min de kho na/ /skye ba med pa rkyen las skyes/ /sna tshogs de ni rang rig ste/ /bla ma dam pa med par min/ /gsang sngags theg pa 'di la ni/ /bla?
96a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dam pas skya ba 'dzin/ /de ltar kho bos skye bo dag /nyon mongs rgya mtsho rgal bar mthong/ /de la sngags kyi theg pa chen po bstan pa ni gnyis te/ bskyed pa'i rim pa dang/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/ /bskyed pa'i
96a2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ phyi rol bskyed pa'i rim pa dang/ zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gsum ste/ rdzogs pa dang/ yongs su grub pa dang/ ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa'o/ /rnam pa lnga po de dag ni rim pa gnyis su so sor
96a3(rgyud 'grel): mngon par sbyor ro/ /de la bskyed pa'i rim pa ni bdag med ma gsal ba las bstan pa ste/ ji skad du gsungs pa'i bdag med ma'i 'khor lo bsgom pa yang/ bla ma dam pa'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin las khong du chud par bya'o/ /de yang gzhung mangs
96a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis dogs pas ma bris so/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa gang zhe na/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi don du/ dgod pa dag la slob dpon ste/ /de bzhin lta ba gsang ba nyid/ /lag bcangs pas ni shes rab ste/ /de
96a5(rgyud 'grel): yang gnyis 'khyung rgyu yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa dang/ gzhan nas kyang dbang bskur ba drug ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'o zhes gsungs pas/ phyi rol bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /zab mo'i rim pa ni/ las kyi phyag rgya
96a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i ye shes ni/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni/ chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ ngo bo nyid kyi bde ba gang thob pa/ /de nyid 'di yin zhes pas mthong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa'o/ /skad cig la dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje
96a7(rgyud 'grel): chen pos mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir/ gzung ba dang/ 'dzin pa nyams na/ mchog tu bde ba nyid du brjod do/ /sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi chos rnams thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni sdom pa ste/ ro gcig pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid ma yin pa
96b1(rgyud 'grel): yang ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ chos kyi phyag rgya zhes brjod do/ /dga' ba la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yang/ 'dir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa bsten pa las shes par bya ste/ bla ma dam pa'i zhal snga nas kyang/
96b2(rgyud 'grel): las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni yongs su grub pa'i rim pa ste/ sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa'i
96b3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan thams cad rang ldan pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi longs spyod rdzogs pa dang/ sprul pa'i sku dang/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du gsal ba gang yin pa de ni dam tshig gi
96b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ste/ dga' ba la sogs pa ni las kyi phyag rgya bzhin bla ma dam pa'i man ngag las rtogs par bya'o/ /de yang las kyi phyag rgya nyid bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/ /ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa yang gang kun tu bzang por gyur pa
96b5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi khyad par las/ bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gi 'bad pa med par skad cig ma gcig la mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /'di phyag rgya chen po zhes brjod
96b6(rgyud 'grel): do/ /chen po yang yin zhing/ phyag rgya thams cad la rgyus 'debs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi phyag rgya 'dis rgyas btab pas thams cad kyis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang 'thob pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa/ lhan
96b7(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes pa brjod du med ces gsungs so/ /phyag rgya chen po brtag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyi/ lung bstan par sla ba ni ma yin pas 'dir dpyad par mi bya'o/ /blo yis dpyad nas de 'di'o zhes/ shes rab rgyal bas kyang mi dpyod do/ /'on kyang
97a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi bdag nyid ni/ /de nyid 'di yin snyam du gsal ba ni/ /blang dang dor bas stong pa'i phyir/ /bdag cag lta bus mi brtan pas/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyar brtags kyang/ /mi rtog ji ltar rnam rtog pa/ /byang chub nye ba ring
97a2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /dpyod pa min pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /chos nyid de bzhin nyid sna tshogs/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /snying rje bdag nyid blangs pa ni/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub bla ma bsten pa las/ /de phyir bla ma dam pa'i zhabs/ /pad ma
97a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid las 'bab brten dang/ /dngos por 'khrul pa'i mun pa ni/ /nyi ma brgya yi 'od bzhin 'jam/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa'i zhabs kyis ni/ /pad+ma'i rdul gyi bka' drin nyid thob pas/ /mngon sum pa yi lam son ji lta bzhin/ /thos
97a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam las gnas pa gang yin pa/ /srid dang zhi ba ro mnyam rang rig de la bdud/ /ma 'ongs pa yi de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni bdag gis bya ba'i phyir/ /gang gi sems nyid glog gi 'od bzhin gsal gyur ba/ /dge ba'i lus can brten
97a5(rgyud 'grel): bya de yi zhabs kyi pad+ma gnyis/ /rab tu gus pas thab cig tsam yang spyi bos len ba yin/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul ni rin chen 'od 'bar ba/ /yid kyi mun pa 'joms par skad cig tsam gyis byed/ /rnam ba thams cad kyis brgyan de bzhin nyid
97a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni/ /'jig rten 'di dag kun gyis nye bar mthong gyur cig /theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags thams cad dang 'brel ba/ /bla ma dam pas bstan pa nyams su myong ba ni/ /gang zhig bdag gis bstan pas dge ba bsags pa des/ /'gro ba thams
97a7(rgyud 'grel): cad rgyal ba mchog gi go 'phang thob par shog /shes rab ye shes gsal ba 'di/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /dam pa'i lam ni thob bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pa pad+ma rdo rjes byas/ /shes rab ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba/ /mkhas pa
97b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po de ba tsan+d+ra'i zhal? lnga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta badzra pA Ni dang/ lo tsA ba d+harma kIrt+tis bsgyur ba'o// (//gnas pa bsdus pa dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa bzhugs//) //*/ /rgya gar
97b2(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ s+thi ti sa mu ts+tsha ya/ bod skad du/ gnas pa bsdus pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdo sde bye brag smra rnams rig /dbu ma'i rim bzhin gsal ba yi/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med la/ /btud de de
97b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid bshad par bya/ /kha cig gang zag ces bya smra/ /rtag min mi rtag ma yin zer/ /nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis/ /'dus ma byas gsum rtag pa yin/ /'dus byas thams cad mi rtag ste/ /'gro ba phung po lnga bdag nyid/ /srid pa sdug bsngal bden
97b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /de ni 'bras bu shes par bya/ /rgyu ni kun 'byung bden pa ste/ /las dang nyon mongs bdag nyid do/ /bden pa de gnyis zag bcas te/ /phyi ma gnyis ni zag pa med/ /las dang nyon mongs yongs zad nas/ /shin tuAng 'gog par gyur pa na/ dam ba'i rnam
97b5(rgyud 'grel): thar mngon sum don/ /zhi ba sdug bsngal zad pa yin/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad de ni/ /goms pas nges par 'byin pa'i mchog /yang dag bstan pa la sogs zhes/ /yan lag brgyad lam thub pas gsungs/ /de nyid nyan thos mya
97b6(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi bsgom pa yang/ /lung bstan pa la mi ltos par/ /rang gi sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ /don mngon byas nas mya ngan 'das/ /lhag mar bcas pa'i lus 'dis su/ /bdag nyid chen po de kun nas/ /bdag dang gzhan don nus
97b7(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid/ /rang gi 'dod pas bstan nas su/ /mar me ltar yongs mya ngan 'das/ /'di ni 'bring po'i sangs rgyas te/ /bye brag smra ba'i gnas pa'o/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma/ /de dag bdag med
98a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ru ni/ /yang dag shes pa'i yul du byas/ /dam pa'i shes pa gnyis kyi tshul/ /mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag ste/ /yul gyi rang gi mtshan nyid la/ /mngon sum lkog tu gyur pa'o/ /yul dang dus ni nyi tshe ba//
98a2(rgyud 'grel): phra rab rdul dang skad cig mas/ /don gyi bya ba nus pa'i phyir/ /de nyid don dam dngos po yin/ /nam mkha' la sogs lta zhog gi /bya ba'i don kun 'dod pa yis/ /tshad ma'i yul du byas nas su/ /de nyid 'dir ni yongs su brtag /'di ltar
98a3(rgyud 'grel): bum pa la sogs gzugs/ /rtag tu don gyi bya byed pas/ /so so'i skad cig de nyid la/ /rang gi dngos po nyid byed pa'o/ /bya ba'i don cig byas nas ni/ /de nyid byed pa ma yin la/ /byed pa byed par mi sbyor te/ /byas na de nyid gzhan du 'gyur/ /snga
98a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rang bzhin rnams kun tu/ /skad cig gzhan gyi rjes mi 'jug /skad cig ma yi rgyun 'dra bas/ /mngon shes la sogs so sor gnas/ /da lta mngon sum gyur pa'i don/ /yongs su spyod pa de bzhin yang/ /de ni rnam par gcod pa ste/ /mngon sum
98a5(rgyud 'grel): las byung bsgom pa yin/ /snang ba rnam par nyams nas ni/ /rgyud gzhan dgos pa ma yin te/ /bskyed pa gzhan ni 'jigs pas na/ /rang rig rgyu yi nyams par 'gyur/ /phra rab rdul ni 'dus pa las/ /rags pa'i gzugs su mthong ba yi/ /lus la
98a6(rgyud 'grel): shing dang sa la sogs/ /rags pa cung zad gcig pa min/ /ji ltar de bzhin bde dang sdug /bum pa la sogs so sor ro/ /gcig la bskyod dang dmar bas so/ /kun bskyod pa dang dmar por 'gyur/ /gcig la g.yogs par gyur pa yis/ /lus
98a7(rgyud 'grel): kun khyab 'gyur de bzhin no/ /'on kyang cha shas bskyod sogs pas/ /yan lag can la min zhe na/ /yan lag can nyid mi bskyod na/ /ji ltar yul gzhan thob par 'gyur/ /rdul phran 'dus par phyi rol gyi/ /snang ba skad cig gang yin pa/ /shes
98b1(rgyud 'grel): pa rang gi rnam pa ni/ /skyes pas yul nyid thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid tsam gyi spyod yul gyis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thob min te/ /tshogs pa gcig la rag las pas/ /rgyu ni dbang po dang mnyam 'gyur/ /phye dang ma phye rnam rtags pas/ /shes
98b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bye brag skyes don med/ /bems po sems min rnam brtags pas/ /kun nas skye ba yod ma yin/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po yang/ /'di la blo dang ldan pas bsgom/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/ /tshogs ma rdzogs na yod
98b3(rgyud 'grel): ma yin/ /mngon du byed pa mi bya ste/ /byas na theg pa dman par 'gyur/ /zab mo'i rim la goms pa yis/ /byang chub rtsa ba snying rje yin/ /snying rje rtsa ba rab sbyor bas/ /bye brag smra ba'ang de bzhin te/ /theg chen rim pas goms pa yis/ /
98b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces mi 'gyur/ /gzhan du mdo sde rtogs pa yi/ /blo de ji ltar theg chen yin/ /gang phyir dbu ma dang bral bas/ /de la'ang sangs rgyas yod ma yin/ /gnas pa tsam gyi bye brag gis/ /theg pa nges pa med pa'i phyir/ /shes rab
98b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' zhig dgra bcom dang/ /dbu ma bas kyang mthong ba'o/ /theg chen snying rje sbyor ba las/ /sbyin sogs lam ni lhag par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa rnams/ /gnas pa'i dbye ba gzhan du 'gyur/ /gal te chung ngu 'bring sogs pa'i/
98b6(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba phye ste rab brtags nas/ /de ni so so rnam pa dgu /de ni theg pa gnas par phye/ /mdo sde pa'i gnas pa bsdus pa'o// //rdul phran cha shas med pa'i phyir/ /phan tshun yang dag sbyor ba med/ /thams cad 'brel med bdag nyid
98b7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /rags pa cung zad tsam yang med/ /dbang po las 'das rang rgyud pas/ /'dus pa yang ni de bzhin no/ /gal te rags pa'i chos kyi don/ /shes pa ji ltar dngos med 'gyur/ /phye dang ma phye rab brtags pas/ /don gyi chos de med pa ste/ /phra
99a1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i dbye ba phye ba ni/ /rdzas de ji ltar rags pa yin/ /dngos dang dngos med 'gal bas na/ /phye dang ma phye gcig pa med/ /'gul dang mi 'gul sogs skyon pas/ /gcig la'ang cha shas yod ma yin/ /phyogs dang
99a2(rgyud 'grel): snam sogs bye brag gis/ /bsgrub pa'i don la nges pa med/ /gang phyir 'di don dngos med de/ /rmi lam gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin/ /sngon po la sogs don med phyir/ /rnam par shes pa 'thad ma yin/ /sna tshogs rnam par snang bas na/ /
99a3(rgyud 'grel): ji srid sngo sogs gcig pa min/ /phan tshun 'thad pa ma yin pas/ /rnam shes sna tshogs ma yin no/ /bag chags stobs kyis bzung ba dang/ /'dzin pa lta bur phye ba'i phyir/ /snang ba'i bye brag sngon po sogs/ /bden min 'khrul pas rnam pa
99a4(rgyud 'grel): med/ /'gro ba rnam rig tsam du ni/ /de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /de ltar bus pas rnam brtags pa'i/ /bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems/ /don du rab tu snang bar 'jug /rnam pa med par mos pa yin/ /gsum po
99a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa med pa ste/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /so sor 'khor gsum rtsa gcig bya/ /thos dang bsam pa las byung dang/ /bsgom pa las skyes shes rab ni/ /bsam gtan las skyes rnal 'byor gyis/ /zhi gnas dang
99a6(rgyud 'grel): ni lhag mthong ngo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsungs pa/ /sems tsam la ni brten nas su/ /phyi rol du ni mi rtag go/ de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas nas/ /sems tsam las kyang 'da' bar bya/ /sems tsam nyid la 'das nas su/ /snang
99a7(rgyud 'grel): ba med las 'da' bar bya/ /snang med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /des ni theg pa chen po mthong/ /'jug pa lhun gyis grub cing zhi/ /smon lam rnam par dag nas ni/ /ye shes dam pa bdag med pa/ /snang ba med pa mthong ba yin zhes gsungs
99b1(rgyud 'grel): so/ /sna tshogs gsal ba de nyid kun tu brtags pa sdug bsngal te/ /kun 'byung gis ni bag chags gzhan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin no/ /sbyin pa la sogs lam nyid yongs su rdzogs pa 'gog pa ste/ /rdzogs par yongs su grub pa rnams med rnam
99b2(rgyud 'grel): par rig pa tsam/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam rnam pa med pa'i gnas pa bsdus pa'o// //gang gang cung zad snang ba ni/ /de de sems la shin tu gsal/ ji ltar de bzhin rmi lam sems/ /gzugs la sogs pa so sor
99b3(rgyud 'grel): snang/ /ji ltar so sor snang ba'i sems/ /bag chags la ni rnam gnas pa/ /ci ste don med rnam shes ni/ /ji ltar gzhan las shes par 'gyur/ /don gyi snang ba'i phyi rol na/ /bse ru lta bur thub pas gsungs/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa
99b4(rgyud 'grel): stong par ni/ /snang med pa dag 'dod pa yin/ /rnam shes so sor snang bas na/ /sngon po la sogs don med de/ /de phyir kun gyi rnam pa bsgom/ /mi rtog snying rje chen po yin/ /kun 'byung bag chags bstan pa ni/ /sbyin pa la sogs bag chags
99b5(rgyud 'grel): spangs/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'gog pa yang/ /sna tshogs gnyis su med pa mthong/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa stong pa nyid/ /gsal bar byed pa'i chos sku las/ /longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa 'phro/ /
99b6(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba la sogs med pa'i dngos/ /snang ba'i bag chags yod ma yin/ /de bzhin gnyis ka yang ma yin/ /gzugs las gzhan du mi brtag go /mdza' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'i/ /dngos po 'di ni med pa min/ /rnam par mi rtog rang
99b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin yang/ /ye shes rang rig nyams myong yin/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i las rnam pa dang bcas pa'i gnas pa bsdus pa'o// //mu stegs sangs rgyas par ma btus/ /gsum ni med par mi 'dod pas/ /lags shing mdzes
100a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dam pa'i chos/ /med par gnas pa'i sdig pa yin/ /dbu ma chen po'i rang bzhin nyid/ /gnas pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /btud de gnas pa zad byed nyid/ /lung dang rig pas bshad bar bya/ /khams
100a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams nyid las grub pa gang/ /rkyen las skyes pa skad cig ma/ /gcig dang dum dang bral bas/ /de nyid dngos po med pas yin/ /de yang lus la rkang lag dang/ /mgo dang rgyab sogs phye ba las/ /lag pa la sogs gcig kyang med/ /so
100a3(rgyud 'grel): sor phye bas byung ba yin/ /ji srid de yi cha phye ste/ /rdul phran rnam par dpyad pa ni/ /lus po nyid na bshad pa las/ /rten dang brten pa la sogs shes/ /gcig gi dngos po bkag pas na/ /du ma 'ang yod pa ma yin no/ /rmi lam dang ni mnyam gnas
100a4(rgyud 'grel): par/ /sngon du bkag pa nyid kyi min/ /shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ /rig pa nyid dang 'gal ba min/ /gang phyir spyi yi gtan tshigs kyis/ /brjod pa dam pa'i chos yin no// //kun rdzob don byed nus pa yi/ /sna
100a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med/ /de ni shes dang shes bya nyid/ /kho bos ci zhig yongs su brtag /gzugs sogs so sor snang ba la/ /de nyid rnam par shes pa la/ /de ltar sgrub thabs lta byas te/ /blo ldan rig pas mi 'grub med/ /kun
100a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzob du ni skye ba gang/ /de ni skye ba med pa'i don/ /de phyir skye ba med pa'i sems/ /rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bzhin no/ /skye ba grub pas yod pa yin/ /yod pa yin pas med pa'ang med/ /rgyu yi dngos po med pas na/ /rang bzhin gzhan las skye ba
100a7(rgyud 'grel): min/ /ji ltar gzugs brnyan 'byung ba ltar/ /bden min brdzun pa ma yin gzugs/ /de nyid chos rnams thams cad de/ /rang bzhin rig pa rnams kyi lugs/ /'dus pa mkhar dang gos la sogs/ /brtsams pa kun rdzob dngos po ste/ /'di ni
100b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ma skyes pas/ /'dus pa nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /de phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ /'gro ba 'di dag ming tsam gsungs/ gzhan gyis smras pa 'di dag kun/ /bdag gis legs par brjod pa yin/ /phyogs ni snga mar brjod pa dag /de yi
100b2(rgyud 'grel): blo gros bsal nas su/ /rang gi phyogs ni bdag gis bshad/ /ji ltar me long la gzugs brnyan/ /gcig dang gzhan nyid spangs pa ltar/ /snang las gzhan na yod min te/ /de ltar dngos po'i rang bzhin no/ /'jig rten sgyu ma rmi lam bzhin/ /
100b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang rkyen ni rnam par spangs/ /rtag tu rgyu med par snang pas/ /rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go /gang la dngos po yod min pas/ /sems tsam du ni rtogs par bya/ /ji ltar dngos po med pa'i sems/ /sems tsam du ni rigs pa min/ gzung dang 'dzin
100b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bye brag gis/ /gal te sems ni 'jug pa ni/ /'jig rten pa yi sems 'di dag /sems tsam du ni mi rigs so/ /lus? dang longs spyod dbang po ni/ /gal te rmi lam ltar skyes na/ /sems ni gnyis su 'gyur ba ste/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid gnyis
100b5(rgyud 'grel): min no/ /gang phyir ji ltar ral gri'i so/ /ji ltar rang gi mdzub rtse yi/ /mi chod pa dang mi reg pa/ /de bzhin sems nyid rang snang ba'i/ /gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang ba'i sems/ /sngon du goms par gyur pa'i blos/ /ji ltar 'byung ba rnam
100b6(rgyud 'grel): par mthong/ /don gyi rnam pa don yod min/ /gang zag rgyun dang phung po dang/ /de bzhin rkyen dang rdul phran dang/ /gtso bo dbang phyug byed pa po/ sems tsam po la rnam par brtags/ /phyi rol don mthong log pa ste/ /don gzhan med pa'i sems
100b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid do/ /rig pas yid la brtags nas ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa 'gog pa'o/ /blo yi rnam par gzhigs na ni/ /rang bzhin nges par gzung du med/ /de ni brjod du med pa'i phyir/ /dngos po med par bstan pa yin/ /yid la blo yi rnam brtags na//
101a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dbang med cing kun brtags med/ /yongs su grub pa'i dngos med na/ /ji ltar blo yi rnam par dpyad/ /rang bzhin med cing rig byed med/ /dngos med gzhi yang yod ma yin/ /nus pa ro dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ /
101a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog ge ngan pas 'di dag brtags/ /dngos po mtshan ma rnam rig go /yid log g.yo ba gang yin las/ /nga yi lus rnams 'das nas su/ /rnam par mi rtogs pa yi spyod/ /de bzhin nyid dang stong nyid mdza' / /mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings?
101a3(rgyud 'grel): skye ba med pa'i chos rnams ni/ /dam pa'i don gyi rang bzhin no/ /phyi rol dngos dang dngos med de/ /sems kyi yongs su bzung ba med/ /lta ba thams cad spangs pa gang/ /skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /gang phyir tshogs pa'i rkyen yod
101a4(rgyud 'grel): na/ /'jug pa dang ni ldog par 'gyur/ /tshogs pa so sor gyur na ni/ /skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/ /yod med dngos po skye ba med/ /sems ni yod min med pa min/ /gang phyir las gzhan 'dus pa las/ /'jug pa dang ni ldog pa
101a5(rgyud 'grel): min/ /gang tshe 'jig rten 'di dag kun/ /'dus pa nyid ni mthong ba ste/ /tshogs pa tsam po 'di nyid ni/ /de tshe sems la mnyam par gnas/ /gang la cung zad skye med pas/ /dag pa cung zad yod ma yin/ /de ni yod dang med min te//
101a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro 'di brjod du med par lta'o/ /zung du 'jug pa yongs shes na/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje che/ /mkhas pas kun rdzob de nyid kyang/ /mi spang bar ni spyad par bya/ /gang phyir kun rdzob log na ni/ /de phyir de nyid ci yang med/ /
101a7(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob nyid kyis skye ba gang/ /de nyid skye ba med pa'i don/ /'di ni zung 'jug de nyid de/ /rkyen las skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog /yang dag mdza' dang skye ba med/ /mi dmigs pa
101b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mya ngan 'das/ /stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang/ /smon pa med dang 'dus ma byas/ /rmi lam sgyu ma la sogs dpe/ /de nyid rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrubs/ /theg chen 'di ni mchog yin te/ /nges don mdo sder bsdus pa yi/ /mdo sde lta zhing nyan pa la//
101b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar 'bad pas bsam par bya/ /snying rje sems can la bskyed de/ /byang chub sems ni brtson byas nas/ /byang chub sdom gnas brtson chen pos/ /rang bzhin med pa bsgom par bya/ /'phags pa'i lam brgyad la gnas te/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs
101b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'bad/ /mkhas rnams gang phyir bden gnyis gnyis med 'dis/ /ji ltar de nyid don de chad pa lta bur ni/ /mngon sum grub pa skye dang 'gag pa'i snod yin te/ /gal te don skyes rnam par nyams pa'i skyon yin no/ /gang phyir ni/ /ra me long nang du gzugs pas?
101b4(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /rig pas brtags pa'i stobs kyis de med de mthong med/ /phyi yi don med 'di med rnam pa sna tshogs sems/ /'on kyang rten 'brel dag la rig pas 'gal ba med/ /'di ni dbu ma'i gnas bsdus pa'i/ /de ltar mdza' bzhi rnam spangs pa/ /brtags te
101b5(rgyud 'grel): brtan par byas nas su/ /skye ba med cing gnas pa med/ /'gag pa med cing mtshan nyid med/ /rang rig rkyen las skyes ba ste/ /de nyid pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi rang bzhin lung/ /sngags kyi tshul la brten nas su/ /bla ma'i khyad par myong ba yis//
101b6(rgyud 'grel): ma brtags par yang so ma nyi med/ /stong pa nyid ni rang rig ste/ /thabs dang shes rab bde chen po/ /'bras gnas bzhin du rtsod pa med/ /byang chub sems ni rnam par bsgom/ /de skad du yang/ gsang sngags tshul de shes pa yis/ //
101b7(rgyud 'grel): /sngags kyi lugs kyi khyad par gsungs/ /don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang/ /thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang/ /dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas nas/ /sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags/ /gang phyir stong pa rigs pa nyid/ /ye shes rang bzhin
102a1(rgyud 'grel): skad cig ma/ /gang phyir rdo rje sems dpar nges/ /phung po de bzhin gshegs par rtogs/ /rig pa'i stobs kyis gzhag pa gang/ /ma brtags pa ru sbyor ba don/ /ci ste yongs su brtag bral ba/ /sngags kyi tshul dang bral
102a2(rgyud 'grel): na ni/ /rnam pa kun tu dpe med ni/ /zag pa med pa'i bde ba tshe/ /lha yi nga rgyal lta byas pa/ /ji lta stong nyid nyams su myong/ /las kyi phyag rgya legs grub nas/ /chos kyi phyag rgya rab phye bas/ /phan tshun re ba med na ni/ /dam tshig 'bras bu ji ltar yin//
102a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs ni mang po rnams kyis su/ /nyams su myong ba'i khyad par dang/ /las dang chos dang phyag rgya che/ /dbye ba gzhan du ji ltar yin/ /shin tu dbang po rnon po yis/ /stong nyid nyams su myong ba 'am/ /bde chen mngon par byang chub la/ /'dod pa
102a4(rgyud 'grel): kun la longs spyod pas/ /der ni shin tu bde ba nyid/ /de ltar thabs kyi dngos po yis/ /dbang po'i dus la goms pa las/ /gzhan du ji ltar dka' ba min/ /pha rol phyin pa kun bdag nyid/ /bsgom pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa ni/ /rdzogs pa'i
102a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sgrub pa la/ /dbang po rnon pos cis mi 'grub/ /lhan cig skyes dga' rtogs pa'o/ /e baM la ni phyag byas nas/ /phyag rgya'i rang bzhin mdor bsdus pa/ /sngags kyi theg pa bshad par bya// //shes rab sprul pa'i
102a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can ma/ /las kyi phyag rgya bdag med nyid/ /lus dang ngag dang sems kyi las/ /ye shes gtso bo'i rang bzhin no/ /gang phyir de las shes pa gang/ /dga' ba la sogs rim skyes pa/ /dbus su rnam par shes pa ste/ /de ni shes rab ye
102a7(rgyud 'grel): shes brjod/ /rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med/ /de bzhin dbu ma'i rtogs pa'o/ /ji ltar mos pa'i ye shes ni/ /man ngag gis ni thob par 'gyur/ /gsum pa'i lhan cig skyes par rtogs/ /btsan thabs dbang gis bzhi pa ste/ /rlung gi bkod pas sna rtse
102b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /mi 'gyur ba yi sbyor ba yin/ /ji lta ji ltar bde ye shes/ /thabs kyis rab tu bsgrub pa yin/ /de lta de ltar rtogs pa ste/ /rtog pa lhan cig skyes pa mchog /gang phyir 'bras bu 'dra ba'i dbang/ /btsan thabs lhan cig skyes par 'dod/ /yun rings dus su
102b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bral med gnas/ /ma bcos pa yi tshogs yin no/ /de gsungs pa/ /dga' ba khu ba 'bab pa ste/ /btsug tor smin phyag pad+ma'i tshad/ /mgrin pa snying gar mchog dga' ste/ /de nas dga' ba bral bar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs rol mos lte ba nas/ /ji srid gsang
102b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i pad+mar son/ /de srid gsang ba'i nor bu nas/ /ma 'phos bar du lhan cig skyes/ /mi gnas pa yi mya ngan 'das/ /'dod chags chen po'i khyab bdag gtso/ /ma 'phos bde ba chags bral te/ /'di ni mya ngan 'das par gnas/ /chags bral las ni sdig
102b4(rgyud 'grel): pa med/ /bde ba mchog las bsod nams med/ /de phyir mi 'gyur bde ba'i sems/ /rtag tu nges gnas mos par bya/ /'pho ba las ni chags bral 'byung/ /chags bral las ni sdug bsngal 'byung/ /sdug bsngal bas ni khams zad de/ /khams zad pas
102b5(rgyud 'grel): ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /shi nas de dag gzhan duAng 'byung/ /srid par 'ching zhing skye ba skye/ /de phyir 'bad pas thams cad kyis/ /chags pa dor ba rnam par spangs/ /chags bral 'dod ldan ma yin te/ /'dod pa'i sbyor thabs mi 'dod na/ /nga yi bstan pa
102b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyun tu yang/ /ci ste rnal 'byor sdug bsngal bskyed/ /bde ba mi 'gyur rang bzhin gyis/ /mi 'gyur mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /rten ni shor bar gyur pa yis/ /brten pa chags dang bral ba yin/ /spyi bor rgyas pa'i thig le ni/ /shes rab chags las zhu bar
102b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /gang bar gnas pa'i go 'phang ni/ /bcings pa dam pa'i don yin no/ /ji ltar zla ba 'char ba'i rims/ /'phel ba'i dus kyis rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sems bskyed rim pa ni/ /'phel ba'i dus kyis rdzogs pa yin/ /de ni gtsugs nas byung nas su//
103a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nor bur gang bar 'gyur/ /de ni chags dang bral na nyams/ /rdo rje rtse mor rab rgyas 'gyur/ /bde chen rang bzhin 'di nyid ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sgra yis bstan pa yin/ /rdzogs pa mi bskyod gyur pa yis/ /skad cig gcig
103a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon rdzogs byang chub/ /ji ltar chu bo'i chu sna tshogs/ /rgya mtsho chen po ro mnyam 'gyur/ /de bzhin dngos po sna tshogs kyang/ /mi 'gyur ba der nyams par 'gyur/ /ji ltar khams rnams 'dus pa nyid/ /gang zhig dngul chus phug pa ltar/ /dngos po sna tshogs 'di dag kyang/ /mi 'gyur
103a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis za ba yin/ /mi 'gyur mchog gi bdag nyid kyis/ /rnam pa kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/ /stong pa las skyes dngos po rgyu/ /mi 'gyur las skyes bde 'bras bu/ /rgyu las 'bras bu bde rgyas btab/ /'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas btab/ /stong
103a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid dngos po 'dzin pas rgyu/ /mi 'gyur snying rje 'dzin pas 'bras/ /byang chub sems de ma 'phros na/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pas/ /'byung ba zad par mi 'gyur te/ /sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med/ /dngos dang dngos
103a5(rgyud 'grel): med mtshan nyid gcig /yul dang dbang po'i sgo yis su/ /sems ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin te/ /gzhan du sprul gyis zos pa yi/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba rig pa min/ /ji ltar lcags kyi phyogs gcig na/ /gang phyir gser 'gyur rtsi gnas pa//
103a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i me yi bsregs na ni/ /thams cad gser du 'gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin sems kyi phyogs gcig tuAng/ /mi 'gyur bde la legs gnas pa/ /'dod pa'i me yis rab bsregs nas/ /thams cad bde bar gyur pa yin/ /ji ltar lcags
103a7(rgyud 'grel): ni gser gyur na/ /nam yang nag por 'gyur ba min/ /de bzhin sems nyid rtogs pa yang/ /nam yang bag chags 'gyur ba min/ /gang phyir me yi sbyangs pa'i gser/ /lcags su gyur pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin phyir zhing phyir zhing sems/ /'dod
103b1(rgyud 'grel): chags me yi dri ma med/ /'dir mang smra ba ci zhig dgos/ /'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa la/ /lcags ni 'gyur bar byed pa yi/ /rtsi yi rang bzhin bsam mi khyab/ /don dam par ni rab brtags na/ /glo bur dri mas bsgos pa yi/ /sems nyid rtogs
103b2(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa na/ /ye shes rang bzhin smos ci dgos/ /ji ltar rtsi yi bsgyur ba'i lcags/ /lcags kyi rjes su 'gro ba min/ /de bzhin bde bas bsgyur pa'i sems/ /sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur ba min/ /zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma yi
103b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa/ /b+ha ga'i dbus na rnam par gnas/ /'bad pas nye bar thob nas su/ /bla ma'i bka' la goms pa yis/ /mdzub mo cung zad skyong ba yis/ /phyi nas lce dang rdo rje yis/ /rtsa de rgyas par gyur pa las/ /mchog tu bde ba rab tu 'bab/ /pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs
103b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /stobs dang dbang po rnams dang ldan/ /sa bcu las ni 'das nas su/ /de las rtags su gyur pa med ces so/ /yang gsungs pa/ gang tshe ye shes mthong ba ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bde bar gnas/ /'gyur med thun nas zhag gcig gam/ /zla phyed zla ba
103b5(rgyud 'grel): lo gcig gam/ /bskal pa 'am bskal pa stong duAm/ /ye shes mngon par sbyor bas gnas/ /yang gsungs pa/ ji srid rnal 'byor byang chub sems/ /gtong bar byed pa ma yin pas/ /de srid rgyun mi 'chad pa 'thob/ /dga' ba las skyes bde ba yi/ /
103b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems de lhung gyur na/ /dngos grub kun gyi gter yin pas/ /rnam shes phung po brgyal 'gyur nas/ /dngos grub ma smad ga la yod ces gsungs so/ /las dang dam tshig phyag rgya yi/ /dus su lhan cig skyes pa rtogs/ /chos kyi phyag rgya
103b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya che/ /gnyis ni lhan cig skyes pa mchog /byang sems bral na bde ba ni/ /brgya lam na yang mi 'thob bo/ /bde chen nyid ni ma rtogs pa/ /nam yang gsang sngags theg pa med/ /shes rab ye shes thob pas na/ /las kyi phyag rgya lhan cig skyes/ /tha
104a1(rgyud 'grel): ma 'bring sogs dbye ba yi/ /de nyid rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /las kyi phyag rgya snyoms zhugs pas/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /tha mas bskyed pa bsgom pa ste/ /las kyi yan lag dang bral 'bring//
104a2(rgyud 'grel): rab kyis kyang ni bsam bya ba/ /myur du rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /chos kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa ni/ /tha mas rtsa dang yi ge rim/ /gtum mo'i bye brag 'bring gis so/ /mi shigs pa ni rabs kyis te/ /thig le phra sogs rnal 'byor pas/ /bsdus
104a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rig par 'dod pa yin/ /rab kyi tha mas bsgom bya na/ /khams gsum po ni gzhal yas khang/ /sems can rnams ni dkyil 'khor ba/ /rnal 'byor pa ni dkyil 'khor bdag /de bshad pa/ 'di ni gnas gsum ma yin gzhal yas
104a4(rgyud 'grel): khang pa yin/ /srog chags ma yin 'di ni rgyal ba yin/ /'khor lo'i bdag po nga yin dbang po ma yin te/ /sa la sogs pa'ang ma yin gzugs la sogs pa'ang min/ /chos nyid bdag nyid de nyid des na dkyil 'khor ba yang yin/ /sna
104a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dkyil 'khor 'khor lor shes na ci ste 'khrul par byed/ /ces bstan to/ /khams bzhi dang ni phung po dag /lha mo ye shes he ru kas/ /'khor lo rgyas btab de bzhin nyid/ /rab kyi 'bring po'i bsgom bya ba/ /sna tshogs bdag med de bzhin
104a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab stobs kyis su/ /zung 'jug lhun gyis grub pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa nyid/ /sems ni rtog med sbyor bas kyang/ /sems de nyid ni brtag mi bya/ /kun nas thams cad mchog yin te/ /rnam shes dbang
104a7(rgyud 'grel): po'i yul las 'das/ /dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin nyid/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /mdza' bzhi las ni rnam grol zhing/ /mdza' bzhi dag ni mnyam par brten/ /sna tshogs sgro btags gnas pa med/ /chags med bde ba
104b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po nyid/ /'bras bu de nyid mi mthun phyogs/ /brtags pa de nyid ma brtags pa'o/ /de rkyen thob pas skye ba ste/ /skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin te/ /bem po med de rang rig pas/ /mi shes pa dang ma mthong ba/ /brtags pas nam mkha' dngos med de/
104b2(rgyud 'grel): de ni mi 'gyur brtan pa'o/ /chad pa min pas dngos med min/ /skye ba med par rang bzhin nyid/ /kun rdzob las skyes dngos po ste/ /chos rnams thams cad lhan cig skyes/ /gnyug ma'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ /bdag byin rlabs pas rang byung
104b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /mi nyams pas na mi shigs pa'o/ /chos kyi phyag rgya phyag rgya che/ /gnyis med mos pas ldan pa'o/ /dbang po mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/ /rab kyi yang ni rab yin no/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med pas/ /bsgom pa'i rim pa bdag la med/ /ji
104b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar bskyed pas nyams myong bas/ /dran dang dran pa nyams pa med/ /ma skyes pa yi ro tshor bas/ /de bzhin bsgom pa'ang rtogs pa'o/ /gang phyir shes rab bsgom pa yis/ /stong nyid so sor rtogs pa yin/ /dpal ldan dgyes rdor sogs rgyud du//
104b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar gsungs/ /chos rnams thams cad yongs shes nas/ /bsgom pa nyid ni sgom pa min/ /gang phyir bdag byin brlab rim nges/ /zung 'jug rim pa'ang de bzhin no/ /bde chen mngon par rdzogs byang chub/ /de
104b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin phyag rgya chen po mchog /chos kyi de nyid rig pa yis/ /ngal bar gyur pa ma yin no/ /chos kyi de nyid la bzhugs phyir/ /de yi 'byed par rab tu bstan/ /bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis/ /gsal bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /'di la gzhan
104b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis bstan pa yis/ /don rtogs pa ni ma yin no/ /chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni/ /ji bzhin 'di la rtogs pa gsungs/ /rang gi mos gas tshig gi don/ /gzung ba dngos nyid ma yin no/ /de bzhin bzhi po thams cad kyang/ /'di la sogs pa
105a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa ni/ /ji ltar de bzhin sku bzhi pa'o/ /bla ma dam pa'i thabs kyis gsal/ /stong nyid bde ba dngos po ste/ /bde ba bde ba chen por 'dod/ /bde ba ro mnyam bde ba nyid/ /lhan cig skyes pa chos kyi sku//
105a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bde ba'i don byed pas/ /longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa yang/ /rnam pa lnga yi ro de nyid/ /thams cad gnyug mar bye brag med/ /chos pa dang/ sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa yang/ /sku lnga
105a3(rgyud 'grel): thob par byung ba ni/ /de nyid ro gcig pa yi sprul sku bzhi du ni rnam phye ba/ /? med pas na rnam lnga'o/ /de nyid tsam du gcig pa 'di/ /sku yang de ltar 'dod pa yin/ /ji ltar 'di ni bdag gi blos/ /so sor rig pa nyams par 'jug /dam chos yul la shes rab kyis//
105a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar blo gros kyis thob ltar/ /'di ni cung zad brjod pa las/ /ji ltar byung ba'i don rtogs pa/ /'gro rnams de ni snod du shog/ gnas pa bsdus pa rdzogs so// //slob dpon chen po dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rjes mdzad
105a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bla ma d+ha ri sh+rI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //phyis bar ston gyis zhus nas bla ma rgya gar ba dang/ mtshur lo tsa bas dpe phyi mo la gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o//
105a6(rgyud 'grel): mang+gA laM// // */ (/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ces bya ba tog rtse zhabs kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ a tsin+ta kra ma u pa de sha nA ma:/ bod skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ces bya
105a7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab mchog gi mngal nas 'byung/ /gdod nas gnyis med gnas pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bzang po'i zhal snga yi/ /yang dag
105b1(rgyud 'grel): rim 'ong bri bar bya/ /thabs dang shes rab gsang ba che/ /snying rje bsam mi khyab mtshan nyid/ /ngag gi spyod yul bsam las 'das/ /ye shes rang las 'char bar 'gyur/ /rang bzhin bde ba'i 'byung gnas nyid/ /rang 'byung gnyis su med pa'i
105b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog /de ni dngos po'i rang bzhin du/ /bltas te bsgom pa dmigs su med/ /byang sems rdo rje can bcas pas/ /dngos po med pas gzigs mi 'gyur/ /rtag dang chad pa'i bye brag dag /don dam du ni gnyis med gzigs/ /dngos po dang ni
105b3(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid/ /gnyis su med par mnyam par bsgom/ /gnyis po 'di dag yod min pas/ /rnam pa thams cad gnyis su med/ /gnyis po dag ni rnam spyad na/ /gnyis med ye shes 'chang bar 'gyur/ /mnyam pa ro mnyam mnyam pa ste/ /bsam
105b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab ye shes mchog /rtog dang brtag pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gnyis med mchog ni bsgom pa min/ /bde ba'i rdo rje mi rtog pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab kyis thob 'gyur/ /bskyed pa rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu/ /mi skye ba yang de bzhin no/ /
105b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi rnam pa dang bral bas/ /bag chags bag chags ldan par spangs/ /ye shes bag chags dang bral bas/ /bzang po'i zhabs kyis rim gyis 'ongs/ /rang byung khrem gnyer med pa ni/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /dngos dang dngos
105b6(rgyud 'grel): med rang bzhin gyis/ /gnyis kyi bag chags 'ching ba nyid/ /mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin gyi/ /bsam gyis mi khyab nyid kyis gcod/ /rtog pa'i dri ma dra ba yis/ /rin chen sems ni drin can byas/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid/ /dri ma
105b7(rgyud 'grel): bral phyir sangs rgyas brjod/ /thams cad rtogs med bdag nyid du/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rtag tu blta/ /ting 'dzin bsgom pa 'di nyid ni/ /bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis bstan/ /gang gi rang bzhin ma skyes la/ /'jig pa nyid ni yod ma yin/ /ye shes
106a1(rgyud 'grel): de ni gnyis med min/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje can/ /mi rtog don bskyed byed pa po/ /phyi rol nang gi rnam rtog gi /'jig rten thams cad yang dag brten/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs
106a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /rtog pa phyi rol nyid du bstan/ /gnyis med gnyis las rnam grol ba/ /ye shes rang nyid skye bar 'gyur/ /dngos po med par bsgom pa min/ /dngos por yang ni bsgom pa min/ /'jig pa med pa'i bde bsams na/ /bsam gyis mi khyab
106a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med gnas/ /sems can kun gyi bsam pa gang/ /shes rab mngal na rnam par gnas/ /snying rje sad pa'i mnga' yis ni/ /bde ba chen po'i 'ben la 'bigs/ /dogs pa kun las rnam par grol/ /gnyis su med cing mchog tu zhi/ /mkha' 
106a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam rnam rtog las grol ba/ /de nyid gnyis su med par brjod/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rnal 'byor gyis/ /dngos po thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /chos kyi zhal snga'i rim 'ongs ni/ /bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs/ /rnam pa'i dbye ba gnyis
106a5(rgyud 'grel): med la/ /dpal ldan mgon po bde ba che/ /gcig tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin las/ /'gro ba rnams ni rnam par sprul/ /stong pa dmigs pa smra ba yis/ /brdzun du smra ba bslus pa rnams/ /rnam rtog rmongs pa'i 'ching ba yis/ /bde ba dam pa
106a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mi rtogs/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam dag las/ /phyi rol rtog pa ngan pas brtags/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor che/ /bde ba chen po gcig nyid do/ /bstan par g.yo ba'i dngos po kun/ /gnyis su med pa'i rnam par gnas/ /de rnams
106a7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin rnam dag cing/ /mkha' ltar dri med gnyis med la/ /nga rgyal gyis ni tha snyad brtags/ /tha snyad de yang yod ma yin/ /tshor dang tshor po mtshon cha bral/ /gnyis med bde ba chen po nyid/ /gang yang bsam med rang bzhin phyir/ /sangs
106b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas blo yi spyod yul min/ /thams cad de yi rang bzhin nyid/ /rang 'byung bsam pa rnams las 'das/ /sa stengs srog chags thams cad ni/ /rtog pa'i dra bas nyams par 'gyur/ /ye shes gcig pu gnyis med pa/ /rnam par rtog pa
106b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam spangs pa/ /rtag dang chad pa ji snyed pa'i/ /phung po gnyis ni yod min pas/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs pa'i/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /gnyis dang gnyis med rnam rtog ste/ /thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor che/ /ro
106b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig gnyis su med par brjod/ /'dod chags 'dod chags bral ba spangs/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rang rig pa yi bde ba nyid/ /de ni gnyis su med par brjod/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnam par grol/ /rig pa po dang rig bya spangs/ /bdag
106b4(rgyud 'grel): med so sor rtogs pa yis/ /rin chen sems ni rab rtogs byas/ /dngos po rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ /dngos med nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur/ /dbang po'i shes pas rtogs pa yis/ /gnyis med ye shes ngo mtshar che/ /spros pa thams cad
106b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam bral zhing/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /rtog pa'i dri ma rnam gcod cing/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis med mchog /gnyis med bcud kyi phug pa na/ /rdo dang shing yang de yi dngos/ /lha yi rnam par 'gyur ba ni/ /bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis
106b6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /thabs dang shes rab snying rje che/ /gcig tu ro gcig rnam pa nyid/ /der ni ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /gnyis med bde ba chen po nyid/ /gzugs dang sgra dang ro las 'das/ /dri dang reg bya la sogs spangs/ /chos dbyings rang bzhin rnam par
106b7(rgyud 'grel): dag/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /dogs pa kun las rnam par grol/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs rang bzhin rnam dag ma gos pa/ /gnyis med don ni dam pa'o/ /ma skyes pa dang mi 'jigs pa/ /mi 'gyur ba dang mi gnas pa/ /gnyis
107a1(rgyud 'grel): su med pa'i ye shes mchog /'di ni phyag rgya chen po nyid/ /yon tan rnams dang skyon rnams ni/ /sems kyi rnam par brjod pa ste/ /de la dmigs pa ye shes mchog /khrem gnyer med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /ye shes rang las
107a2(rgyud 'grel): skye bar 'gyur/ /cung zad kyang ni bsgom pa med/ /gang phyir bsam med chos 'di nyid/ /gnyis med sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas/ /shin tu dri med ches dag cing/ /sgom pa po dang bsgom bya spangs/ /dpal ldan bde ba'i 'byung gnas kun/ /rnam rtog med pas
107a3(rgyud 'grel): nges mthong 'gyur/ /lha yi gzugs ni du ma dang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs sku/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan thams cad dang/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor tshogs/ /khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad dang/ /de bzhin rig pa'i lha mo nyid/ /dkyil 'khor
107a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzang po ru/ /snang ba'i rnam pa dri med nyid/ /de bzhin mdo sde sde snod dang/ /gzhan yang pha rol phyin rim dang/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rig pa dang/ /de bzhin snying nyid bskul ba dang/ /sngags kyi smra ba ma lus pa/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni sbyin
107a5(rgyud 'grel): sreg dang/ /bzlas dang mchod pa'i cho ga rnams/ /gnyis med las ni rang nyid skyes/ /zhi ba nyi ma pa lta ba/ /de bzhin mchod 'os khyab 'jug pa/ /rig byed tshad mar smra ba dang/ /gzhan yang rang nyid skye bar 'gyur/ /kun mkhyen gnas kyi sbyor ba
107a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mi rtogs pa/ /kun tu bzang po zhes bya'i lha/ /yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung/ /sa 'og ral gri ril bu dang/ /shing lham bum pa gnod sbyin mo/ /bcud dang mig sman bzang po yang/ /rang nyid 'grub ste gzhan du min
107a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas dngos po bsgom bya min/ /dngos med nyid kyang bsgom bya min/ /rnam par mi rtog mos pa yis/ /thams cad rang nyid skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'grub 'gyur na/ /zhi ba khyab 'jug sogs ci smos/ /de la tha snyad yod ma yin/ /
107b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang kha dog mtshan nyid med/ /sgyu ma'i rnam 'dzin bzang po nyid/ /dang ba'i rang bzhin dri ma med/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag ste/ /rtag tu dga' bde'i 'byung gnas nyid/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs dang bral/ /me long me lce 'bar ba 'dra/
107b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog dga' i bde ba rnam pa ste/ /rtag tu bde chen 'byung ba'o/ /yi ge dang ni ming brjod pa/ /sbyor bas tshig tu rab tu bstan/ /gzhan du dag gi lam 'das phyir/ /smra ba nyid de mi nus so/ /bya ba'i tshul la zhugs pa yin/ /'dod pa'i don la rol pa
107b3(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /mchod pa'i mchog gi dus su ni/ /bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis bstan/ /shes rab gnyis su med pas ni/ /gcig pu'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin las/ /bag chags zad par gyur bas ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni nges par 'thab/ /sna tshogs rigs kyi mthu
107b4(rgyud 'grel): yis ni/ /lta ba sna tshogs sbyor pa las/ /bag chags dri ma bsags pas na/ /gnyis med nyid ni rtogs pa min/ /thog mdza' dbus dang tha ma bral/ /bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa spangs/ /bsam dang sems pa dang bral ba/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /
107b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med ces bya sangs rgyas su/ /bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs/ /de phyir sangs rgyas rtogs pa las/ /sgrub po dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /tshig gi sbyor ba bstan pas na/ /sangs rgyas dang ni gnyis med rtags/ /don dam tha dad med tshul gyis//
107b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med sangs rgyas gnyis su med/ /bstan pas ye shes 'char bas na/ /rtog pas rtog pa ring spangs te/ /dngos po la sogs rtog pa kun/ /de nyid las ni lkog tu gyur/ /bzang po zhal lnga'i bka' drin gyis/ /nyan pa goms pa'i sbyor ba las/ /gnyis med
107b7(rgyud 'grel): ming du bzung ba la/ /bdag la 'byor bas bzod par gsol/ /mkhas pas rab tu 'bad pas kyang/ /bag chags rnams ni zad par byas/ /gzhan du bskal pa grangs med du/ /bye ba sangs rgyas nyid ma yin/ /ye shes gnyis med mgon pos ni/ /bag chags
108a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni zad par byed/ /bag chags zad par gyur pa na/ /gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas brjod/ /bag chags bral ba'i gnas skabs na/ /skyes bu tha ma 'bring po dag /gang la phyogs ni yod min pas/ /de ni sangs rgyas brjod par
108a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /shes rab cha ni yang dag gnas/ /thabs ni dngos por spyod pa po/ /bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis bstan/ /de dag 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can/ /ro gcig rnam par sbyor ba las/ /'di ni gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ bzang
108a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs/ /bsam dang bsgom pa por bstan med/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can ma/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni thob bya'i phyir/ /bzang pos bzang po gsungs pa nyid/ /dpe ni chos rnams thams cad la/ /gzhag pa nyid du de mi nus/ /
108a4(rgyud 'grel): mig sogs yid kyi rnam shes kyis/ /dpe yi dngos po rnam par spangs/ /gcig nyid thog ma med pa dang/ /mdza' med rnam pa de yang dag gnas/ /bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las/ /mchog cig gis mi shes par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor skyes bur bshad
108a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /rjes su rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog /gnyis 'das shin tu rnal 'byor te/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor pa nyid sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /nyi zla gza' yi zin pa na/ /shes rab rdo rje'i sbyor ba las/ /zhu bas gnyis med ye shes kyis/ /skye ba
108a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /don dam dga' ba'i rang bzhin te/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /grub pa'i gzugs su the tshom med/ /snying rje gnyis su med pa'i mchog /gang yang mig gis mthong 'gyur ba'i/ /gzugs kyi thog ma 'bring po ni/ /gang yang mig gis
108a7(rgyud 'grel): mthong 'gyur ba/ /don dam don gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /gnyis med dam par lta bar bya/ /gang yang rna bas thos 'gyur ba'i/ /sgra dang sgra ngan rnam phye ba/ /sgra las 'das pa'i ye shes gtso/ /thos pa gnyis su med pa'i mchog /gang yang lci yi myong 'gyur ba'i/ /ro mchog
108b1(rgyud 'grel): ro ni ngan pa yi/ /ro drug gcig tu gyur pa yi/ /gnyis med mchog ni rtogs par bya/ /sna yi dri ni rnam shes pa'i/ /ri dags lte ba la sogs dri/ /gcig tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /gnyis med mchog ni shes par bya/ /lus kyi reg bya'i rang bzhin
108b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /rigs bzang rigs ngan rnam phye ba/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/ /snyoms 'jug gnyis su med pa'i mchog /mdza' med thams cad khyab pa'o/ /ye shes snang ba'i 'od zer las/ /byang chub mchog tu dga' ba nyid/ /gnyis med sangs
108b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dam pa ste/ /'du byed tshor ba 'du shes dang/ /gzugs dang rnam par shes pa nyid/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin sku/ /lnga med gnyis su med pa'i bdag /rtag pa mi skyod rin chen dang/ /tshe dpag med dang don yod bdag/ lnga bdag gyur pa'i ril
108b4(rgyud 'grel): bu ni/ /drug pa bde ba chen po nyid/ /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni/ /'byung lnga lhan cig skyes pa ni/ /byang chub gnyis su med par 'gyur/ /me long mnyam nyid bya nan tan/ /so sor rtog pa chos dbyings rnams/ /rnam par
108b5(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i rkyen gyis brtags/ /rang 'byung gcig pu gnyis su med/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni/ /lta ba la sogs rnam par phye/ /zhi sogs khyab 'jug tshangs pa dang/ /kun mkhyen gcig bu gnyis su med/ /mig las byung sogs
108b6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus dang/ /yid kyi spyod yul las 'das pa/ /don dam gnyis med ces bya ba/ /ngag gi spros pa kun rdzob kyis/ /gnyis su med la kun tu brtags/ /don dam gnas skabs dbyer med pa/ /gnyis su med la sangs rgyas med/ /rtog pas nam mkhar
108b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas ni/ /ngag gi spros pa bstan pa yin/ /bstan bcos rim pas tshig tu ni/ /rnam par phye ste bshad pa yin/ /gnyis med las gzhan sangs rgyas ni/ /smra ba nyid du mi nus so/ /stong pa bcu drug bshad pa dang/ /shes rab bcur ni brtags
109a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /sangs rgyas lngar yang bshad pa dang/ /rnam rig brgyad ni gnyis su med/ /me long snang ba'i gzugs bsnyan ni/ /ji ltar kun tu snang 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin gnyis med ye shes 'dir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab//
109a2(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum dag ni thams cad du/ /skye dang gnas pa'i rgyu rnams kyis/ /de kun gnyis med ye shes las/ /skye bo thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho ri dang shing dang ni/ /rtse lcug gel pa la sogs pa/ /gnyis med ye shes las 'byung ba/ /'di
109a3(rgyud 'grel): la the tshom yod ma yin/ /pha dang ma yang gcig pa ste/ /'di la gnyis yod ma yin no/ /gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin las/ /gzhan yang thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ /'di ltar thabs dang sbyor ba yis/ /shes rab gnyis med rang bzhin las/ /skye
109a4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'dir ni rnal 'byor pas/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'phral du rnyed/ /ye shes dag gi rang bzhin mchog /bla ma rgyud pa'i rim pa'i gzhung/ /snyan nas snyan dang zhal nas zhal/ /bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs/ /bzang po'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las
109a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam med bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni nges par thob/ /rta mchog bi na'i zhal snga nas/ /in+d+ra b+hU ti lak+Sh+mi? bcas/ /sgeg pa'i rdo rje 'gun di ri/ /slob dpon pad+ma snying rje che/ /chos kyi zhal snga'i rim
109a6(rgyud 'grel): pa las/ /bzang po'i zhal sngar phrad pa nyid/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog /thams cad kyi ni dgongs pa gcig /sngags kyi smra ba ma lus dang/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i lugs/ /mdo sde sde snod la sogs pa/ /'dir gcig gnyis med bde
109a7(rgyud 'grel): chen pos/ /mchod 'os zhi ba nyi ma sogs/ /so ma'i grub pa'i mdza' nyid dang/ /khyab 'jug dang ni shed bu'i chos/ /gnyis su med par bstan pa'o/ /gnyis med phyi rol yod min pas/ /lha dang lha min bam ni/ /thams cad gnyis med ye shes las
109b1(rgyud 'grel): so sor snang ba gsal bar 'gyur/ /stong pa'i bye brag tu phye ba/ /snying rje dang ni gnyis med 'dres/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin kun bla ma/ /'di ni bzang po'i zhal snga'i gzhung/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dam pa nyid/ /'o ma'i rgya
109b2(rgyud 'grel): mtsho bsrubs pa las/ /dam pa thams cad skye 'gyur zhing/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /gang yang sangs rgyas sogs grags dang/ /nyi zla gza' skar bcas pa yang/ /ye shes rgya mtsho las byung zhing/ /legs smin dang ni dbyangs can nyid/ /ro
109b3(rgyud 'grel): yi mchog ni myang ba dang/ /tshangs bcas lha min mi rnams ni/ /bdud rtsi las ni thams cad langs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa dge ba/ /bcu gsum du yang rnam bshad pa/ /gru gsum rnam par 'byung ba ni/ /'di ni chos kyi 'byung ba ni/ /'di ni chos kyi 'byung gnas
109b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /nyi zla chu yis gang ba yis/ /shes rab gzugs ni cher 'bar ba/ /de las bde ba chen po kun/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni thob byed ma/ /pad chen 'dab ma bye ba nyid/ /de yi dbus na rnam par gnas/ /rtag tu gsar bcas pa'i nang/ /A li kA li
109b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan/ /zla ba nyi ma'i gos kyis bkab/ /shes rab dgu dang yang dag ldan/ /'dzag cing 'bar ba'i rnam pa nyid/ /thig le zla ba 'char ba'i mchog /dga' ba skyed byed bzang mo ste/ /ma lus don gyi 'bras ster ma/ /dang ba'i bdud rtsi shin
109b6(rgyud 'grel): tu gang/ /nor bu rin chen mnyam par ldan/ yon tan mdza' yas pa yi gzhi/ /bde dpal rdo rje can gyi gnas/ /thams cad tshim par byed pa mo/ /'byin byed skyed par byed pa mo/ /lha yi gzugs ni du ma dag /gnyis med rgya mtsho las ni 'byung//
109b7(rgyud 'grel): chos dang longs spyod rdzogs gzugs dang/ /sprul pa yi ni sku nyid kyis/ /sems can du ma kun gyi don/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/ /mdza' yas mthar thug thams cad du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba po/ /stobs bcu yi ni ye shes
110a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /shes rab gtso bo dam pa nyid/ /mkha' 'gro pad+ma nges par rig/ lam mchog bzang po'i rim las 'ongs/ /snying ga lte ba'i pad+ma dang/ /de bzhin lkog ma'i pad+ma nyid/ /dril can skyes gnas pad+ma yi/ /dngos
110a2(rgyud 'grel): su 'dzag pas rnam par gnas/ /bshad gci khu ba 'pho ba dang/ /ta dang snom dang nyan pa dang/ /ro mchog rnams ni rig par 'gyur/ /sgo dgu dag nas rgyu ba yi/ /sa bon pad bsnol rnam pa mtshungs/ /'og dang steng du rnam par gnas/ /'di ni shes
110a3(rgyud 'grel): rab ces bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yul nyid do/ /de yi dbus na gnas pa'i lha/ /mchog gi dbang phyug gnyis med pa/ /pad+ma gsum du rol par 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i bde chen po/ /me dang chu dang dbang chen dang/ /rlung gi rnam par
110a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa nyid/ /dal bus 'khor ba sbyor ba yis/ /bye brag gsum du 'dren par byed/ /dril can bu ga'i lam gyis ni/ /sna yi rtse mor sbyor ba las/ /srol gong rdo rje'i bu ga ru/ /sangs rgyas 'phreng ba gnyis su med/ /'khor bas yongs su nyon
110a5(rgyud 'grel): mongs na/ /dril can rtse mor ngal so nas/ /rdo rje lce yi rab sbyor bas/ /bdud rtsi btung bar bya ba nyid/ /de nas lus ni rnam dag pa/ /rang bzhin dri ma med par 'gyur/ /shes rab bzang zhing yid gzhungs pa/ /rgas dang 'chi ba nyams par byas//
110a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i zhal snga'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag la rnam par rol par gsungs/ /ting 'dzin bdud rtsi zhes bya ba/ /bde ba'i mchog de gzhan du min/ /sna nas rdub pa'i bye brag gis/ /taM gi rnam par mi shigs pa/ /drin can bu ga'i lam du ni/ /rtsa
110a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas/ /so ni sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod/ /cha dang cha min gnyis su med/ /sna yi rdub pa'i bye brag gis/ /haM gi rnam pa mi shigs pa/ /dril can bu ga'i lam gyis ni/ /nges par 'dren pa lam gyi mchog/ //
110b1(rgyud 'grel): de la sgo rung la so zhing/ /dag pa'i rnam par 'od gsal ba/ /thog ma med nyid ces bya ba/ /bde dpal rnam par yang dag gnas/ /de nas rlung gis phul ba dang/ /dbang chen yang ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /des pa'i lam yang gsal 'gyur ba/ /mchog gi
110b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug mi shigs pa/ /sa ni bcu gsum dbang phyug mchog /thog ma med par grub pa'i gzugs/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas so/ /bzang po'i zhal snga'i man ngag ste/ /snying po brgyud pa'i rim pa'o/ /gang yang thos pa kun bzung nas/ /de
110b3(rgyud 'grel): thos bsam pas bsgom pa yin/ /bzang po'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis/ /nyan pa goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dge can tog tse? zhes bya bas/ /gzhung 'di dag ni yang dag bsdus/ /bdag ni bzang po'i zhal snga dang/ /slob dpon gzhan dang rnal
110b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa/ /sems can rnams ni ma lus pa'i/ /bran du skye dang skye gyur cig /bsam pa 'di yi sgo nas ni/ /gal te bdag ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'on te dmyal bar 'gro srid na/ /dmyal nyid bde ba can du shog /bsam med gnyis med rdzogs
110b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /rim pa'i man ngag mkhyen pa bla/ /lha yi rang bzhin ma lus sngags gzhung rnal 'byor mchog /rnal 'byor rgyas pa mdza' yas bla ma las 'byung dri med 'di/ /glen pa blo zhan bdag nyid dran pa tsam gyis bris pa yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab
110b6(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po thob pa'i slob dpon tog rtse zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bde ba'i myu gu dang 'gos kyi 'gyur ro// //*/ /tha snyad du chos spyod yod par ston pa lta ba ngan sel zhes bya ba bzhugs// //
110b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ku driSh+Ti ni rga ta nA ma(rgyud 'grel): /bod skad du/ lta ba ngan pa sel ba zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig 'di la gnas gyur na/ /rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob 'gyur
111a1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /dang po las pa'i cho ga nyid/ /lta ngan sel ba bshad par bya/ /'dir ni sems can ni rnam pa gnyis te/ /slob pa dang/ mi slob pa'o/ /de la lhag pa'i bsam pa bas mos pa'i sbyor ba dang/ sa la zhugs pa'i sbyor ba
111a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lnga la dbang thob par mthar thug pa'i bar rgyu'i gnas skabs la gnas pa'i slob pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i las bar do'i cho gas tshogs gnyis bsags nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'thob bo/ /mi slob pa
111a3(rgyud 'grel): yang de kho na nyid dang/ 'bras bu rnam par rtog pa ni gnyen po'i phyogs kyi bsal la shAkya thub pa ltar sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyi nus pas zung du 'jug pa nyid sems can gyi don byed pa ni/ mtshan nyid rgyun mi 'chad par dang po'i las la 'jug
111a4(rgyud 'grel): go zhes bya bar gnas so/ /de yang mgon po sems pa mi mnga' zhing/ /rnam rtog g.yo ba mi mnga' yang/ /khyod nyid rang gis 'jig rten la/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'jug par 'gyur/ /gzhan don phun tshogs sangs rgyas kyis/ /'bras bu gtso bo
111a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ma yin/ /des na sangs rgyas 'bras bur brjod/ /kun rtag rlung dmar thams cad kyis/ /dpag bsam shing ltar mi bskyod pa/ /de ltar sems can thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa ma lus yongs rdzogs byed/ /'bras bu de nyid mi mthun phyogs/
111a6(rgyud 'grel): blang dang dor ba rnam spangs nas/ /blo ldan rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs/ /dang po las 'bad pas bsam/ /zhes bstan pa yin no/ /'on te las dang po pas ni slob pa'i cho ga nyid rigs na yang mi slob pa rang bzhin med pa bsgom par gyur pa
111a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la las dang po pa'i rtsom pa yod pa ji lta bu/ /dper na 'dir yang gser gyi sgrog gis bcings pa lta bu nyid do zhen bden te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu
111b1(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa lnga'i bdag nyid do/ /de lta bas na/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes bstan pa yin no/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lngas ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming
111b2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'thob bo/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las kyang/ shes rab dang bral ba'i thabs ni 'ching ba'o/ /thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab kyang 'ching ba'o/ /shes rab dang bcas
111b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs ni thar pa'o/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyang thar pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /'di dag ni 'di'i bdag nyid ni bla ma dam pa'i man ngag nyid las sgron ma dang snang ba bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa drug pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/ /de lta bas na/ stong
111b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod pa gang/ /rnal 'byor pa kun bya ba nyid/ /dang po'i las can bstan pa gang/ /pha rol phyin lngar gang bstan pa/ /dang po'i las can zhes bya ba/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yis/ /ngo bo nyid ni dpyad
111b5(rgyud 'grel): mi bya/ /de bzhin du/ sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab la gus pas/ /rtag tu blo ldan gyis bsten na/ /bde bar shes rab kyang 'byung 'gyur/ /longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod
111b6(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum/ /bsam gtan shes rab chos kyi'o/ /brtson 'grus gnyis kar 'dod pa yin/ /zhes bstan pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas/ shin tu rnam par dag pas gnas par bya'o/ /bzlog pa ni med par smra bar thal bar 'gyur/ /
111b7(rgyud 'grel): de yang/ dge dang mi dge gtan tshigs gang phyir dngos med kyang/ /de ltar dge ba nyid bya mi dge min/ /'jig rten kun rdzob chu yi zla 'dra yang/ /de las yid 'ong sdug bsngal yid mi bde zhes bstan pa yin na/ /de ltar na slob pas smyon pa'i brtul
112a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs la gnas nas/ rnam par mi rtog pa myong bar 'dod pas/ las dang po la 'jug pa ji lta bu zhe na/ brjod par bya'o/ /lus sbyin par gtong ba dang ldan pa'i spyod pa ste/ lus ni sbyin par btang byas la/ /phyi nas spyod pa
112a2(rgyud 'grel): brtsam par bya/ /zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /lus gtor pa'i sbyin pa dang/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i tshul khrims dang/ drag po'i che ba dang/ sog las gshegs pa la bzod pa'i bzod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad
112a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi gnod pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus dang/ dngos po thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i 'bad pa med pa'i rang gi dang gis 'byung ba'i bsam gtan dang/ chos thams cad mi dmigs par rjes su brtag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shes rab ste/ 'bad
112a4(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa'i ro gcig pa'i dang gis thams cad du ro gcig par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi mchog go /de lta bas na/ smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la gnas pa yang dang po las la 'jug pa nyid yin no/ /tshu rol mthong ba grags pa nyams
112a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jig rten pha rol bslus pa thams cad du rigs pa tsam ma yin pa smra ba ltar ni ma yin no/ /de la slob ma brtul zhugs can byang chub sems dpa' la/ dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya/ /phyi nas bslab pa sbyin par bya/ /zhes dgyes pa'i rdo rje las
112a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /dang por gso sbyong sbyin pa ni/ /btsun pa'am slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /bdag dge bsnyen ming 'di zhes bya ba/ byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de ltar lan
112a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bya'o/ /bdag gsum la skyabs su song bar btsun pas bzung du gsol /slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /bdag dge bsnyen ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dus 'di nas nye bar bzung nas/ nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du/ srog chags gsod
112b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ gzhan gyi nor rku ba dang/ mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ de bzhin du myos par 'gyur pa'i btung ba 'thung ba dang/ dus ma yin par za ba dang/ phreng ba dang kha dog dang/ glu dang gar dang/ rtse 'jo dang/ khri stan dang/ khri stan chen po las
112b2(rgyud 'grel): ldog par bgyi'o/ /bdag yon tan brgyad kyis dgra bcom pa'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong sbyin pa'i tshig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bas/ srog gcod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/
112b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa la spyod pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba ched 'thung ba dang lnga las log par bgyi'o/ /mos pa dang spyod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas mi
112b4(rgyud 'grel): dge bcu yongs su shes par byas la/ yang mi bya bar yongs su bsdam par bya zhing/ dge ba'i las rnams ni bya'o/ /tho rangs kyi thun la langs la gdong bkru ba la sogs byas nas/ dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pas/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pas/ bdag dang gnas
112b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rnal 'byor bsrung ba byas la/ rtogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsam gtan dang/ bzlas pa dang/ bstod pa la sogs pa bya ba/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa yang lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya swAhA zhes pa'i brgya rtsa brgyad
112b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'i chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad dpal gnod gnas la dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas na ma(rgyud 'grel): saman+ta bud+d+ha nAM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ oM sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i gtor ma'i sngags lan bdun bzlas shing/ lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo
112b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga brkyang ba las/ bdud rtsi lngas sgo drung na 'dug pa'i gtor ma'i zas chu dang bcas pa zan 'bru gcig gis kyang/ yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo cher re 'byung bar gyur par bsams la/ yi dags kyi tshogs ma lus pa la se gol lan gsum gtogs pas sbyin par bya'o// 
113a1(rgyud 'grel): de na sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i rnam pa ltar blta ba'i byams pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las 'byin pa bsam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis snying rje'i bsam pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum
113a2(rgyud 'grel): la skyabs su 'gro bas spro bar gyur pa'i yid las byung ba'i dga' ba dang/ mi bden pa la sogs pa yongs su spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis btang snyoms bsgoms la/ /sems can thams cad kyi don la spro ba'i sems kyis ba'i lci ba gtsang ma blangs la/ chu
113a3(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ma dang bsres la/ oM badzra re khe hUM zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs la/ sa'i cha gru bzhi pa la sogs pa gang yang rung par 'dod pa maN+Dal byas la/ de'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i zla ba dang/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi
113a4(rgyud 'grel): steng du/ hUM sngon po las yongs su rdzogs pa'i mi bskyod pa sa gnon gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa sku mdog sngon po'o/ /de'i rjes la yi ge oM dkar po las rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang/ de nas lho phyogs kyi ?
113a5(rgyud 'grel): ma la yi ge TaM ser po las yang dag par byung ba'i sku mdog ser po mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /de nas nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ yi ge h+ri dmar po las yang dag par byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i snang ba
113a6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas sku mdog dmar po'o/ /de nas byang phyogs kyi 'dab mal yi ge khaM ljang gu las byung ba'i sku mdog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i don yod grub pa bsgoms la/ oM badzra puShpe hUM zhes pa la sogs pa/ mngon par zhen pa'i sngags
113a7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po 'di dag ni/ na bza' ngur smrig bsnabs pa/ gtsug tor dang bcas pa'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ste/ rnam par snang mdzad ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
113b1(rgyud 'grel): la'o/ /de la bzhi po ni mi bskyod pa la phyogs pa'o/ /mi bskyod pa ni sgrub pa po la phyogs pa'o/ /de dag gi mdun na gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rtogs pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du/ mngon du byas nas gdon par bya'o/ /de la gsum
113b2(rgyud 'grel): la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di yin te/ /sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsum la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa
113b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la/ /byang chub bar du bdag gis skyabs su mchi/ /bdag dang gzhan don rab tu bsgrub pa'i
113b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /bdag gis byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing/ /sems can 'di dag thams cad 'gron gnyer nas/ /byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /sdig pa thams cad bshags par
113b5(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang/ /gso sbyong 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad/ /snyungs bar bya ba spyad par bya/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshul khrims tsandan lus la byugs/ /bsam gtan gyis ni gos kyis g.yogs/ /byang chub yan lag me tog
113b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /ji ltar bde ba nyid du gnas/ /zhes brjod nas/ oM badzra maN+Dal hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo/ de bzhin du 'jam dpal la sogs pa yang/ man ngag ji lta ba bzhin mchod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ /lci ba chu dang
113b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa sbyin pa ste/ /legs par byugs pa tshul khrims bzod pa ni/ /srog chags phra mo sel bar byed pa yin/ /brtson 'grus bya ba dag la 'jug pa'o/ /bsam gtan de dus rtse gcig byed pa'i sems/ /shes rab mtshon sogs legs par mdzes
114a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /thub pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor byas pa yis/ /pha rol phyin pa drug ni nges thob shog/ nad kun las grol gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/ /lha dang mis mchod zla ba bzhin 'bar mdangs/ /nor dang gser phyug
114a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i rgyud skye bar/ /bde gshegs gnas mchog lus kyis byas bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phan yon gyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /lci ba chu dang me tog gis/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /cung zad phul nas bla ma la/ /dus
114a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum du ni gus phyag bya/ /gzhan dag gis ni sems mgu zhing/ /rang gi sems kyang 'phel bar byed/ /bde zhing tshad med nor dang ldan/ /bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /dkyil
114a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rab tu byed pa'o/ /dpag med yon tan rdzogs par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa phan yon rgyas par 'byung ba yin no/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga yis/ /yang dag shes rab pha rol phyin/ /rtag tu mchod cing bklag bar bya/ /de yi don yang rtags
114a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /tshigs bcad gcig dang tshigs bcad bzhi/ /tshigs bcad gnyis dang sgo drug pa'i/ /gzungs dang bzang po spyod pa dang/ /phung po gsum pa dus gsum du/ /yi ge gcig nas nyer bzung nas/ /gsum gyi bar du mnyam gzhag pas/ /yi dam
114a6(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa med pa yi/ /blo ldan ji ltar rnyed pa bklag /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i ras ris dang/ glegs bam dang/ lugs ma la sogs pa mchod par bya'o/ /ras ris dang/ glegs bam dang sku gzugs la mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /de ni dkyil 'khor
114a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po bkod pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas/ tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ba/ na massa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ oM badzra a yu She swAhA/ 'jim pa blang ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzro rb+ha bA ya swAhA/ 'bi 'bi bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM ar dze bi re dze swAhA/ ? sku ba'i
114b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags so/ /oM d+harmA d+hA tu garbe swAhA/ rgyar gzhug pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra mung+ga ra a ko Ta ya swAhA/ gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM d+harma A yu She swAhA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra su pra tiSh+Tha badzra ye swAhA/ bzhugs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma
114b2(rgyud 'grel): Ni sha ta dwi swa te dzwa la dzwa la d+harma d+hA tu garb+he swAhA/ rab tu gnas pa'i sngags so/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he a ha ra a ha ra a gats+tsha a gats+tsha d+harma d+hhA tu garb+ha swAhA/ gshegs su gsal ba'i sngags so/ /oM A kaM sha d+harma d+ha tu garb+he swAhA/ bzod par gsol ba'i sngags so/ /de lta bu ni
114b3(rgyud 'grel): tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te be ro nA ya/ pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arha te samya ksaM bud+d+hA ya/ tadya thA/ oM su k+Sh+me su k+Sh+me/ sa ma ye pra sa ma ye/ shAn+te dAn+te/ sa ma ro pe/ a na a lam be/ pra ban be ya sho ba ni mahA te dzi nir ku le/ ni nir b+ha nak
114b4(rgyud 'grel): tshe ni/ sarba bud+d+hA ya d+hiSh+TA? na a d+hi Sh+TI te swAhA// //zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di 'jim pa'am/ bye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bzlas te/ mchod rten byas nas/ de la rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'gyur gyi mchod rten byas pa'i bsod nams thob par
114b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs te/ gzungs 'di ni phan yon dpag tu med pa/ /ye d+ha rmA he tu pra g+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to hya
114b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bI dA mahA sh+ra ma Na:/ /tshigs su bcad pas rab gnas byas la/ na mo b+ha ga ba te ratna ke tu rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA yArta te samya ksaM bud+d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM ratne ratne ma hA ratne/ ratna bo d+hi swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i gzungs la sogs pa 'di
114b7(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing mchod rten la phyag 'tshal la sogs pa byas nas/ mchod rten gcig la phyag byas pas mchod rten bye ba la phyag la sogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /'jim ba la sogs pa la mchod rten bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /'di dag thams cad khyad par can du yongs su
115a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngo ba las ni khyad par can gyi 'bras bu skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gsungs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba chen pos yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /de yang 'di ltar bya ste/ ji ltar
115a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rigs gang yin pa dang/ sde gang yin pa dang/ mtshan nyid ji lta ba dang/ rang bzhin
115a3(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa dang/ chos nyid gang yin pas yang dag par gnas pa de dag gis ji ltar mkhyen pa de ltar bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo/ /de dag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa ltar/ /bdag gis
115a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /gzhan yang dge ba'i las 'di bdag gis byas pa yis/ /ring por mi thogs 'jig rten sangs rgyas nas/ /'gro la phan phyir chos ni ston byed cing/ /sdug bsngal mang pos mnar ba'i sems can grol
115a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga'o/ /gang dang gang gis gang 'tsho ba/ /'tsho ba dag pa de rgyal ba/ /bkres dang skom sogs zhi bya'i phyir/ /sman bzhin du ni bsam par bya zhes bya bas
115a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la/ ji ltar snyed pa'i zas la/ oM a k+Sha ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM a dyA nut pan ta twat/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA zhes bya bas gtor ma sbyin bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la/ oM a sarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwa b+hyo badzra ne bi
115a7(rgyud 'grel): dyA hUM zhes bya bas bshes gtsang dbul lo/ /oM ha ri ti mahA yak+Shi ni ha ra ha ra sarba pA paM na sh+ri ni swAhA/ zhes brjod la zan chang bu gnyis sbyin bar bya'o/ /oM a gra pa Ni DA si b+hya(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes bya bas ni zan gyi
115b1(rgyud 'grel): chang bu gsum pa sbyin bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya bas/ rang gi snod kyi zan byin gyis brlab cing/ /dug la sogs pa rnams zhi bar gyur gyi bar du dang po mthe bong dang srin lag gis bza' bar bya'o/ /de'i
115b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes la ji ltar bde bar zos ba'i zas lhag ma la/ oM u ts+tshi swa binda a saM b+hya(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes bya bas lhag ma'i chang bu sbyin par bya'o/ /lhag la gzhan byin gyis ma brlabs pa ni yongs su dor bar bya'o/ /de yang gtor ma btang
115b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing bshos gcing dbul/ /'phrog ma dang po chang bu dang lha bo lhag ma'i btang ba ste/ 'bras bu longs spyod chen por 'gyur zhes bstan pas so/ /de'i rjes la/ 'thor 'thung la sogs pa byas la/ blo bde bas yongs su dag cing/ khyad
115b4(rgyud 'grel): par can gyi bde ba dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ lan gsum gyi bar du 'di brjod par bya ste/ rgyal po dang ni yon bdag dang/ /sems can phung po gzhan dag kyang/ /tshe dang nad med phun
115b5(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs/ /rtag tu bde ba thob gyur cig ces bya'o/ /de'i rjes la/ yongs su dag pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ji ltar 'dod par gnas par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten nas lhan cig spyod pa dang/ skyes
115b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rabs sam/ /gtam rgyud dam/ gleng gzhi'am/ rtogs ba brjod pa'i gtam gyis nyin dang mtshan du yid shin tu gnas pas gnas par bya'o/ /de nas phyi dro'i dus su yang bzlas pa bstod pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du skyo ba med pa'i
115b7(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis byas la/ yi ge a la sogs pas gtor ma sbyin la rnal 'byor gyi gnyid kyis nyal bar bya'o/ /u sangs rgyas mchod la rtag tu 'jug /nye bar zhi bas dge bsnyen te/ /sems can rnams la nye bar phan/ /thams cad nye bar phan gyur pas/ /rtag tu sdig pa spong bar byas
116a1(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa can dang 'gogs pa spang/ /skyes bus sdig pa spong bar byed/ /kun tu sdig pa bshags byed pa'o/ /?? ? las rnam par grol/ /ting nge 'dzin la legs mnyam 'jog /kun tu mchog tu dga' ba yis/ /mkhas pas rdzogs
116a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub bsgrub/ /dus kun tu ni 'bad med pas/ /snying rjes yongs su skyong pa nyid/ /sdug bsngal byung kyang ma 'dor min/ /phan pa mchog ni byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig gis yi ge bzhi dang ldan pa'i tshig gis ni dge bsnyen no/ /dge ba'i las ni yongs
116a3(rgyud 'grel): su byas/ /bsod nams tshogs ni nya bar bsags/ /goms pa'i dbang gis bsad pa bzhin/ /dge ba rmi lam nyid na'ang byed/ /'gro ba thams cad dri med pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan bzhin du mthong 'gyur na/ /thams cad smra ba'i skyes bu ltar/ /rjes su
116a4(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs bzhin du byed/ /de lta bas na phyir mi ldog ba zhes brjod do/ /de ltar nyin dang mtshan du rgyun mi 'chad par/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sems can la phan pa dang/ bde bas yang dag par gnas so
116a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba yin no/ /dbu ma'i don la mchog gzhol ba/ /nam mkha' i snying po zhes bya bas/ /dang po las la mnyam 'jog cing/ /yi dam nyid du 'di byed pa/ /rdo rje gdan nas 'ongs 'gyur te/ /bram ze'i rigs pa zhi ba'i sems/ /de yi gsol btab
116a6(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i las 'di dag gis byas/ /nam mkha' i snying pos gsol btab bdag gis dngos po yi/ /cho ga'i tshig 'ga' tsam zhig bstan pa yis/ /byang chub goms par byas nas myur du nyon mongs pa'i/ /sdig pa'i blo yis dri ma'i rab rib 'dis
